Text: Those to whom We have given the Book rejoice at what hath been revealed unto thee: but there are among the clans those who reject a part thereof. Say: "I am commanded to worship Allah, and not to join partners with Him. Unto Him do I call, and unto Him is my return."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Thus have We revealed it to be a judgment of authority in Arabic. Wert thou to follow their (vain) desires after the knowledge which hath reached thee, then wouldst thou find neither protector nor defender against Allah.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We did send messengers before thee, and appointed for them wives and children: and it was never the part of a messenger to bring a sign except as Allah permitted (or commanded). For each period is a Book (revealed).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Allah doth blot out or confirm what He pleaseth: with Him is the Mother of the Book.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Whether We shall show thee (within thy life-time) part of what we promised them or take to ourselves thy soul (before it is all accomplished),- thy duty is to make (the Message) reach them: it is our part to call them to account.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: See they not that We gradually reduce the land (in their control) from its outlying borders? (Where) Allah commands, there is none to put back His Command: and He is swift in calling to account.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Those before them did (also) devise plots; but in all things the master-planning is Allah's He knoweth the doings of every soul: and soon will the Unbelievers know who gets home in the end.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: The Unbelievers say: "No messenger art thou." Say: "Enough for a witness between me and you is Allah, and such as have knowledge of the Book."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'people_of_the_book', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: A. L. R. A Book which We have revealed unto thee, in order that thou mightest lead mankind out of the depths of darkness into light - by the leave of their Lord - to the Way of (Him) the Exalted in power, worthy of all praise!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Of Allah, to Whom do belong all things in the heavens and on earth! But alas for the Unbelievers for a terrible penalty (their Unfaith will bring them)!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Those who love the life of this world more than the Hereafter, who hinder (men) from the Path of Allah and seek therein something crooked: they are astray by a long distance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: We sent not a messenger except (to teach) in the language of his (own) people, in order to make (things) clear to them. Now Allah leaves straying those whom He pleases and guides whom He pleases: and He is Exalted in power, full of Wisdom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We sent Moses with Our signs (and the command). "Bring out thy people from the depths of darkness into light, and teach them to remember the Days of Allah." Verily in this there are Signs for such as are firmly patient and constant,- grateful and appreciative.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Remember! Moses said to his people: "Call to mind the favour of Allah to you when He delivered you from the people of Pharaoh: they set you hard tasks and punishments, slaughtered your sons, and let your women-folk live: therein was a tremendous trial from your Lord."
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: And remember! your Lord caused to be declared (publicly): "If ye are grateful, I will add more (favours) unto you; But if ye show ingratitude, truly My punishment is terrible indeed."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Has not the story reached you, (O people!), of those who (went) before you? - of the people of Noah, and 'Ad, and Thamud? - And of those who (came) after them? None knows them but Allah. To them came messengers with Clear (Signs); but they put their hands up to their mouths, and said: "We do deny (the mission) on which ye have been sent, and we are really in suspicious (disquieting) doubt as to that to which ye invite us."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Their messengers said: "Is there a doubt about Allah, The Creator of the heavens and the earth? It is He Who invites you, in order that He may forgive you your sins and give you respite for a term appointed!" They said: "Ah! ye are no more than human, like ourselves! Ye wish to turn us away from the (gods) our fathers used to worship: then bring us some clear authority."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Their messengers said to them: "True, we are human like yourselves, but Allah doth grant His grace to such of his servants as He pleases. It is not for us to bring you an authority except as Allah permits. And on Allah let all men of faith put their trust.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: "No reason have we why we should not put our trust on Allah. Indeed He Has guided us to the Ways we (follow). We shall certainly bear with patience all the hurt you may cause us. For those who put their trust should put their trust on Allah."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And the Unbelievers said to their messengers: "Be sure we shall drive you out of our land, or ye shall return to our religion." But their Lord inspired (this Message) to them: "Verily We shall cause the wrong-doers to perish!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And verily We shall cause you to abide in the land, and succeed them. This for such as fear the Time when they shall stand before My tribunal,- such as fear the punishment denounced."
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: In front of such a one is Hell, and he is given, for drink, boiling fetid water.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: In gulps will he sip it, but never will he be near swallowing it down his throat: death will come to him from every quarter, yet will he not die: and in front of him will be a chastisement unrelenting.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The parable of those who reject their Lord is that their works are as ashes, on which the wind blows furiously on a tempestuous day: No power have they over aught that they have earned: that is the straying far, far (from the goal).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah created the heavens and the earth in Truth? If He so will, He can remove you and put (in your place) a new creation?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: They will all be marshalled before Allah together: then will the weak say to those who were arrogant, "For us, we but followed you; can ye then avail us to all against the wrath of Allah?" They will reply, "If we had received the Guidance of Allah, we should have given it to you: to us it makes no difference (now) whether we rage, or bear (these torments) with patience: for ourselves there is no way of escape."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And Satan will say when the matter is decided: "It was Allah Who gave you a promise of Truth: I too promised, but I failed in my promise to you. I had no authority over you except to call you but ye listened to me: then reproach not me, but reproach your own souls. I cannot listen to your cries, nor can ye listen to mine. I reject your former act in associating me with Allah. For wrong-doers there must be a grievous penalty."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: But those who believe and work righteousness will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow,- to dwell therein for aye with the leave of their Lord. Their greeting therein will be: "Peace!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Seest thou not how Allah sets forth a parable? - A goodly word like a goodly tree, whose root is firmly fixed, and its branches (reach) to the heavens,- of its Lord. So Allah sets forth parables for men, in order that they may receive admonition.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It brings forth its fruit at all times, by the leave of its Lord. So Allah sets forth parables for men, in order that they may receive admonition.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And the parable of an evil Word is that of an evil tree: It is torn up by the root from the surface of the earth: it has no stability.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Allah will establish in strength those who believe, with the word that stands firm, in this world and in the Hereafter; but Allah will leave, to stray, those who do wrong: Allah doeth what He willeth.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Hast thou not turned thy vision to those who have changed the favour of Allah. Into blasphemy and caused their people to descend to the House of Perdition?-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Into Hell? They will burn therein,- an evil place to stay in!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And they set up (idols) as equal to Allah, to mislead (men) from the Path! Say: "Enjoy (your brief power)! But verily ye are making straightway for Hell!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Speak to my servants who have believed, that they may establish regular prayers, and spend (in charity) out of the sustenance we have given them, secretly and openly, before the coming of a Day in which there will be neither mutual bargaining nor befriending.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: It is Allah Who hath created the heavens and the earth and sendeth down rain from the skies, and with it bringeth out fruits wherewith to feed you; it is He Who hath made the ships subject to you, that they may sail through the sea by His command; and the rivers (also) hath He made subject to you.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And He hath made subject to you the sun and the moon, both diligently pursuing their courses; and the night and the day hath he (also) made subject to you.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And He giveth you of all that ye ask for. But if ye count the favours of Allah, never will ye be able to number them. Verily, man is given up to injustice and ingratitude.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Remember Abraham said: "O my Lord! make this city one of peace and security: and preserve me and my sons from worshipping idols.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: "O my Lord! they have indeed led astray many among mankind; He then who follows my (ways) is of me, and he that disobeys me,- but Thou art indeed Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: "O our Lord! I have made some of my offspring to dwell in a valley without cultivation, by Thy Sacred House; in order, O our Lord, that they may establish regular Prayer: so fill the hearts of some among men with love towards them, and feed them with fruits: so that they may give thanks.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'makkah']

Text: "O our Lord! truly Thou dost know what we conceal and what we reveal: for nothing whatever is hidden from Allah, whether on earth or in heaven.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Praise be to Allah, Who hath granted unto me in old age Isma'il and Isaac: for truly my Lord is He, the Hearer of Prayer!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: O my Lord! make me one who establishes regular Prayer, and also (raise such) among my offspring O our Lord! and accept Thou my Prayer.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: "O our Lord! cover (us) with Thy Forgiveness - me, my parents, and (all) Believers, on the Day that the Reckoning will be established!
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: So warn mankind of the Day when the Wrath will reach them: then will the wrong-doers say: "Our Lord! respite us (if only) for a short term: we will answer Thy call, and follow the messengers!" "What! were ye not wont to swear aforetime that ye should suffer no decline?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And ye dwelt in the dwellings of men who wronged their own souls; ye were clearly shown how We dealt with them; and We put forth (many) parables in your behoof!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Mighty indeed were the plots which they made, but their plots were (well) within the sight of Allah, even though they were such as to shake the hills!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Never think that Allah would fail his messengers in His promise: for Allah is Exalted in power, - the Lord of Retribution.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: One day the earth will be changed to a different earth, and so will be the heavens, and (men) will be marshalled forth, before Allah, the One, the Irresistible;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And thou wilt see the sinners that day bound together in fetters;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: That Allah may requite each soul according to its deserts; and verily Allah is swift in calling to account.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Here is a Message for mankind: Let them take warning therefrom, and let them know that He is (no other than) One Allah: let men of understanding take heed.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: A. L. R. These are the Ayats of Revelation,- of a Qur'an that makes things clear.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Again and again will those who disbelieve, wish that they had bowed (to Allah's will) in Islam.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Never did We destroy a population that had not a term decreed and assigned beforehand.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They say: "O thou to whom the Message is being revealed! truly thou art mad (or possessed)!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Why bringest thou not angels to us if it be that thou hast the Truth?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: We have, without doubt, sent down the Message; and We will assuredly guard it (from corruption).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We did send messengers before thee amongst the religious sects of old:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Even so do we let it creep into the hearts of the sinners -
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They would only say: "Our eyes have been intoxicated: Nay, we have been bewitched by sorcery."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: It is We Who have set out the zodiacal signs in the heavens, and made them fair-seeming to (all) beholders;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And (moreover) We have guarded them from every cursed devil:
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And the earth We have spread out (like a carpet); set thereon mountains firm and immovable; and produced therein all kinds of things in due balance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And We have provided therein means of subsistence,- for you and for those for whose sustenance ye are not responsible.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And there is not a thing but its (sources and) treasures (inexhaustible) are with Us; but We only send down thereof in due and ascertainable measures.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And verily, it is We Who give life, and Who give death: it is We Who remain inheritors (after all else passes away).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: To Us are known those of you who hasten forward, and those who lag behind.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Assuredly it is thy Lord Who will gather them together: for He is perfect in Wisdom and Knowledge.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We created man from sounding clay, from mud moulded into shape;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And the Jinn race, We had created before, from the fire of a scorching wind.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! what is your reason for not being among those who prostrated themselves?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here; for thou art rejected, accursed.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are raised."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Allah) said: "Respite is granted thee
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "For over My servants no authority shalt thou have, except such as put themselves in the wrong and follow thee."
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And verily, Hell is the promised abode for them all!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The righteous (will be) amid gardens and fountains (of clear-flowing water).
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And We shall remove from their hearts any lurking sense of injury: (they will be) brothers (joyfully) facing each other on thrones (of dignity).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Tell My servants that I am indeed the Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: Tell them about the guests of Abraham.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They said: "Fear not! We give thee glad tidings of a son endowed with wisdom."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They said: "We give thee glad tidings in truth: be not then in despair!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord, but such as go astray?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Excepting the adherents of Lut: them we are certainly (charged) to save (from harm),- All -
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Then travel by night with thy household, when a portion of the night (yet remains), and do thou bring up the rear: let no one amongst you look back, but pass on whither ye are ordered."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Lut said: "These are my guests: disgrace me not:
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And the Companions of the Wood were also wrong-doers;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: The Companions of the Rocky Tract also rejected the messengers:
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But the (mighty) Blast seized them of a morning,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We created not the heavens, the earth, and all between them, but for just ends. And the Hour is surely coming (when this will be manifest). So overlook (any human faults) with gracious forgiveness.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And We have bestowed upon thee the Seven Oft-repeated (verses) and the Grand Qur'an.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Strain not thine eyes. (Wistfully) at what We have bestowed on certain classes of them, nor grieve over them: but lower thy wing (in gentleness) to the believers.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Therefore, by the Lord, We will, of a surety, call them to account,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Therefore expound openly what thou art commanded, and turn away from those who join false gods with Allah.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: For sufficient are We unto thee against those who scoff,-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But celebrate the praises of thy Lord, and be of those who prostrate themselves in adoration.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And serve thy Lord until there come unto thee the Hour that is Certain.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Inevitable) cometh (to pass) the Command of Allah: seek ye not then to hasten it: Glory to Him, and far is He above having the partners they ascribe unto Him!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He doth send down His angels with inspiration of His Command, to such of His servants as He pleaseth, (saying): "Warn (Man) that there is no god but I: so do your duty unto Me."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He has created the heavens and the earth for just ends: Far is He above having the partners they ascribe to Him!
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: He has created man from a sperm-drop; and behold this same (man) becomes an open disputer!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And cattle He has created for you (men): from them ye derive warmth, and numerous benefits, and of their (meat) ye eat.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And they carry your heavy loads to lands that ye could not (otherwise) reach except with souls distressed: for your Lord is indeed Most Kind, Most Merciful,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And (He has created) horses, mules, and donkeys, for you to ride and use for show; and He has created (other) things of which ye have no knowledge.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And unto Allah leads straight the Way, but there are ways that turn aside: if Allah had willed, He could have guided all of you.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is He who sends down rain from the sky: from it ye drink, and out of it (grows) the vegetation on which ye feed your cattle.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: He has made subject to you the Night and the Day; the sun and the moon; and the stars are in subjection by His Command: verily in this are Signs for men who are wise.
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: And the things on this earth which He has multiplied in varying colours (and qualities): verily in this is a sign for men who celebrate the praises of Allah (in gratitude).
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is He Who has made the sea subject, that ye may eat thereof flesh that is fresh and tender, and that ye may extract therefrom ornaments to wear; and thou seest the ships therein that plough the waves, that ye may seek (thus) of the bounty of Allah and that ye may be grateful.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And He has set up on the earth mountains standing firm, lest it should shake with you; and rivers and roads; that ye may guide yourselves;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Is then He Who creates like one that creates not? Will ye not receive admonition?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: If ye would count up the favours of Allah, never would ye be able to number them: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And Allah doth know what ye conceal, and what ye reveal.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those whom they invoke besides Allah create nothing and are themselves created.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: (They are things) dead, lifeless: nor do they know when they will be raised up.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Your Allah is one Allah: as to those who believe not in the Hereafter, their hearts refuse to know, and they are arrogant.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Undoubtedly Allah doth know what they conceal, and what they reveal: verily He loveth not the arrogant.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: When it is said to them, "What is it that your Lord has revealed?" they say, "Tales of the ancients!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Let them bear, on the Day of Judgment, their own burdens in full, and also (something) of the burdens of those without knowledge, whom they misled. Alas, how grievous the burdens they will bear!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those before them did also plot (against Allah's Way): but Allah took their structures from their foundations, and the roof fell down on them from above; and the Wrath seized them from directions they did not perceive.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Then, on the Day of Judgment, He will cover them with shame, and say: "Where are My 'partners' concerning whom ye used to dispute (with the godly)?" Those endued with knowledge will say: "This Day, indeed, are the Unbelievers covered with shame and misery,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: "(Namely) those whose lives the angels take in a state of wrong-doing to their own souls." Then would they offer submission (with the pretence), "We did no evil (knowingly)." (The angels will reply), "Nay, but verily Allah knoweth all that ye did;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "So enter the gates of Hell, to dwell therein. Thus evil indeed is the abode of the arrogant."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: To the righteous (when) it is said, "What is it that your Lord has revealed?" they say, "All that is good." To those who do good, there is good in this world, and the Home of the Hereafter is even better and excellent indeed is the Home of the righteous,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Gardens of Eternity which they will enter: beneath them flow (pleasant) rivers: they will have therein all that they wish: thus doth Allah reward the righteous,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Namely) those whose lives the angels take in a state of purity, saying (to them), "Peace be on you; enter ye the Garden, because of (the good) which ye did (in the world)."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Do the (ungodly) wait until the angels come to them, or there comes the Command of thy Lord (for their doom)? So did those who went before them. But Allah wronged them not: nay, they wronged their own souls.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But the evil results of their deeds overtook them, and that very (Wrath) at which they had scoffed hemmed them in.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: The worshippers of false gods say: "If Allah had so willed, we should not have worshipped aught but Him - neither we nor our fathers,- nor should we have prescribed prohibitions other than His." So did those who went before them. But what is the mission of messengers but to preach the Clear Message?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: For We assuredly sent amongst every People a messenger, (with the Command), "Serve Allah, and eschew Evil": of the People were some whom Allah guided, and some on whom error became inevitably (established). So travel through the earth, and see what was the end of those who denied (the Truth).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They swear their strongest oaths by Allah, that Allah will not raise up those who die: Nay, but it is a promise (binding) on Him in truth: but most among mankind realise it not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (They must be raised up), in order that He may manifest to them the truth of that wherein they differ, and that the rejecters of Truth may realise that they had indeed (surrendered to) Falsehood.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: For to anything which We have willed, We but say the word, "Be", and it is.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: To those who leave their homes in the cause of Allah, after suffering oppression,- We will assuredly give a goodly home in this world; but truly the reward of the Hereafter will be greater. If they only realised (this)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (They are) those who persevere in patience, and put their trust on their Lord.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And before thee also the messengers We sent were but men, to whom We granted inspiration: if ye realise this not, ask of those who possess the Message.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: (We sent them) with Clear Signs and Books of dark prophecies; and We have sent down unto thee (also) the Message; that thou mayest explain clearly to men what is sent for them, and that they may give thought.
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Do then those who devise evil (plots) feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them up, or that the Wrath will not seize them from directions they little perceive?-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Or that He may not call them to account in the midst of their goings to and fro, without a chance of their frustrating Him?-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Or that He may not call them to account by a process of slow wastage - for thy Lord is indeed full of kindness and mercy.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Do they not look at Allah's creation, (even) among (inanimate) things,- How their (very) shadows turn round, from the right and the left, prostrating themselves to Allah, and that in the humblest manner?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And to Allah doth obeisance all that is in the heavens and on earth, whether moving (living) creatures or the angels: for none are arrogant (before their Lord).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: They all revere their Lord, high above them, and they do all that they are commanded.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Allah has said: "Take not (for worship) two gods: for He is just One Allah: then fear Me (and Me alone)."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and on earth, and to Him is duty due always: then will ye fear other than Allah?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And ye have no good thing but is from Allah: and moreover, when ye are touched by distress, unto Him ye cry with groans;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (As if) to show their ingratitude for the favours we have bestowed on them! then enjoy (your brief day): but soon will ye know (your folly)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And they (even) assign, to things they do not know, a portion out of that which We have bestowed for their sustenance! By Allah, ye shall certainly be called to account for your false inventions.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: When news is brought to one of them, of (the birth of) a female (child), his face darkens, and he is filled with inward grief!
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: To those who believe not in the Hereafter, applies the similitude of evil: to Allah applies the highest similitude: for He is the Exalted in Power, full of Wisdom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If Allah were to punish men for their wrong-doing, He would not leave, on the (earth), a single living creature: but He gives them respite for a stated Term: When their Term expires, they would not be able to delay (the punishment) for a single hour, just as they would not be able to anticipate it (for a single hour).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: They attribute to Allah what they hate (for themselves), and their tongues assert the falsehood that all good things are for themselves: without doubt for them is the Fire, and they will be the first to be hastened on into it!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: By Allah, We (also) sent (Our messengers) to Peoples before thee; but Satan made, (to the wicked), their own acts seem alluring: He is also their patron today, but they shall have a most grievous penalty.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And We sent down the Book to thee for the express purpose, that thou shouldst make clear to them those things in which they differ, and that it should be a guide and a mercy to those who believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And Allah sends down rain from the skies, and gives therewith life to the earth after its death: verily in this is a Sign for those who listen.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And verily in cattle (too) will ye find an instructive sign. From what is within their bodies between excretions and blood, We produce, for your drink, milk, pure and agreeable to those who drink it.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And thy Lord taught the Bee to build its cells in hills, on trees, and in (men's) habitations;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Then to eat of all the produce (of the earth), and find with skill the spacious paths of its Lord: there issues from within their bodies a drink of varying colours, wherein is healing for men: verily in this is a Sign for those who give thought.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: It is Allah who creates you and takes your souls at death; and of you there are some who are sent back to a feeble age, so that they know nothing after having known (much): for Allah is All-Knowing, All-Powerful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Allah has bestowed His gifts of sustenance more freely on some of you than on others: those more favoured are not going to throw back their gifts to those whom their right hands possess, so as to be equal in that respect. Will they then deny the favours of Allah?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And Allah has made for you mates (and companions) of your own nature, and made for you, out of them, sons and daughters and grandchildren, and provided for you sustenance of the best: will they then believe in vain things, and be ungrateful for Allah's favours?-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And worship others than Allah,- such as have no power of providing them, for sustenance, with anything in heavens or earth, and cannot possibly have such power?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Invent not similitudes for Allah: for Allah knoweth, and ye know not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Allah sets forth the Parable (of two men: one) a slave under the dominion of another; He has no power of any sort; and (the other) a man on whom We have bestowed goodly favours from Ourselves, and he spends thereof (freely), privately and publicly: are the two equal? (By no means;) praise be to Allah. But most of them understand not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Allah sets forth (another) Parable of two men: one of them dumb, with no power of any sort; a wearisome burden is he to his master; whichever way be directs him, he brings no good: is such a man equal with one who commands Justice, and is on a Straight Way?
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: To Allah belongeth the Mystery of the heavens and the earth. And the Decision of the Hour (of Judgment) is as the twingkling of an eye, or even quicker: for Allah hath power over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is He Who brought you forth from the wombs of your mothers when ye knew nothing; and He gave you hearing and sight and intelligence and affections: that ye may give thanks (to Allah).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Do they not look at the birds, held poised in the midst of (the air and) the sky? Nothing holds them up but (the power of) Allah. Verily in this are signs for those who believe.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is Allah Who made your habitations homes of rest and quiet for you; and made for you, out of the skins of animals, (tents for) dwellings, which ye find so light (and handy) when ye travel and when ye stop (in your travels); and out of their wool, and their soft fibres (between wool and hair), and their hair, rich stuff and articles of convenience (to serve you) for a time.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is Allah Who made out of the things He created, some things to give you shade; of the hills He made some for your shelter; He made you garments to protect you from heat, and coats of mail to protect you from your (mutual) violence. Thus does He complete His favours on you, that ye may bow to His Will (in Islam).
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: But if they turn away, thy duty is only to preach the clear Message.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They recognise the favours of Allah; then they deny them; and most of them are (creatures) ungrateful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: When the wrong-doers (actually) see the Penalty, then will it in no way be mitigated, nor will they then receive respite.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When those who gave partners to Allah will see their "partners", they will say: "Our Lord! these are our 'partners,' those whom we used to invoke besides Thee." But they will throw back their word at them (and say): "Indeed ye are liars!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: That Day shall they (openly) show (their) submission to Allah; and all their inventions shall leave them in the lurch.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Those who reject Allah and hinder (men) from the Path of Allah - for them will We add Penalty to Penalty; for that they used to spread mischief.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: One day We shall raise from all Peoples a witness against them, from amongst themselves: and We shall bring thee as a witness against these (thy people): and We have sent down to thee the Book explaining all things, a Guide, a Mercy, and Glad Tidings to Muslims.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Allah commands justice, the doing of good, and liberality to kith and kin, and He forbids all shameful deeds, and injustice and rebellion: He instructs you, that ye may receive admonition.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Fulfil the Covenant of Allah when ye have entered into it, and break not your oaths after ye have confirmed them; indeed ye have made Allah your surety; for Allah knoweth all that ye do.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And be not like a woman who breaks into untwisted strands the yarn which she has spun, after it has become strong. Nor take your oaths to practise deception between yourselves, lest one party should be more numerous than another: for Allah will test you by this; and on the Day of Judgment He will certainly make clear to you (the truth of) that wherein ye disagree.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: If Allah so willed, He could make you all one people: But He leaves straying whom He pleases, and He guides whom He pleases: but ye shall certainly be called to account for all your actions.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And take not your oaths, to practise deception between yourselves, with the result that someone's foot may slip after it was firmly planted, and ye may have to taste the evil (consequences) of having hindered (men) from the Path of Allah, and a Mighty Wrath descend on you.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Nor sell the covenant of Allah for a miserable price: for with Allah is (a prize) far better for you, if ye only knew.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: What is with you must vanish: what is with Allah will endure. And We will certainly bestow, on those who patiently persevere, their reward according to the best of their actions.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Whoever works righteousness, man or woman, and has Faith, verily, to him will We give a new Life, a life that is good and pure and We will bestow on such their reward according to the best of their actions.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: When thou dost read the Qur'an, seek Allah's protection from Satan the rejected one.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: No authority has he over those who believe and put their trust in their Lord.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Say, the Holy Spirit has brought the revelation from thy Lord in Truth, in order to strengthen those who believe, and as a Guide and Glad Tidings to Muslims.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those who believe not in the Signs of Allah,- Allah will not guide them, and theirs will be a grievous Penalty.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: It is those who believe not in the Signs of Allah, that forge falsehood: it is they who lie!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Any one who, after accepting faith in Allah, utters Unbelief,- except under compulsion, his heart remaining firm in Faith - but such as open their breast to Unbelief, on them is Wrath from Allah, and theirs will be a dreadful Penalty.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: This because they love the life of this world better than the Hereafter: and Allah will not guide those who reject Faith.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Without doubt, in the Hereafter they will perish.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But verily thy Lord,- to those who leave their homes after trials and persecutions,- and who thereafter strive and fight for the faith and patiently persevere,- Thy Lord, after all this is oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: One Day every soul will come up struggling for itself, and every soul will be recompensed (fully) for all its actions, and none will be unjustly dealt with.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Allah sets forth a Parable: a city enjoying security and quiet, abundantly supplied with sustenance from every place: Yet was it ungrateful for the favours of Allah: so Allah made it taste of hunger and terror (in extremes) (closing in on it) like a garment (from every side), because of the (evil) which (its people) wrought.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And there came to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they falsely rejected him; so the Wrath seized them even in the midst of their iniquities.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: So eat of the sustenance which Allah has provided for you, lawful and good; and be grateful for the favours of Allah, if it is He Whom ye serve.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: He has only forbidden you dead meat, and blood, and the flesh of swine, and any (food) over which the name of other than Allah has been invoked. But if one is forced by necessity, without wilful disobedience, nor transgressing due limits,- then Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But say not - for any false thing that your tongues may put forth,- "This is lawful, and this is forbidden," so as to ascribe false things to Allah. For those who ascribe false things to Allah, will never prosper.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: To the Jews We prohibited such things as We have mentioned to thee before: We did them no wrong, but they were used to doing wrong to themselves.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: But verily thy Lord,- to those who do wrong in ignorance, but who thereafter repent and make amends,- thy Lord, after all this, is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Abraham was indeed a model, devoutly obedient to Allah, (and) true in Faith, and he joined not gods with Allah:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He showed his gratitude for the favours of Allah, who chose him, and guided him to a Straight Way.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We gave him Good in this world, and he will be, in the Hereafter, in the ranks of the Righteous.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So We have taught thee the inspired (Message), "Follow the ways of Abraham the True in Faith, and he joined not gods with Allah."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: The Sabbath was only made (strict) for those who disagreed (as to its observance); But Allah will judge between them on the Day of Judgment, as to their differences.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Invite (all) to the Way of thy Lord with wisdom and beautiful preaching; and argue with them in ways that are best and most gracious: for thy Lord knoweth best, who have strayed from His Path, and who receive guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And if ye do catch them out, catch them out no worse than they catch you out: But if ye show patience, that is indeed the best (course) for those who are patient.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: For Allah is with those who restrain themselves, and those who do good.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Glory to (Allah) Who did take His servant for a Journey by night from the Sacred Mosque to the farthest Mosque, whose precincts We did bless,- in order that We might show him some of Our Signs: for He is the One Who heareth and seeth (all things).
Label: ['makkah']

Text: We gave Moses the Book, and made it a Guide to the Children of Israel, (commanding): "Take not other than Me as Disposer of (your) affairs."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: O ye that are sprung from those whom We carried (in the Ark) with Noah! Verily he was a devotee most grateful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: If ye did well, ye did well for yourselves; if ye did evil, (ye did it) against yourselves. So when the second of the warnings came to pass, (We permitted your enemies) to disfigure your faces, and to enter your Temple as they had entered it before, and to visit with destruction all that fell into their power.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: It may be that your Lord may (yet) show Mercy unto you; but if ye revert (to your sins), We shall revert (to Our punishments): And we have made Hell a prison for those who reject (all Faith).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily this Qur'an doth guide to that which is most right (or stable), and giveth the Glad Tidings to the Believers who work deeds of righteousness, that they shall have a magnificent reward;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And to those who believe not in the Hereafter, (it announceth) that We have prepared for them a Penalty Grievous (indeed).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: The prayer that man should make for good, he maketh for evil; for man is given to hasty (deeds).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Every man's fate We have fastened on his own neck: On the Day of Judgment We shall bring out for him a scroll, which he will see spread open.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Who receiveth guidance, receiveth it for his own benefit: who goeth astray doth so to his own loss: No bearer of burdens can bear the burden of another: nor would We visit with Our Wrath until We had sent an messenger (to give warning).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: When We decide to destroy a population, We (first) send a definite order to those among them who are given the good things of this life and yet transgress; so that the word is proved true against them: then (it is) We destroy them utterly.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: How many generations have We destroyed after Noah? and enough is thy Lord to note and see the sins of His servants.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If any do wish for the transitory things (of this life), We readily grant them - such things as We will, to such person as We will: in the end have We provided Hell for them: they will burn therein, disgraced and rejected.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those who do wish for the (things of) the Hereafter, and strive therefor with all due striving, and have Faith,- they are the ones whose striving is acceptable (to Allah).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Of the bounties of thy Lord We bestow freely on all- These as well as those: The bounties of thy Lord are not closed (to anyone).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: See how We have bestowed more on some than on others; but verily the Hereafter is more in rank and gradation and more in excellence.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Take not with Allah another object of worship; or thou (O man!) wilt sit in disgrace and destitution.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Thy Lord hath decreed that ye worship none but Him, and that ye be kind to parents. Whether one or both of them attain old age in thy life, say not to them a word of contempt, nor repel them, but address them in terms of honour.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Your Lord knoweth best what is in your hearts: If ye do deeds of righteousness, verily He is Most Forgiving to those who turn to Him again and again (in true penitence).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: And render to the kindred their due rights, as (also) to those in want, and to the wayfarer: But squander not (your wealth) in the manner of a spendthrift.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Verily spendthrifts are brothers of the Evil Ones; and the Evil One is to his Lord (himself) ungrateful.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And even if thou hast to turn away from them in pursuit of the Mercy from thy Lord which thou dost expect, yet speak to them a word of easy kindness.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Make not thy hand tied (like a niggard's) to thy neck, nor stretch it forth to its utmost reach, so that thou become blameworthy and destitute.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily thy Lord doth provide sustenance in abundance for whom He pleaseth, and He provideth in a just measure. For He doth know and regard all His servants.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Kill not your children for fear of want: We shall provide sustenance for them as well as for you. Verily the killing of them is a great sin.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Nor come nigh to adultery: for it is a shameful (deed) and an evil, opening the road (to other evils).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Nor take life - which Allah has made sacred - except for just cause. And if anyone is slain wrongfully, we have given his heir authority (to demand qisas or to forgive): but let him not exceed bounds in the matter of taking life; for he is helped (by the Law).
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Come not nigh to the orphan's property except to improve it, until he attains the age of full strength; and fulfil (every) engagement, for (every) engagement will be enquired into (on the Day of Reckoning).
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Give full measure when ye measure, and weigh with a balance that is straight: that is the most fitting and the most advantageous in the final determination.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And pursue not that of which thou hast no knowledge; for every act of hearing, or of seeing or of (feeling in) the heart will be enquired into (on the Day of Reckoning).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Nor walk on the earth with insolence: for thou canst not rend the earth asunder, nor reach the mountains in height.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Of all such things the evil is hateful in the sight of thy Lord.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: These are among the (precepts of) wisdom, which thy Lord has revealed to thee. Take not, with Allah, another object of worship, lest thou shouldst be thrown into Hell, blameworthy and rejected.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Has then your Lord (O Pagans!) preferred for you sons, and taken for Himself daughters among the angels? Truly ye utter a most dreadful saying!
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: We have explained (things) in various (ways) in this Qur'an, in order that they may receive admonition, but it only increases their flight (from the Truth)!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: If there had been (other) gods with Him, as they say,- behold, they would certainly have sought out a way to the Lord of the Throne!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: The seven heavens and the earth, and all beings therein, declare His glory: there is not a thing but celebrates His praise; And yet ye understand not how they declare His glory! Verily He is Oft-Forbear, Most Forgiving!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: When thou dost recite the Qur'an, We put, between thee and those who believe not in the Hereafter, a veil invisible:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We put coverings over their hearts (and minds) lest they should understand the Qur'an, and deafness into their ears: when thou dost commemorate thy Lord and Him alone in the Qur'an, they turn on their backs, fleeing (from the Truth).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We know best why it is they listen, when they listen to thee; and when they meet in private conference, behold, the wicked say, "Ye follow none other than a man bewitched!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "(Nay!) be ye stones or iron,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Or created matter which, in your minds, is hardest (to be raised up),- (Yet shall ye be raised up)!" then will they say: "Who will cause us to return?" Say: "He who created you first!" Then will they wag their heads towards thee, and say, "When will that be?" Say, "May be it will be quite soon!
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "It will be on a Day when He will call you, and ye will answer (His call) with (words of) His praise, and ye will think that ye tarried but a little while!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Say to My servants that they should (only) say those things that are best: for Satan doth sow dissensions among them: For Satan is to man an avowed enemy.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is your Lord that knoweth you best: If He please, He granteth you mercy, or if He please, punishment: We have not sent thee to be a disposer of their affairs for them.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And it is your Lord that knoweth best all beings that are in the heavens and on earth: We did bestow on some prophets more (and other) gifts than on others: and We gave to David (the gift of) the Psalms.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Say: "Call on those - besides Him - whom ye fancy: they have neither the power to remove your troubles from you nor to change them."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Those whom they call upon do desire (for themselves) means of access to their Lord, - even those who are nearest: they hope for His Mercy and fear His Wrath: for the Wrath of thy Lord is something to take heed of.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: There is not a population but We shall destroy it before the Day of Judgment or punish it with a dreadful Penalty: that is written in the (eternal) Record.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And We refrain from sending the signs, only because the men of former generations treated them as false: We sent the she-camel to the Thamud to open their eyes, but they treated her wrongfully: We only send the Signs by way of terror (and warning from evil).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold! We told thee that thy Lord doth encompass mankind round about: We granted the vision which We showed thee, but as a trial for men,- as also the Cursed Tree (mentioned) in the Qur'an: We put terror (and warning) into them, but it only increases their inordinate transgression!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold! We said to the angels: "Bow down unto Adam": They bowed down except Iblis: He said, "Shall I bow down to one whom Thou didst create from clay?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: He said: "Seest Thou? this is the one whom Thou hast honoured above me! If Thou wilt but respite me to the Day of Judgment, I will surely bring his descendants under my sway - all but a few!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Lead to destruction those whom thou canst among them, with thy (seductive) voice; make assaults on them with thy cavalry and thy infantry; mutually share with them wealth and children; and make promises to them." But Satan promises them nothing but deceit.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Your Lord is He That maketh the Ship go smoothly for you through the sea, in order that ye may seek of his Bounty. For he is unto you most Merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: When distress seizes you at sea, those that ye call upon - besides Himself - leave you in the lurch! but when He brings you back safe to land, ye turn away (from Him). Most ungrateful is man!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Do ye then feel secure that He will not cause you to be swallowed up beneath the earth when ye are on land, or that He will not send against you a violent tornado (with showers of stones) so that ye shall find no one to carry out your affairs for you?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Or do ye feel secure that He will not send you back a second time to sea and send against you a heavy gale to drown you because of your ingratitude, so that ye find no helper. Therein against Us?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We have honoured the sons of Adam; provided them with transport on land and sea; given them for sustenance things good and pure; and conferred on them special favours, above a great part of our creation.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: One day We shall call together all human beings with their (respective) Imams: those who are given their record in their right hand will read it (with pleasure), and they will not be dealt with unjustly in the least.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But those who were blind in this world, will be blind in the hereafter, and most astray from the Path.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And their purpose was to tempt thee away from that which We had revealed unto thee, to substitute in our name something quite different; (in that case), behold! they would certainly have made thee (their) friend!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And had We not given thee strength, thou wouldst nearly have inclined to them a little.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: In that case We should have made thee taste an equal portion (of punishment) in this life, and an equal portion in death: and moreover thou wouldst have found none to help thee against Us!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Their purpose was to scare thee off the land, in order to expel thee; but in that case they would not have stayed (therein) after thee, except for a little while.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: (This was Our) way with the messengers We sent before thee: thou wilt find no change in Our ways.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Establish regular prayers - at the sun's decline till the darkness of the night, and the morning prayer and reading: for the prayer and reading in the morning carry their testimony.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: And pray in the small watches of the morning: (it would be) an additional prayer (or spiritual profit) for thee: soon will thy Lord raise thee to a Station of Praise and Glory!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "O my Lord! Let my entry be by the Gate of Truth and Honour, and likewise my exit by the Gate of Truth and Honour; and grant me from Thy Presence an authority to aid (me)."
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: We send down (stage by stage) in the Qur'an that which is a healing and a mercy to those who believe: to the unjust it causes nothing but loss after loss.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Yet when We bestow Our favours on man, he turns away and becomes remote on his side (instead of coming to Us), and when evil seizes him he gives himself up to despair!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "Everyone acts according to his own disposition: But your Lord knows best who it is that is best guided on the Way."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: They ask thee concerning the Spirit (of inspiration). Say: "The Spirit (cometh) by command of my Lord: of knowledge it is only a little that is communicated to you, (O men!)"
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Say: "If the whole of mankind and Jinns were to gather together to produce the like of this Qur'an, they could not produce the like thereof, even if they backed up each other with help and support.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And We have explained to man, in this Qur'an, every kind of similitude: yet the greater part of men refuse (to receive it) except with ingratitude!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: What kept men back from belief when Guidance came to them, was nothing but this: they said, "Has Allah sent a man (like us) to be (His) Messenger?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say, "If there were settled, on earth, angels walking about in peace and quiet, We should certainly have sent them down from the heavens an angel for a messenger."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Enough is Allah for a witness between me and you: for He is well acquainted with His servants, and He sees (all things).
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: It is he whom Allah guides, that is on true Guidance; but he whom He leaves astray - for such wilt thou find no protector besides Him. On the Day of Judgment We shall gather, them together, prone on their faces, blind, dumb, and deaf: their abode will be Hell: every time it shows abatement, We shall increase from them the fierceness of the Fire.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That is their recompense, because they rejected Our signs, and said, "When we are reduced to bones and broken dust, should we really be raised up (to be) a new Creation?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: See they not that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth, has power to create the like of them (anew)? Only He has decreed a term appointed, of which there is no doubt. But the unjust refuse (to receive it) except with ingratitude.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Say: "If ye had control of the Treasures of the Mercy of my Lord, behold, ye would keep them back, for fear of spending them: for man is (every) niggardly!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: To Moses We did give Nine Clear Signs: As the Children of Israel: when he came to them, Pharaoh said to him: "O Moses! I consider thee, indeed, to have been worked upon by sorcery!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Moses said, "Thou knowest well that these things have been sent down by none but the Lord of the heavens and the earth as eye-opening evidence: and I consider thee indeed, O Pharaoh, to be one doomed to destruction!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So he resolved to remove them from the face of the earth: but We did drown him and all who were with him.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We said thereafter to the Children of Israel, "Dwell securely in the land (of promise)": but when the second of the warnings came to pass, We gathered you together in a mingled crowd.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We sent down the (Qur'an) in Truth, and in Truth has it descended: and We sent thee but to give Glad Tidings and to warn (sinners).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (It is) a Qur'an which We have divided (into parts from time to time), in order that thou mightest recite it to men at intervals: We have revealed it by stages.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Whether ye believe in it or not, it is true that those who were given knowledge beforehand, when it is recited to them, fall down on their faces in humble prostration,
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: "And they say: 'Glory to our Lord! Truly has the promise of our Lord been fulfilled!'"
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: They fall down on their faces in tears, and it increases their (earnest) humility.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Say: "Praise be to Allah, who begets no son, and has no partner in (His) dominion: Nor (needs) He any to protect Him from humiliation: yea, magnify Him for His greatness and glory!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Praise be to Allah, Who hath sent to His Servant the Book, and hath allowed therein no Crookedness:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Further, that He may warn those (also) who say, "Allah hath begotten a son":
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: No knowledge have they of such a thing, nor had their fathers. It is a grievous thing that issues from their mouths as a saying what they say is nothing but falsehood!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: That which is on earth we have made but as a glittering show for the earth, in order that We may test them - as to which of them are best in conduct.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold, the youths betook themselves to the Cave: they said, "Our Lord! bestow on us Mercy from Thyself, and dispose of our affair for us in the right way!"
Label: ['invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: We relate to thee their story in truth: they were youths who believed in their Lord, and We advanced them in guidance:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We gave strength to their hearts: Behold, they stood up and said: "Our Lord is the Lord of the heavens and of the earth: never shall we call upon any god other than Him: if we did, we should indeed have uttered an enormity!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "These our people have taken for worship gods other than Him: why do they not bring forward an authority clear (and convincing) for what they do? Who doth more wrong than such as invent a falsehood against Allah?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Thou wouldst have seen the sun, when it rose, declining to the right from their Cave, and when it set, turning away from them to the left, while they lay in the open space in the midst of the Cave. Such are among the Signs of Allah: He whom Allah, guides is rightly guided; but he whom Allah leaves to stray,- for him wilt thou find no protector to lead him to the Right Way.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Such (being their state), we raised them up (from sleep), that they might question each other. Said one of them, "How long have ye stayed (here)?" They said, "We have stayed (perhaps) a day, or part of a day." (At length) they (all) said, "Allah (alone) knows best how long ye have stayed here.... Now send ye then one of you with this money of yours to the town: let him find out which is the best food (to be had) and bring some to you, that (ye may) satisfy your hunger therewith: And let him behave with care and courtesy, and let him not inform any one about you.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Thus did We make their case known to the people, that they might know that the promise of Allah is true, and that there can be no doubt about the Hour of Judgment. Behold, they dispute among themselves as to their affair. (Some) said, "Construct a building over them": Their Lord knows best about them: those who prevailed over their affair said, "Let us surely build a place of worship over them."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (Some) say they were three, the dog being the fourth among them; (others) say they were five, the dog being the sixth,- doubtfully guessing at the unknown; (yet others) say they were seven, the dog being the eighth. Say thou: "My Lord knoweth best their number; It is but few that know their (real case)." Enter not, therefore, into controversies concerning them, except on a matter that is clear, nor consult any of them about (the affair of) the Sleepers.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Nor say of anything, "I shall be sure to do so and so tomorrow"-
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Without adding, "So please Allah!" and call thy Lord to mind when thou forgettest, and say, "I hope that my Lord will guide me ever closer (even) than this to the right road."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Allah knows best how long they stayed: with Him is (the knowledge of) the secrets of the heavens and the earth: how clearly He sees, how finely He hears (everything)! They have no protector other than Him; nor does He share His Command with any person whatsoever.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And recite (and teach) what has been revealed to thee of the Book of thy Lord: none can change His Words, and none wilt thou find as a refuge other than Him.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And keep thy soul content with those who call on their Lord morning and evening, seeking His Face; and let not thine eyes pass beyond them, seeking the pomp and glitter of this Life; no obey any whose heart We have permitted to neglect the remembrance of Us, one who follows his own desires, whose case has gone beyond all bounds.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say, "The truth is from your Lord": Let him who will believe, and let him who will, reject (it): for the wrong-doers We have prepared a Fire whose (smoke and flames), like the walls and roof of a tent, will hem them in: if they implore relief they will be granted water like melted brass, that will scald their faces, how dreadful the drink! How uncomfortable a couch to recline on!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: As to those who believe and work righteousness, verily We shall not suffer to perish the reward of any who do a (single) righteous deed.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: He went into his garden in a state (of mind) unjust to his soul: He said, "I deem not that this will ever perish,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: His companion said to him, in the course of the argument with him: "Dost thou deny Him Who created thee out of dust, then out of a sperm-drop, then fashioned thee into a man?
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "But (I think) for my part that He is Allah, My Lord, and none shall I associate with my Lord.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Why didst thou not, as thou wentest into thy garden, say: 'Allah's will (be done)! There is no power but with Allah!' If thou dost see me less than thee in wealth and sons,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: "Or the water of the garden will run off underground so that thou wilt never be able to find it."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: So his fruits (and enjoyment) were encompassed (with ruin), and he remained twisting and turning his hands over what he had spent on his property, which had (now) tumbled to pieces to its very foundations, and he could only say, "Woe is me! Would I had never ascribed partners to my Lord and Cherisher!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: There, the (only) protection comes from Allah, the True One. He is the Best to reward, and the Best to give success.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Set forth to them the similitude of the life of this world: It is like the rain which we send down from the skies: the earth's vegetation absorbs it, but soon it becomes dry stubble, which the winds do scatter: it is (only) Allah who prevails over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Wealth and sons are allurements of the life of this world: But the things that endure, good deeds, are best in the sight of thy Lord, as rewards, and best as (the foundation for) hopes.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: One Day We shall remove the mountains, and thou wilt see the earth as a level stretch, and We shall gather them, all together, nor shall We leave out any one of them.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And the Book (of Deeds) will be placed (before you); and thou wilt see the sinful in great terror because of what is (recorded) therein; they will say, "Ah! woe to us! what a Book is this! It leaves out nothing small or great, but takes account thereof!" They will find all that they did, placed before them: And not one will thy Lord treat with injustice.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold! We said to the angels, "Bow down to Adam": They bowed down except Iblis. He was one of the Jinns, and he broke the Command of his Lord. Will ye then take him and his progeny as protectors rather than Me? And they are enemies to you! Evil would be the exchange for the wrong-doers!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: I called them not to witness the creation of the heavens and the earth, nor (even) their own creation: nor is it for helpers such as Me to take as lead (men) astray!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: One Day He will say, "Call on those whom ye thought to be My partners," and they will call on them, but they will not listen to them; and We shall make for them a place of common perdition.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And the Sinful shall see the fire and apprehend that they have to fall therein: no means will they find to turn away therefrom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We have explained in detail in this Qur'an, for the benefit of mankind, every kind of similitude: but man is, in most things, contentious.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And what is there to keep back men from believing, now that Guidance has come to them, nor from praying for forgiveness from their Lord, but that (they ask that) the ways of the ancients be repeated with them, or the Wrath be brought to them face to face?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: We only send the messengers to give Glad Tidings and to give warnings: But the unbelievers dispute with vain argument, in order therewith to weaken the truth, and they treat My Signs as a jest, as also the fact that they are warned!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And who doth more wrong than one who is reminded of the Signs of his Lord, but turns away from them, forgetting the (deeds) which his hands have sent forth? Verily We have set veils over their hearts lest they should understand this, and over their ears, deafness, if thou callest them to guidance, even then will they never accept guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But your Lord is Most forgiving, full of Mercy. If He were to call them (at once) to account for what they have earned, then surely He would have hastened their punishment: but they have their appointed time, beyond which they will find no refuge.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: Such were the populations we destroyed when they committed iniquities; but we fixed an appointed time for their destruction.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He replied: "Sawest thou (what happened) when we betook ourselves to the rock? I did indeed forget (about) the Fish: none but Satan made me forget to tell (you) about it: it took its course through the sea in a marvellous way!"
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: So they found one of Our servants, on whom We had bestowed Mercy from Ourselves and whom We had taught knowledge from Our own Presence.
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Moses said: "Thou wilt find me, if Allah so will, (truly) patient: nor shall I disobey thee in aught."
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Then they proceeded: until, when they met a young man, he slew him. Moses said: "Hast thou slain an innocent person who had slain none? Truly a foul (unheard of) thing hast thou done!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "So we desired that their Lord would give them in exchange (a son) better in purity (of conduct) and closer in affection.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Until, when he reached the setting of the sun, he found it set in a spring of murky water: Near it he found a People: We said: "O Zul-qarnain! (thou hast authority,) either to punish them, or to treat them with kindness."
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "Whoever doth wrong, him shall we punish; then shall he be sent back to his Lord; and He will punish him with a punishment unheard-of (before).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "But whoever believes, and works righteousness,- he shall have a goodly reward, and easy will be his task as We order it by our Command."
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: They said: "O Zul-qarnain! the Gog and Magog (People) do great mischief on earth: shall we then render thee tribute in order that thou mightest erect a barrier between us and them?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "This is a mercy from my Lord: But when the promise of my Lord comes to pass, He will make it into dust; and the promise of my Lord is true."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Unbelievers) whose eyes had been under a veil from remembrance of Me, and who had been unable even to hear.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Do the Unbelievers think that they can take My servants as protectors besides Me? Verily We have prepared Hell for the Unbelievers for (their) entertainment.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Those whose efforts have been wasted in this life, while they thought that they were acquiring good by their works?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They are those who deny the Signs of their Lord and the fact of their having to meet Him (in the Hereafter): vain will be their works, nor shall We, on the Day of Judgment, give them any weight.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: That is their reward, Hell, because they rejected Faith, and took My Signs and My Messengers by way of jest.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: As to those who believe and work righteous deeds, they have, for their entertainment, the Gardens of Paradise,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Say: "I am but a man like yourselves, (but) the inspiration has come to me, that your Allah is one Allah: whoever expects to meet his Lord, let him work righteousness, and, in the worship of his Lord, admit no one as partner.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "So (it will be) thy Lord saith, 'that is easy for Me: I did indeed create thee before, when thou hadst been nothing!'"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: So Zakariya came out to his people from him chamber: He told them by signs to celebrate Allah's praises in the morning and in the evening.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: (To his son came the command): "O Yahya! take hold of the Book with might": and We gave him Wisdom even as a youth,
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And piety (for all creatures) as from Us, and purity: He was devout,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And kind to his parents, and he was not overbearing or rebellious.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: So Peace on him the day he was born, the day that he dies, and the day that he will be raised up to life (again)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: She said: "I seek refuge from thee to (Allah) Most Gracious: (come not near) if thou dost fear Allah."
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: He said: "Nay, I am only a messenger from thy Lord, (to announce) to thee the gift of a holy son.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He said: "So (it will be): Thy Lord saith, 'that is easy for Me: and (We wish) to appoint him as a Sign unto men and a Mercy from Us': It is a matter (so) decreed."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So she conceived him, and she retired with him to a remote place.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']
