Text: And the pains of childbirth drove her to the trunk of a palm-tree: She cried (in her anguish): "Ah! would that I had died before this! would that I had been a thing forgotten and out of sight!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "And shake towards thyself the trunk of the palm-tree: It will let fall fresh ripe dates upon thee.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He said: "I am indeed a servant of Allah: He hath given me revelation and made me a prophet;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "And He hath made me blessed wheresoever I be, and hath enjoined on me Prayer and Charity as long as I live;
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: "(He) hath made me kind to my mother, and not overbearing or miserable;
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: "So peace is on me the day I was born, the day that I die, and the day that I shall be raised up to life (again)"!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Such (was) Jesus the son of Mary: (it is) a statement of truth, about which they (vainly) dispute.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: It is not befitting to (the majesty of) Allah that He should beget a son. Glory be to Him! when He determines a matter, He only says to it, "Be", and it is.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Verily Allah is my Lord and your Lord: Him therefore serve ye: this is a Way that is straight.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: But the sects differ among themselves: and woe to the unbelievers because of the (coming) Judgment of a Momentous Day!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: How plainly will they see and hear, the Day that they will appear before Us! but the unjust today are in error manifest!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is We Who will inherit the earth, and all beings thereon: to Us will they all be returned.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Also mention in the Book (the story of) Abraham: He was a man of Truth, a prophet.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "O my father! to me hath come knowledge which hath not reached thee: so follow me: I will guide thee to a way that is even and straight.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: "O my father! serve not Satan: for Satan is a rebel against (Allah) Most Gracious.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "O my father! I fear lest a Penalty afflict thee from (Allah) Most Gracious, so that thou become to Satan a friend."
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: (The father) replied: "Dost thou hate my gods, O Abraham? If thou forbear not, I will indeed stone thee: Now get away from me for a good long while!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Abraham said: "Peace be on thee: I will pray to my Lord for thy forgiveness: for He is to me Most Gracious.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: "And I will turn away from you (all) and from those whom ye invoke besides Allah: I will call on my Lord: perhaps, by my prayer to my Lord, I shall be not unblest."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When he had turned away from them and from those whom they worshipped besides Allah, We bestowed on him Isaac and Jacob, and each one of them We made a prophet.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We bestowed of Our Mercy on them, and We granted them lofty honour on the tongue of truth.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And we called him from the right side of Mount (Sinai), and made him draw near to Us, for mystic (converse).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Also mention in the Book (the story of) Isma'il: He was (strictly) true to what he promised, and he was a messenger (and) a prophet.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: He used to enjoin on his people Prayer and Charity, and he was most acceptable in the sight of his Lord.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Also mention in the Book the case of Idris: He was a man of truth (and sincerity), (and) a prophet:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Those were some of the prophets on whom Allah did bestow His Grace,- of the posterity of Adam, and of those who We carried (in the Ark) with Noah, and of the posterity of Abraham and Israel of those whom We guided and chose. Whenever the Signs of (Allah) Most Gracious were rehearsed to them, they would fall down in prostrate adoration and in tears.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But after them there followed a posterity who missed prayers and followed after lusts soon, then, will they face Destruction,-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Except those who repent and believe, and work righteousness: for these will enter the Garden and will not be wronged in the least,-
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Gardens of Eternity, those which (Allah) Most Gracious has promised to His servants in the Unseen: for His promise must (necessarily) come to pass.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They will not there hear any vain discourse, but only salutations of Peace: And they will have therein their sustenance, morning and evening.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Such is the Garden which We give as an inheritance to those of Our servants who guard against Evil.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: (The angels say:) "We descend not but by command of thy Lord: to Him belongeth what is before us and what is behind us, and what is between: and thy Lord never doth forget,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Lord of the heavens and of the earth, and of all that is between them; so worship Him, and be constant and patient in His worship: knowest thou of any who is worthy of the same Name as He?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Man says: "What! When I am dead, shall I then be raised up alive?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But does not man call to mind that We created him before out of nothing?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: So, by thy Lord, without doubt, We shall gather them together, and (also) the Evil Ones (with them); then shall We bring them forth on their knees round about Hell;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Not one of you but will pass over it: this is, with thy Lord, a Decree which must be accomplished.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But We shall save those who guarded against evil, and We shall leave the wrong-doers therein, (humbled) to their knees.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them, the Unbelievers say to those who believe, "Which of the two sides is best in point of position? Which makes the best show in council?"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But how many (countless) generations before them have we destroyed, who were even better in equipment and in glitter to the eye?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "If any men go astray, (Allah) Most Gracious extends (the rope) to them, until, when they see the warning of Allah (being fulfilled) - either in punishment or in (the approach of) the Hour,- they will at length realise who is worst in position, and (who) weakest in forces!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And Allah doth advance in guidance those who seek guidance: and the things that endure, Good Deeds, are best in the sight of thy Lord, as rewards, and best in respect of (their) eventual return."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And they have taken (for worship) gods other than Allah, to give them power and glory!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Seest thou not that We have set the Evil Ones on against the unbelievers, to incite them with fury?
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: The day We shall gather the righteous to (Allah) Most Gracious, like a band presented before a king for honours,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And We shall drive the sinners to Hell, like thirsty cattle driven down to water,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They say: "(Allah) Most Gracious has begotten a son!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Indeed ye have put forth a thing most monstrous!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: At it the skies are ready to burst, the earth to split asunder, and the mountains to fall down in utter ruin,
Label: ['people_of_the_book', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: That they should invoke a son for (Allah) Most Gracious.
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: For it is not consonant with the majesty of (Allah) Most Gracious that He should beget a son.
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: Not one of the beings in the heavens and the earth but must come to (Allah) Most Gracious as a servant.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He does take an account of them (all), and hath numbered them (all) exactly.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And everyone of them will come to Him singly on the Day of Judgment.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: On those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, will (Allah) Most Gracious bestow love.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: So have We made the (Qur'an) easy in thine own tongue, that with it thou mayest give Glad Tidings to the righteous, and warnings to people given to contention.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But how many (countless) generations before them have We destroyed? Canst thou find a single one of them (now) or hear (so much as) a whisper of them?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We have not sent down the Qur'an to thee to be (an occasion) for thy distress,
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: But only as an admonition to those who fear (Allah),-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: A revelation from Him Who created the earth and the heavens on high.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and on earth, and all between them, and all beneath the soil.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If thou pronounce the word aloud, (it is no matter): for verily He knoweth what is secret and what is yet more hidden.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Allah! there is no god but He! To Him belong the most Beautiful Names.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Has the story of Moses reached thee?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Behold, he saw a fire: So he said to his family, "Tarry ye; I perceive a fire; perhaps I can bring you some burning brand therefrom, or find some guidance at the fire."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Verily I am thy Lord! therefore (in My presence) put off thy shoes: thou art in the sacred valley Tuwa.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Verily, I am Allah: There is no god but I: So serve thou Me (only), and establish regular prayer for celebrating My praise.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: "Verily the Hour is coming - My design is to keep it hidden - for every soul to receive its reward by the measure of its Endeavour.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Therefore let not such as believe not therein but follow their own lusts, divert thee therefrom, lest thou perish!"..
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: (Allah) said, "Seize it, and fear not: We shall return it at once to its former condition"..
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Go thou to Pharaoh, for he has indeed transgressed all bounds."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "And remove the impediment from my speech,
Label: ['invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: "Add to my strength through him,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Behold! We sent to thy mother, by inspiration, the message:
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Behold! thy sister goeth forth and saith, 'shall I show you one who will nurse and rear the (child)?' So We brought thee back to thy mother, that her eye might be cooled and she should not grieve. Then thou didst slay a man, but We saved thee from trouble, and We tried thee in various ways. Then didst thou tarry a number of years with the people of Midian. Then didst thou come hither as ordained, O Moses!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "But speak to him mildly; perchance he may take warning or fear (Allah)."
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "So go ye both to him, and say, 'Verily we are messengers sent by thy Lord: Send forth, therefore, the Children of Israel with us, and afflict them not: with a Sign, indeed, have we come from thy Lord! and peace to all who follow guidance!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: "'Verily it has been revealed to us that the Penalty (awaits) those who reject and turn away.'"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "Our Lord is He Who gave to each (created) thing its form and nature, and further, gave (it) guidance."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "He Who has, made for you the earth like a carpet spread out; has enabled you to go about therein by roads (and channels); and has sent down water from the sky." With it have We produced diverse pairs of plants each separate from the others.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Eat (for yourselves) and pasture your cattle: verily, in this are Signs for men endued with understanding.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: From the (earth) did We create you, and into it shall We return you, and from it shall We bring you out once again.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We showed Pharaoh all Our Signs, but he did reject and refuse.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "Hast thou come to drive us out of our land with thy magic, O Moses?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Moses said to him: Woe to you! Forge not ye a lie against Allah, lest He destroy you (at once) utterly by chastisement: the forger must suffer frustration!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: So they disputed, one with another, over their affair, but they kept their talk secret.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They said: "These two are certainly (expert) magicians: their object is to drive you out from your land with their magic, and to do away with your most cherished institutions.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Therefore concert your plan, and then assemble in (serried) ranks: He wins (all along) today who gains the upper hand."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They said: "Never shall we regard thee as more than the Clear Signs that have come to us, or than Him Who created us! so decree whatever thou desirest to decree: for thou canst only decree (touching) the life of this world.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "For us, we have believed in our Lord: may He forgive us our faults, and the magic to which thou didst compel us: for Allah is Best and Most Abiding."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily he who comes to his Lord as a sinner (at Judgment),- for him is Hell: therein shall he neither die nor live.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But such as come to Him as Believers who have worked righteous deeds,- for them are ranks exalted,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Gardens of Eternity, beneath which flow rivers: they will dwell therein for aye: such is the reward of those who purify themselves (from evil).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Pharaoh led his people astray instead of leading them aright.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O ye Children of Israel! We delivered you from your enemy, and We made a Covenant with you on the right side of Mount (Sinai), and We sent down to you Manna and quails:
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: (Saying): "Eat of the good things We have provided for your sustenance, but commit no excess therein, lest My Wrath should justly descend on you: and those on whom descends My Wrath do perish indeed!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "But, without doubt, I am (also) He that forgives again and again, to those who repent, believe, and do right, who,- in fine, are ready to receive true guidance."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: (Allah) said: "We have tested thy people in thy absence: the Samiri has led them astray."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: So Moses returned to his people in a state of indignation and sorrow. He said: "O my people! did not your Lord make a handsome promise to you? Did then the promise seem to you long (in coming)? Or did ye desire that Wrath should descend from your Lord on you, and so ye broke your promise to me?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Then he brought out (of the fire) before the (people) the image of a calf: It seemed to low: so they said: This is your god, and the god of Moses, but (Moses) has forgotten!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Aaron had already, before this said to them: "O my people! ye are being tested in this: for verily your Lord is (Allah) Most Gracious; so follow me and obey my command."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: (Moses) said: "O Aaron! what kept thee back, when thou sawest them going wrong,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But the god of you all is the One Allah: there is no god but He: all things He comprehends in His knowledge.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If any do turn away therefrom, verily they will bear a burden on the Day of judgment;
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They will abide in this (state): and grievous will the burden be to them on that Day,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Day when the Trumpet will be sounded: that Day, We shall gather the sinful, blear-eyed (with terror).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They ask thee concerning the Mountains: say, "My Lord will uproot them and scatter them as dust;
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: On that Day will they follow the Caller (straight): no crookedness (can they show) him: all sounds shall humble themselves in the Presence of (Allah) Most Gracious: nothing shalt thou hear but the tramp of their feet (as they march).
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: He knows what (appears to His creatures as) before or after or behind them: but they shall not compass it with their knowledge.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (All) faces shall be humbled before (Him) - the Living, the Self-Subsisting, Eternal: hopeless indeed will be the man that carries iniquity (on his back).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But he who works deeds of righteousness, and has faith, will have no fear of harm nor of any curtailment (of what is his due).
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Thus have We sent this down - an arabic Qur'an - and explained therein in detail some of the warnings, in order that they may fear Allah, or that it may cause their remembrance (of Him).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: High above all is Allah, the King, the Truth! Be not in haste with the Qur'an before its revelation to thee is completed, but say, "O my Lord! advance me in knowledge."
Label: ['invocations_in_the_quran', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: We had already, beforehand, taken the covenant of Adam, but he forgot: and We found on his part no firm resolve.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When We said to the angels, "Prostrate yourselves to Adam", they prostrated themselves, but not Iblis: he refused.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Nor to suffer from thirst, nor from the sun's heat."
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: In the result, they both ate of the tree, and so their nakedness appeared to them: they began to sew together, for their covering, leaves from the Garden: thus did Adam disobey his Lord, and allow himself to be seduced.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But his Lord chose him (for His Grace): He turned to him, and gave him Guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He said: "Get ye down, both of you,- all together, from the Garden, with enmity one to another: but if, as is sure, there comes to you Guidance from Me, whosoever follows My Guidance, will not lose his way, nor fall into misery.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "But whosoever turns away from My Message, verily for him is a life narrowed down, and We shall raise him up blind on the Day of Judgment."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He will say: "O my Lord! why hast Thou raised me up blind, while I had sight (before)?"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: (Allah) will say: "Thus didst Thou, when Our Signs came unto thee, disregard them: so wilt thou, this day, be disregarded."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And thus do We recompense him who transgresses beyond bounds and believes not in the Signs of his Lord: and the Penalty of the Hereafter is far more grievous and more enduring.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Is it not a warning to such men (to call to mind) how many generations before them We destroyed, in whose haunts they (now) move? Verily, in this are Signs for men endued with understanding.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Therefore be patient with what they say, and celebrate (constantly) the praises of thy Lord, before the rising of the sun, and before its setting; yea, celebrate them for part of the hours of the night, and at the sides of the day: that thou mayest have (spiritual) joy.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Nor strain thine eyes in longing for the things We have given for enjoyment to parties of them, the splendour of the life of this world, through which We test them: but the provision of thy Lord is better and more enduring.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Enjoin prayer on thy people, and be constant therein. We ask thee not to provide sustenance: We provide it for thee. But the (fruit of) the Hereafter is for righteousness.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And if We had inflicted on them a penalty before this, they would have said: "Our Lord! If only Thou hadst sent us a messenger, we should certainly have followed Thy Signs before we were humbled and put to shame."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Each one (of us) is waiting: wait ye, therefore, and soon shall ye know who it is that is on the straight and even way, and who it is that has received Guidance."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Closer and closer to mankind comes their Reckoning: yet they heed not and they turn away.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Their hearts toying as with trifles. The wrong-doers conceal their private counsels, (saying), "Is this (one) more than a man like yourselves? Will ye go to witchcraft with your eyes open?"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "My Lord knoweth (every) word (spoken) in the heavens and on earth: He is the One that heareth and knoweth (all things)."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Nay," they say, "(these are) medleys of dream! - Nay, He forged it! - Nay, He is (but) a poet! Let him then bring us a Sign like the ones that were sent to (Prophets) of old!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: (As to those) before them, not one of the populations which We destroyed believed: will these believe?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Before thee, also, the messengers We sent were but men, to whom We granted inspiration: If ye realise this not, ask of those who possess the Message.
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: Nor did We give them bodies that ate no food, nor were they exempt from death.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: In the end We fulfilled to them Our Promise, and We saved them and those whom We pleased, but We destroyed those who transgressed beyond bounds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: We have revealed for you (O men!) a book in which is a Message for you: will ye not then understand?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They said: "Ah! woe to us! We were indeed wrong-doers!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Not for (idle) sport did We create the heavens and the earth and all that is between!
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: If it had been Our wish to take (just) a pastime, We should surely have taken it from the things nearest to Us, if We would do (such a thing)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nay, We hurl the Truth against falsehood, and it knocks out its brain, and behold, falsehood doth perish! Ah! woe be to you for the (false) things ye ascribe (to Us).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: To Him belong all (creatures) in the heavens and on earth: Even those who are in His (very) Presence are not too proud to serve Him, nor are they (ever) weary (of His service):
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Or have they taken (for worship) gods from the earth who can raise (the dead)?
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: If there were, in the heavens and the earth, other gods besides Allah, there would have been confusion in both! but glory to Allah, the Lord of the Throne: (High is He) above what they attribute to Him!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He cannot be questioned for His acts, but they will be questioned (for theirs).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Or have they taken for worship (other) gods besides him? Say, "Bring your convincing proof: this is the Message of those with me and the Message of those before me." But most of them know not the Truth, and so turn away.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Not a messenger did We send before thee without this inspiration sent by Us to him: that there is no god but I; therefore worship and serve Me.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And they say: "(Allah) Most Gracious has begotten offspring." Glory to Him! they are (but) servants raised to honour.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: He knows what is before them, and what is behind them, and they offer no intercession except for those who are acceptable, and they stand in awe and reverence of His (Glory).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: If any of them should say, "I am a god besides Him", such a one We should reward with Hell: thus do We reward those who do wrong.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Do not the Unbelievers see that the heavens and the earth were joined together (as one unit of creation), before we clove them asunder? We made from water every living thing. Will they not then believe?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We have set on the earth mountains standing firm, lest it should shake with them, and We have made therein broad highways (between mountains) for them to pass through: that they may receive Guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And We have made the heavens as a canopy well guarded: yet do they turn away from the Signs which these things (point to)!
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: It is He Who created the Night and the Day, and the sun and the moon: all (the celestial bodies) swim along, each in its rounded course.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We granted not to any man before thee permanent life (here): if then thou shouldst die, would they live permanently?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Every soul shall have a taste of death: and We test you by evil and by good by way of trial. to Us must ye return.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Man is a creature of haste: soon (enough) will I show you My Signs; then ye will not ask Me to hasten them!
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: They say: "When will this promise come to pass, if ye are telling the truth?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: If only the Unbelievers knew (the time) when they will not be able to ward off the fire from their faces, nor yet from their backs, and (when) no help can reach them!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Mocked were (many) messenger before thee; But their scoffers were hemmed in by the thing that they mocked.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "Who can keep you safe by night and by day from (the Wrath of) (Allah) Most Gracious?" Yet they turn away from the mention of their Lord.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Or have they gods that can guard them from Us? They have no power to aid themselves, nor can they be defended from Us.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: If but a breath of the Wrath of thy Lord do touch them, they will then say, "Woe to us! we did wrong indeed!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We shall set up scales of justice for the Day of Judgment, so that not a soul will be dealt with unjustly in the least, and if there be (no more than) the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it (to account): and enough are We to take account.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: In the past We granted to Moses and Aaron the criterion (for judgment), and a Light and a Message for those who would do right,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Those who fear their Lord in their most secret thoughts, and who hold the Hour (of Judgment) in awe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And this is a blessed Message which We have sent down: will ye then reject it?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: We bestowed aforetime on Abraham his rectitude of conduct, and well were We acquainted with him.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They said, "We found our fathers worshipping them."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He said, "Nay, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, He Who created them (from nothing): and I am a witness to this (Truth).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people, that they may bear witness."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He said: "Nay, this was done by - this is their biggest one! ask them, if they can speak intelligently!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: (Abraham) said, "Do ye then worship, besides Allah, things that can neither be of any good to you nor do you harm?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We said, "O Fire! be thou cool, and (a means of) safety for Abraham!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We bestowed on him Isaac and, as an additional gift, (a grandson), Jacob, and We made righteous men of every one (of them).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We made them leaders, guiding (men) by Our Command, and We sent them inspiration to do good deeds, to establish regular prayers, and to practise regular charity; and they constantly served Us (and Us only).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: And to Lut, too, We gave Judgment and Knowledge, and We saved him from the town which practised abominations: truly they were a people given to Evil, a rebellious people.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And We admitted him to Our Mercy: for he was one of the Righteous.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Remember) Noah, when he cried (to Us) aforetime: We listened to his (prayer) and delivered him and his family from great distress.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We helped him against people who rejected Our Signs: truly they were a people given to Evil: so We drowned them (in the Flood) all together.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And remember David and Solomon, when they gave judgment in the matter of the field into which the sheep of certain people had strayed by night: We did witness their judgment.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: To Solomon We inspired the (right) understanding of the matter: to each (of them) We gave Judgment and Knowledge; it was Our power that made the hills and the birds celebrate Our praises, with David: it was We Who did (all these things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It was We Who taught him the making of coats of mail for your benefit, to guard you from each other's violence: will ye then be grateful?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: (It was Our power that made) the violent (unruly) wind flow (tamely) for Solomon, to his order, to the land which We had blessed: for We do know all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And of the evil ones, were some who dived for him, and did other work besides; and it was We Who guarded them.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And (remember) Job, when He cried to his Lord, "Truly distress has seized me, but Thou art the Most Merciful of those that are merciful."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And (remember) Isma'il, Idris, and Zul-kifl, all (men) of constancy and patience;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And remember Zun-nun, when he departed in wrath: He imagined that We had no power over him! But he cried through the deptHs of darkness, "There is no god but thou: glory to thee: I was indeed wrong!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And (remember) Zakariya, when he cried to his Lord: "O my Lord! leave me not without offspring, though thou art the best of inheritors."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: So We listened to him: and We granted him Yahya: We cured his wife's (Barrenness) for him. These (three) were ever quick in emulation in good works; they used to call on Us with love and reverence, and humble themselves before Us.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And (remember) her who guarded her chastity: We breathed into her of Our spirit, and We made her and her son a sign for all peoples.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Verily, this brotherhood of yours is a single brotherhood, and I am your Lord and Cherisher: therefore serve Me (and no other).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Whoever works any act of righteousness and has faith,- His endeavour will not be rejected: We shall record it in his favour.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: But there is a ban on any population which We have destroyed: that they shall not return,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Until the Gog and Magog (people) are let through (their barrier), and they swiftly swarm from every hill.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then will the true promise draw nigh (of fulfilment): then behold! the eyes of the Unbelievers will fixedly stare in horror: "Ah! Woe to us! we were indeed heedless of this; nay, we truly did wrong!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: If these had been gods, they would not have got there! but each one will abide therein.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Those for whom the good (record) from Us has gone before, will be removed far therefrom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Not the slightest sound will they hear of Hell: what their souls desired, in that will they dwell.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: The Great Terror will bring them no grief: but the angels will meet them (with mutual greetings): "This is your Day,- (the Day) that ye were promised."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Day that We roll up the heavens like a scroll rolled up for books (completed),- even as We produced the first creation, so shall We produce a new one: a promise We have undertaken: truly shall We fulfil it.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Before this We wrote in the Psalms, after the Message (given to Moses): My servants the righteous, shall inherit the earth."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We sent thee not, but as a Mercy for all creatures.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "What has come to me by inspiration is that your Allah is One Allah: will ye therefore bow to His Will (in Islam)?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But if they turn back, Say: "I have proclaimed the Message to you all alike and in truth; but I know not whether that which ye are promised is near or far.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "It is He Who knows what is open in speech and what ye hide (in your hearts).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "I know not but that it may be a trial for you, and a grant of (worldly) livelihood (to you) for a time."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: O mankind! fear your Lord! for the convulsion of the Hour (of Judgment) will be a thing terrible!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And yet among men there are such as dispute about Allah, without knowledge, and follow every evil one obstinate in rebellion!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: O mankind! if ye have a doubt about the Resurrection, (consider) that We created you out of dust, then out of sperm, then out of a leech-like clot, then out of a morsel of flesh, partly formed and partly unformed, in order that We may manifest (our power) to you; and We cause whom We will to rest in the wombs for an appointed term, then do We bring you out as babes, then (foster you) that ye may reach your age of full strength; and some of you are called to die, and some are sent back to the feeblest old age, so that they know nothing after having known (much), and (further), thou seest the earth barren and lifeless, but when We pour down rain on it, it is stirred (to life), it swells, and it puts forth every kind of beautiful growth (in pairs).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: This is so, because Allah is the Reality: it is He Who gives life to the dead, and it is He Who has power over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And verily the Hour will come: there can be no doubt about it, or about (the fact) that Allah will raise up all who are in the graves.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Yet there is among men such a one as disputes about Allah, without Knowledge, without Guidance, and without a Book of Enlightenment,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (Disdainfully) bending his side, in order to lead (men) astray from the Path of Allah: for him there is disgrace in this life, and on the Day of Judgment We shall make him taste the Penalty of burning (Fire).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (It will be said): "This is because of the deeds which thy hands sent forth, for verily Allah is not unjust to His servants.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: There are among men some who serve Allah, as it were, on the verge: if good befalls them, they are, therewith, well content; but if a trial comes to them, they turn on their faces: they lose both this world and the Hereafter: that is loss for all to see!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They call on such deities, besides Allah, as can neither hurt nor profit them: that is straying far indeed (from the Way)!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily Allah will admit those who believe and work righteous deeds, to Gardens, beneath which rivers flow: for Allah carries out all that He plans.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: If any think that Allah will not help him (His Messenger) in this world and the Hereafter, let him stretch out a rope to the ceiling and cut (himself) off: then let him see whether his plan will remove that which enrages (him)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Thus have We sent down Clear Signs; and verily Allah doth guide whom He will!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those who believe (in the Qur'an), those who follow the Jewish (scriptures), and the Sabians, Christians, Magians, and Polytheists,- Allah will judge between them on the Day of Judgment: for Allah is witness of all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Seest thou not that to Allah bow down in worship all things that are in the heavens and on earth,- the sun, the moon, the stars; the hills, the trees, the animals; and a great number among mankind? But a great number are (also) such as are fit for Punishment: and such as Allah shall disgrace,- None can raise to honour: for Allah carries out all that He wills.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: With it will be scalded what is within their bodies, as well as (their) skins.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Allah will admit those who believe and work righteous deeds, to Gardens beneath which rivers flow: they shall be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls; and their garments there will be of silk.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: For they have been guided (in this life) to the purest of speeches; they have been guided to the Path of Him Who is Worthy of (all) Praise.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: As to those who have rejected (Allah), and would keep back (men) from the Way of Allah, and from the Sacred Mosque, which We have made (open) to (all) men - equal is the dweller there and the visitor from the country - and any whose purpose therein is profanity or wrong-doing - them will We cause to taste of a most Grievous Penalty.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'makkah']

Text: Behold! We gave the site, to Abraham, of the (Sacred) House, (saying): "Associate not anything (in worship) with Me; and sanctify My House for those who compass it round, or stand up, or bow, or prostrate themselves (therein in prayer).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: "And proclaim the Pilgrimage among men: they will come to thee on foot and (mounted) on every kind of camel, lean on account of journeys through deep and distant mountain highways;
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "That they may witness the benefits (provided) for them, and celebrate the name of Allah, through the Days appointed, over the cattle which He has provided for them (for sacrifice): then eat ye thereof and feed the distressed ones in want.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Then let them complete the rites prescribed for them, perform their vows, and (again) circumambulate the Ancient House."
Label: ['makkah']

Text: Such (is the Pilgrimage): whoever honours the sacred rites of Allah, for him it is good in the Sight of his Lord. Lawful to you (for food in Pilgrimage) are cattle, except those mentioned to you (as exception): but shun the abomination of idols, and shun the word that is false,-
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Such (is his state): and whoever holds in honour the symbols of Allah, (in the sacrifice of animals), such (honour) should come truly from piety of heart.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: In them ye have benefits for a term appointed: in the end their place of sacrifice is near the Ancient House.
Label: ['makkah']

Text: To every people did We appoint rites (of sacrifice), that they might celebrate the name of Allah over the sustenance He gave them from animals (fit for food). But your god is One God: submit then your wills to Him (in Islam): and give thou the good news to those who humble themselves,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: To those whose hearts when Allah is mentioned, are filled with fear, who show patient perseverance over their afflictions, keep up regular prayer, and spend (in charity) out of what We have bestowed upon them.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: The sacrificial camels we have made for you as among the symbols from Allah: in them is (much) good for you: then pronounce the name of Allah over them as they line up (for sacrifice): when they are down on their sides (after slaughter), eat ye thereof, and feed such as (beg not but) live in contentment, and such as beg with due humility: thus have We made animals subject to you, that ye may be grateful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is not their meat nor their blood, that reaches Allah: it is your piety that reaches Him: He has thus made them subject to you, that ye may glorify Allah for His Guidance to you and proclaim the good news to all who do right.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Verily Allah will defend (from ill) those who believe: verily, Allah loveth not any that is a traitor to faith, or show ingratitude.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: To those against whom war is made, permission is given (to fight), because they are wronged;- and verily, Allah is most powerful for their aid;-
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (They are) those who have been expelled from their homes in defiance of right,- (for no cause) except that they say, "our Lord is Allah". Did not Allah check one set of people by means of another, there would surely have been pulled down monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques, in which the name of Allah is commemorated in abundant measure. Allah will certainly aid those who aid his (cause);- for verily Allah is full of Strength, Exalted in Might, (able to enforce His Will).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (They are) those who, if We establish them in the land, establish regular prayer and give regular charity, enjoin the right and forbid wrong: with Allah rests the end (and decision) of (all) affairs.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Those of Abraham and Lut;
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: How many populations have We destroyed, which were given to wrong-doing? They tumbled down on their roofs. And how many wells are lying idle and neglected, and castles lofty and well-built?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Yet they ask thee to hasten on the Punishment! But Allah will not fail in His Promise. Verily a Day in the sight of thy Lord is like a thousand years of your reckoning.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And to how many populations did I give respite, which were given to wrong-doing? in the end I punished them. To me is the destination (of all).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Those who believe and work righteousness, for them is forgiveness and a sustenance most generous.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: "But those who strive against Our Signs, to frustrate them,- they will be Companions of the Fire."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Never did We send a messenger or a prophet before thee, but, when he framed a desire, Satan threw some (vanity) into his desire: but Allah will cancel anything (vain) that Satan throws in, and Allah will confirm (and establish) His Signs: for Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: That He may make the suggestions thrown in by Satan, but a trial for those in whose hearts is a disease and who are hardened of heart: verily the wrong-doers are in a schism far (from the Truth):
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And that those on whom knowledge has been bestowed may learn that the (Qur'an) is the Truth from thy Lord, and that they may believe therein, and their hearts may be made humbly (open) to it: for verily Allah is the Guide of those who believe, to the Straight Way.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Those who reject Faith will not cease to be in doubt concerning (Revelation) until the Hour (of Judgment) comes suddenly upon them, or there comes to them the Penalty of a Day of Disaster.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: On that Day of Dominion will be that of Allah: He will judge between them: so those who believe and work righteous deeds will be in Gardens of Delight.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Those who leave their homes in the cause of Allah, and are then slain or die,- On them will Allah bestow verily a goodly Provision: Truly Allah is He Who bestows the best provision.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: Verily He will admit them to a place with which they shall be well pleased: for Allah is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That (is so). And if one has retaliated to no greater extent than the injury he received, and is again set upon inordinately, Allah will help him: for Allah is One that blots out (sins) and forgives (again and again).
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: That is because Allah merges night into day, and He merges day into night, and verily it is Allah Who hears and sees (all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: That is because Allah - He is the Reality; and those besides Him whom they invoke,- they are but vain Falsehood: verily Allah is He, Most High, Most Great.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and forthwith the earth becomes clothed with green? for Allah is He Who understands the finest mysteries, and is well-acquainted (with them).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth: for verily Allah,- He is free of all wants, Worthy of all Praise.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah has made subject to you (men) all that is on the earth, and the ships that sail through the sea by His Command? He withholds the sky (rain) from failing on the earth except by His leave: for Allah is Most Kind and Most Merciful to man.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is He Who gave you life, will cause you to die, and will again give you life: Truly man is a most ungrateful creature!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: To every People have We appointed rites and ceremonies which they must follow: let them not then dispute with thee on the matter, but do thou invite (them) to thy Lord: for thou art assuredly on the Right Way.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: If they do wrangle with thee, say, "Allah knows best what it is ye are doing."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Allah will judge between you on the Day of Judgment concerning the matters in which ye differ."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Knowest thou not that Allah knows all that is in heaven and on earth? Indeed it is all in a Record, and that is easy for Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Yet they worship, besides Allah, things for which no authority has been sent down to them, and of which they have (really) no knowledge: for those that do wrong there is no helper.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them, thou wilt notice a denial on the faces of the Unbelievers! they nearly attack with violence those who rehearse Our Signs to them. Say, "Shall I tell you of something (far) worse than these Signs? It is the Fire (of Hell)! Allah has promised it to the Unbelievers! and evil is that destination!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: O men! Here is a parable set forth! listen to it! Those on whom, besides Allah, ye call, cannot create (even) a fly, if they all met together for the purpose! and if the fly should snatch away anything from them, they would have no power to release it from the fly. Feeble are those who petition and those whom they petition!
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Allah chooses messengers from angels and from men for Allah is He Who hears and sees (all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He knows what is before them and what is behind them: and to Allah go back all questions (for decision).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O ye who believe! bow down, prostrate yourselves, and adore your Lord; and do good; that ye may prosper.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And strive in His cause as ye ought to strive, (with sincerity and under discipline). He has chosen you, and has imposed no difficulties on you in religion; it is the cult of your father Abraham. It is He Who has named you Muslims, both before and in this (Revelation); that the Messenger may be a witness for you, and ye be witnesses for mankind! So establish regular Prayer, give regular Charity, and hold fast to Allah! He is your Protector - the Best to protect and the Best to help!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: The believers must (eventually) win through,-
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Those who humble themselves in their prayers;
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Who avoid vain talk;
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Who are active in deeds of charity;
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Who abstain from sex,
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Except with those joined to them in the marriage bond, or (the captives) whom their right hands possess,- for (in their case) they are free from blame,
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Those who faithfully observe their trusts and their covenants;
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And who (strictly) guard their prayers;-
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: These will be the heirs,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Who will inherit Paradise: they will dwell therein (for ever).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then We placed him as (a drop of) sperm in a place of rest, firmly fixed;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: After that, at length ye will die
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Again, on the Day of Judgment, will ye be raised up.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We have made, above you, seven tracts; and We are never unmindful of (our) Creation.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And We send down water from the sky according to (due) measure, and We cause it to soak in the soil; and We certainly are able to drain it off (with ease).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: With it We grow for you gardens of date-palms and vines: in them have ye abundant fruits: and of them ye eat (and have enjoyment),-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Also a tree springing out of Mount Sinai, which produces oil, and relish for those who use it for food.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And in cattle (too) ye have an instructive example: from within their bodies We produce (milk) for you to drink; there are, in them, (besides), numerous (other) benefits for you; and of their (meat) ye eat;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: (Further, We sent a long line of prophets for your instruction). We sent Noah to his people: He said, "O my people! worship Allah! Ye have no other god but Him. Will ye not fear (Him)?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Noah) said: "O my Lord! help me: for that they accuse me of falsehood!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: So We inspired him (with this message): "Construct the Ark within Our sight and under Our guidance: then when comes Our Command, and the fountains of the earth gush forth, take thou on board pairs of every species, male and female, and thy family- except those of them against whom the Word has already gone forth: And address Me not in favour of the wrong-doers; for they shall be drowned (in the Flood).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And when thou hast embarked on the Ark - thou and those with thee,- say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has saved us from the people who do wrong."
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And say: "O my Lord! enable me to disembark with thy blessing: for Thou art the Best to enable (us) to disembark."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: And We sent to them a messenger from among themselves, (saying), "Worship Allah! ye have no other god but Him. Will ye not fear (Him)?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: "He is only a man who invents a lie against Allah, but we are not the ones to believe in him!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Allah) said: "In but a little while, they are sure to be sorry!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then the Blast overtook them with justice, and We made them as rubbish of dead leaves (floating on the stream of Time)! So away with the people who do wrong!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Then We raised after them other generations.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: No people can hasten their term, nor can they delay (it).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then sent We our messengers in succession: every time there came to a people their messenger, they accused him of falsehood: so We made them follow each other (in punishment): We made them as a tale (that is told): So away with a people that will not believe!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They said: "Shall we believe in two men like ourselves? And their people are subject to us!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: So they accused them of falsehood, and they became of those who were destroyed.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We gave Moses the Book, in order that they might receive guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We made the son of Mary and his mother as a Sign: We gave them both shelter on high ground, affording rest and security and furnished with springs.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: O ye messengers! enjoy (all) things good and pure, and work righteousness: for I am well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And verily this Brotherhood of yours is a single Brotherhood, and I am your Lord and Cherisher: therefore fear Me (and no other).
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: But people have cut off their affair (of unity), between them, into sects: each party rejoices in that which is with itself.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But leave them in their confused ignorance for a time.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily those who live in awe for fear of their Lord;
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And those who dispense their charity with their hearts full of fear, because they will return to their Lord;-
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: It is these who hasten in every good work, and these who are foremost in them.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: On no soul do We place a burden greater than it can bear: before Us is a record which clearly shows the truth: they will never be wronged.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: "My Signs used to be rehearsed to you, but ye used to turn back on your heels-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Or do they not recognise their Messenger, that they deny him?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If the Truth had been in accord with their desires, truly the heavens and the earth, and all beings therein would have been in confusion and corruption! Nay, We have sent them their admonition, but they turn away from their admonition.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Or is it that thou askest them for some recompense? But the recompense of thy Lord is best: He is the Best of those who give sustenance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If We had mercy on them and removed the distress which is on them, they would obstinately persist in their transgression, wandering in distraction to and fro.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We inflicted Punishment on them, but they humbled not themselves to their Lord, nor do they submissively entreat (Him)!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is He Who has created for you (the faculties of) hearing, sight, feeling and understanding: little thanks it is ye give!
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And He has multiplied you through the earth, and to Him shall ye be gathered back.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is He Who gives life and death, and to Him (is due) the alternation of Night and Day: will ye not then understand?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: They say: "What! when we die and become dust and bones, could we really be raised up again?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Who is the Lord of the seven heavens, and the Lord of the Throne (of Glory) Supreme?"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Say: "Who is it in whose hands is the governance of all things,- who protects (all), but is not protected (of any)? (say) if ye know."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We have sent them the Truth: but they indeed practise falsehood!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: No son did Allah beget, nor is there any god along with Him: (if there were many gods), behold, each god would have taken away what he had created, and some would have lorded it over others! Glory to Allah! (He is free) from the (sort of) things they attribute to Him!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He knows what is hidden and what is open: too high is He for the partners they attribute to Him!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Then, O my Lord! put me not amongst the people who do wrong!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: And We are certainly able to show thee (in fulfilment) that against which they are warned.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Repel evil with that which is best: We are well acquainted with the things they say.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: (In Falsehood will they be) Until, when death comes to one of them, he says: "O my Lord! send me back (to life),-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "In order that I may work righteousness in the things I neglected." - "By no means! It is but a word he says."- Before them is a Partition till the Day they are raised up.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Were not My Signs rehearsed to you, and ye did but treat them as falsehood?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They will say: "our Lord! Our misfortune overwhelmed us, and we became a people astray!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Our Lord! bring us out of this: if ever we return (to Evil), then shall we be wrong-doers indeed!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "A part of My servants there was, who used to pray 'our Lord! we believe; then do Thou forgive us, and have mercy upon us: For Thou art the Best of those who show mercy!"
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: "But ye treated them with ridicule, so much so that (ridicule of) them made you forget My Message while ye were laughing at them!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "I have rewarded them this Day for their patience and constancy: they are indeed the ones that have achieved Bliss..."
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: He will say: "What number of years did ye stay on earth?"
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Therefore exalted be Allah, the King, the Reality: there is no god but He, the Lord of the Throne of Honour!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If anyone invokes, besides Allah, Any other god, he has no authority therefor; and his reckoning will be only with his Lord! and verily the Unbelievers will fail to win through!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So say: "O my Lord! grant Thou forgiveness and mercy for Thou art the Best of those who show mercy!"
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: A sura which We have sent down and which We have ordained in it have We sent down Clear Signs, in order that ye may receive admonition.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The woman and the man guilty of adultery or fornication,- flog each of them with a hundred stripes: Let not compassion move you in their case, in a matter prescribed by Allah, if ye believe in Allah and the Last Day: and let a party of the Believers witness their punishment.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Let no man guilty of adultery or fornication marry and but a woman similarly guilty, or an Unbeliever: nor let any but such a man or an Unbeliever marry such a woman: to the Believers such a thing is forbidden.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And those who launch a charge against chaste women, and produce not four witnesses (to support their allegations),- flog them with eighty stripes; and reject their evidence ever after: for such men are wicked transgressors;-
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Unless they repent thereafter and mend (their conduct); for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: And the fifth (oath) (should be) that they solemnly invoke the curse of Allah on themselves if they tell a lie.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But it would avert the punishment from the wife, if she bears witness four times (with an oath) By Allah, that (her husband) is telling a lie;
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And the fifth (oath) should be that she solemnly invokes the wrath of Allah on herself if (her accuser) is telling the truth.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: If it were not for Allah's grace and mercy on you, and that Allah is Oft-Returning, full of Wisdom,- (Ye would be ruined indeed).
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Those who brought forward the lie are a body among yourselves: think it not to be an evil to you; On the contrary it is good for you: to every man among them (will come the punishment) of the sin that he earned, and to him who took on himself the lead among them, will be a penalty grievous.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Why did not the believers - men and women - when ye heard of the affair,- put the best construction on it in their own minds and say, "This (charge) is an obvious lie"?
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And why did ye not, when ye heard it, say? - "It is not right of us to speak of this: Glory to Allah! this is a most serious slander!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Those who love (to see) scandal published broadcast among the Believers, will have a grievous Penalty in this life and in the Hereafter: Allah knows, and ye know not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Were it not for the grace and mercy of Allah on you, and that Allah is full of kindness and mercy, (ye would be ruined indeed).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: O ye who believe! follow not Satan's footsteps: if any will follow the footsteps of Satan, he will (but) command what is shameful and wrong: and were it not for the grace and mercy of Allah on you, not one of you would ever have been pure: but Allah doth purify whom He pleases: and Allah is One Who hears and knows (all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Let not those among you who are endued with grace and amplitude of means resolve by oath against helping their kinsmen, those in want, and those who have left their homes in Allah's cause: let them forgive and overlook, do you not wish that Allah should forgive you? For Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Those who slander chaste women, indiscreet but believing, are cursed in this life and in the Hereafter: for them is a grievous Penalty,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: On the Day when their tongues, their hands, and their feet will bear witness against them as to their actions.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: On that Day Allah will pay them back (all) their just dues, and they will realise that Allah is the (very) Truth, that makes all things manifest.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Women impure are for men impure, and men impure for women impure and women of purity are for men of purity, and men of purity are for women of purity: these are not affected by what people say: for them there is forgiveness, and a provision honourable.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: O ye who believe! enter not houses other than your own, until ye have asked permission and saluted those in them: that is best for you, in order that ye may heed (what is seemly).
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: It is no fault on your part to enter houses not used for living in, which serve some (other) use for you: And Allah has knowledge of what ye reveal and what ye conceal.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Say to the believing men that they should lower their gaze and guard their modesty: that will make for greater purity for them: And Allah is well acquainted with all that they do.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And say to the believing women that they should lower their gaze and guard their modesty; that they should not display their beauty and ornaments except what (must ordinarily) appear thereof; that they should draw their veils over their bosoms and not display their beauty except to their husbands, their fathers, their husband's fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or the slaves whom their right hands possess, or male servants free of physical needs, or small children who have no sense of the shame of sex; and that they should not strike their feet in order to draw attention to their hidden ornaments. And O ye Believers! turn ye all together towards Allah, that ye may attain Bliss.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Marry those among you who are single, or the virtuous ones among yourselves, male or female: if they are in poverty, Allah will give them means out of His grace: for Allah encompasseth all, and he knoweth all things.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Let those who find not the wherewithal for marriage keep themselves chaste, until Allah gives them means out of His grace. And if any of your slaves ask for a deed in writing (to enable them to earn their freedom for a certain sum), give them such a deed if ye know any good in them: yea, give them something yourselves out of the means which Allah has given to you. But force not your maids to prostitution when they desire chastity, in order that ye may make a gain in the goods of this life. But if anyone compels them, yet, after such compulsion, is Allah, Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful (to them),
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: We have already sent down to you verses making things clear, an illustration from (the story of) people who passed away before you, and an admonition for those who fear (Allah).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The Parable of His Light is as if there were a Niche and within it a Lamp: the Lamp enclosed in Glass: the glass as it were a brilliant star: Lit from a blessed Tree, an Olive, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil is well-nigh luminous, though fire scarce touched it: Light upon Light! Allah doth guide whom He will to His Light: Allah doth set forth Parables for men: and Allah doth know all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: By men whom neither traffic nor merchandise can divert from the Remembrance of Allah, nor from regular Prayer, nor from the practice of regular Charity: Their (only) fear is for the Day when hearts and eyes will be transformed (in a world wholly new),-
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: That Allah may reward them according to the best of their deeds, and add even more for them out of His Grace: for Allah doth provide for those whom He will, without measure.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Or (the Unbelievers' state) is like the depths of darkness in a vast deep ocean, overwhelmed with billow topped by billow, topped by (dark) clouds: depths of darkness, one above another: if a man stretches out his hands, he can hardly see it! for any to whom Allah giveth not light, there is no light!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Seest thou not that it is Allah Whose praises all beings in the heavens and on earth do celebrate, and the birds (of the air) with wings outspread? Each one knows its own (mode of) prayer and praise. And Allah knows well all that they do.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah makes the clouds move gently, then joins them together, then makes them into a heap? - then wilt thou see rain issue forth from their midst. And He sends down from the sky mountain masses (of clouds) wherein is hail: He strikes therewith whom He pleases and He turns it away from whom He pleases, the vivid flash of His lightning well-nigh blinds the sight.
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: It is Allah Who alternates the Night and the Day: verily in these things is an instructive example for those who have vision!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And Allah has created every animal from water: of them there are some that creep on their bellies; some that walk on two legs; and some that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills for verily Allah has power over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: We have indeed sent down signs that make things manifest: and Allah guides whom He wills to a way that is straight.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They say, "We believe in Allah and in the messenger, and we obey": but even after that, some of them turn away: they are not (really) Believers.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: When they are summoned to Allah and His messenger, in order that He may judge between them, behold some of them decline (to come).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But if the right is on their side, they come to him with all submission.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Is it that there is a disease in their hearts? or do they doubt, or are they in fear, that Allah and His Messenger will deal unjustly with them? Nay, it is they themselves who do wrong.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: It is such as obey Allah and His Messenger, and fear Allah and do right, that will win (in the end),
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: They swear their strongest oaths by Allah that, if only thou wouldst command them, they would leave (their homes). Say: "Swear ye not; Obedience is (more) reasonable; verily, Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do."
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Say: "Obey Allah, and obey the Messenger: but if ye turn away, he is only responsible for the duty placed on him and ye for that placed on you. If ye obey him, ye shall be on right guidance. The Messenger's duty is only to preach the clear (Message).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Allah has promised, to those among you who believe and work righteous deeds, that He will, of a surety, grant them in the land, inheritance (of power), as He granted it to those before them; that He will establish in authority their religion - the one which He has chosen for them; and that He will change (their state), after the fear in which they (lived), to one of security and peace: 'They will worship Me (alone) and not associate aught with Me. 'If any do reject Faith after this, they are rebellious and wicked.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: So establish regular Prayer and give regular Charity; and obey the Messenger; that ye may receive mercy.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Never think thou that the Unbelievers are going to frustrate (Allah's Plan) on earth: their abode is the Fire,- and it is indeed an evil refuge!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O ye who believe! let those whom your right hands possess, and the (children) among you who have not come of age ask your permission (before they come to your presence), on three occasions: before morning prayer; the while ye doff your clothes for the noonday heat; and after the late-night prayer: these are your three times of undress: outside those times it is not wrong for you or for them to move about attending to each other: Thus does Allah make clear the Signs to you: for Allah is full of knowledge and wisdom.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: But when the children among you come of age, let them (also) ask for permission, as do those senior to them (in age): Thus does Allah make clear His Signs to you: for Allah is full of knowledge and wisdom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Such elderly women as are past the prospect of marriage,- there is no blame on them if they lay aside their (outer) garments, provided they make not a wanton display of their beauty: but it is best for them to be modest: and Allah is One Who sees and knows all things.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is no fault in the blind nor in one born lame, nor in one afflicted with illness, nor in yourselves, that ye should eat in your own houses, or those of your fathers, or your mothers, or your brothers, or your sisters, or your father's brothers or your father's sisters, or your mother's brothers, or your mother's sisters, or in houses of which the keys are in your possession, or in the house of a sincere friend of yours: there is no blame on you, whether ye eat in company or separately. But if ye enter houses, salute each other - a greeting of blessing and purity as from Allah. Thus does Allah make clear the signs to you: that ye may understand.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Only those are believers, who believe in Allah and His Messenger: when they are with him on a matter requiring collective action, they do not depart until they have asked for his leave; those who ask for thy leave are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger; so when they ask for thy leave, for some business of theirs, give leave to those of them whom thou wilt, and ask Allah for their forgiveness: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: Deem not the summons of the Messenger among yourselves like the summons of one of you to another: Allah doth know those of you who slip away under shelter of some excuse: then let those beware who withstand the Messenger's order, lest some trial befall them, or a grievous penalty be inflicted on them.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Be quite sure that to Allah doth belong whatever is in the heavens and on earth. Well doth He know what ye are intent upon: and one day they will be brought back to Him, and He will tell them the truth of what they did: for Allah doth know all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Blessed is He who sent down the criterion to His servant, that it may be an admonition to all creatures;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: no son has He begotten, nor has He a partner in His dominion: it is He who created all things, and ordered them in due proportions.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Yet have they taken, besides him, gods that can create nothing but are themselves created; that have no control of hurt or good to themselves; nor can they control death nor life nor resurrection.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But the misbelievers say: "Naught is this but a lie which he has forged, and others have helped him at it." In truth it is they who have put forward an iniquity and a falsehood.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "The (Qur'an) was sent down by Him who knows the mystery (that is) in the heavens and the earth: verily He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: And they say: "What sort of a messenger is this, who eats food, and walks through the streets? Why has not an angel been sent down to him to give admonition with him?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']
