Text: "Or (Why) has not a treasure been bestowed on him, or why has he (not) a garden for enjoyment?" The wicked say: "Ye follow none other than a man bewitched."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Blessed is He who, if that were His will, could give thee better (things) than those,- Gardens beneath which rivers flow; and He could give thee palaces (secure to dwell in).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nay they deny the hour (of the judgment to come): but We have prepared a blazing fire for such as deny the hour:
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When it sees them from a place far off, they will hear its fury and its ranging sigh.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And when they are cast, bound together into a constricted place therein, they will plead for destruction there and then!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Is that best, or the eternal garden, promised to the righteous? for them, that is a reward as well as a goal (of attainment).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: The day He will gather them together as well as those whom they worship besides Allah, He will ask: "Was it ye who let these My servants astray, or did they stray from the Path themselves?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They will say: "Glory to Thee! not meet was it for us that we should take for protectors others besides Thee: But Thou didst bestow, on them and their fathers, good things (in life), until they forgot the Message: for they were a people (worthless and) lost."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (Allah will say): "Now have they proved you liars in what ye say: so ye cannot avert (your penalty) nor (get) help." And whoever among you does wrong, him shall We cause to taste of a grievous Penalty.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And the messengers whom We sent before thee were all (men) who ate food and walked through the streets: We have made some of you as a trial for others: will ye have patience? for Allah is One Who sees (all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Such as fear not the meeting with Us (for Judgment) say: "Why are not the angels sent down to us, or (why) do we not see our Lord?" Indeed they have an arrogant conceit of themselves, and mighty is the insolence of their impiety!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: The Day they see the angels,- no joy will there be to the sinners that Day: The (angels) will say: "There is a barrier forbidden (to you) altogether!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Companions of the Garden will be well, that Day, in their abode, and have the fairest of places for repose.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Day the heaven shall be rent asunder with clouds, and angels shall be sent down, descending (in ranks),-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That Day, the dominion as of right and truth, shall be (wholly) for (Allah) Most Merciful: it will be a Day of dire difficulty for the misbelievers.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Day that the wrong-doer will bite at his hands, he will say, "Oh! would that I had taken a (straight) path with the Messenger!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Ah! woe is me! Would that I had never taken such a one for a friend!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: "He did lead me astray from the Message (of Allah) after it had come to me! Ah! the Evil One is but a traitor to man!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Then the Messenger will say: "O my Lord! Truly my people took this Qur'an for just foolish nonsense."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Thus have We made for every prophet an enemy among the sinners: but enough is thy Lord to guide and to help.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Those who reject Faith say: "Why is not the Qur'an revealed to him all at once? Thus (is it revealed), that We may strengthen thy heart thereby, and We have rehearsed it to thee in slow, well-arranged stages, gradually.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those who will be gathered to Hell (prone) on their faces,- they will be in an evil plight, and, as to Path, most astray.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Before this,) We sent Moses The Book, and appointed his brother Aaron with him as minister;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We command: "Go ye both, to the people who have rejected our Signs:" And those (people) We destroyed with utter destruction.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And the people of Noah,- when they rejected the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them as a Sign for mankind; and We have prepared for (all) wrong-doers a grievous Penalty;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: As also 'Ad and Thamud, and the Companions of the Rass, and many a generation between them.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: To each one We set forth Parables and examples; and each one We broke to utter annihilation (for their sins).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And the (Unbelievers) must indeed have passed by the town on which was rained a shower of evil: did they not then see it (with their own eyes)? But they fear not the Resurrection.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "He indeed would well-nigh have misled us from our gods, had it not been that we were constant to them!" - Soon will they know, when they see the Penalty, who it is that is most misled in Path!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Seest thou such a one as taketh for his god his own passion (or impulse)? Couldst thou be a disposer of affairs for him?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Or thinkest thou that most of them listen or understand? They are only like cattle;- nay, they are worse astray in Path.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Hast thou not turned thy vision to thy Lord?- How He doth prolong the shadow! If He willed, He could make it stationary! then do We make the sun its guide;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then We draw it in towards Ourselves,- a contraction by easy stages.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And He it is Who makes the Night as a Robe for you, and Sleep as Repose, and makes the Day (as it were) a Resurrection.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And He it is Who sends the winds as heralds of glad tidings, going before His mercy, and We send down pure water from the sky,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Therefore listen not to the Unbelievers, but strive against them with the utmost strenuousness, with the (Qur'an).
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: It is He Who has let free the two bodies of flowing water: One palatable and sweet, and the other salt and bitter; yet has He made a barrier between them, a partition that is forbidden to be passed.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: It is He Who has created man from water: then has He established relationships of lineage and marriage: for thy Lord has power (over all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Yet do they worship, besides Allah, things that can neither profit them nor harm them: and the Misbeliever is a helper (of Evil), against his own Lord!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But thee We only sent to give glad tidings and admonition.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "No reward do I ask of you for it but this: that each one who will may take a (straight) Path to his Lord."
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: And put thy trust in Him Who lives and dies not; and celebrate his praise; and enough is He to be acquainted with the faults of His servants;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: He Who created the heavens and the earth and all that is between, in six days, and is firmly established on the Throne (of Authority): Allah Most Gracious: ask thou, then, about Him of any acquainted (with such things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: When it is said to them, "Prostrate to (Allah) Most Gracious!", they say, "And what is (Allah) Most Gracious? Shall we prostrate to that which thou commandest us?" And it increases their flight (from the Truth).
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Blessed is He Who made constellations in the skies, and placed therein a Lamp and a Moon giving light;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And it is He Who made the Night and the Day to follow each other: for such as have the will to celebrate His praises or to show their gratitude.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And the servants of (Allah) Most Gracious are those who walk on the earth in humility, and when the ignorant address them, they say, "Peace!";
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Those who spend the night in adoration of their Lord prostrate and standing;
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Those who say, "Our Lord! avert from us the Wrath of Hell, for its Wrath is indeed an affliction grievous,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: Those who, when they spend, are not extravagant and not niggardly, but hold a just (balance) between those (extremes);
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (But) the Penalty on the Day of Judgment will be doubled to him, and he will dwell therein in ignominy,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Unless he repents, believes, and works righteous deeds, for Allah will change the evil of such persons into good, and Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful,
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Those who witness no falsehood, and, if they pass by futility, they pass by it with honourable (avoidance);
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And those who pray, "Our Lord! Grant unto us wives and offspring who will be the comfort of our eyes, and give us (the grace) to lead the righteous."
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: Those are the ones who will be rewarded with the highest place in heaven, because of their patient constancy: therein shall they be met with salutations and peace,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Dwelling therein;- how beautiful an abode and place of rest!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say (to the Rejecters): "My Lord is not uneasy because of you if ye call not on Him: But ye have indeed rejected (Him), and soon will come the inevitable (punishment)!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: These are verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If (such) were Our Will, We could send down to them from the sky a Sign, to which they would bend their necks in humility.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But there comes not to them a newly-revealed Message from (Allah) Most Gracious, but they turn away therefrom.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They have indeed rejected (the Message): so they will know soon (enough) the truth of what they mocked at!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Do they not look at the earth,- how many noble things of all kinds We have produced therein?
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Behold, thy Lord called Moses: "Go to the people of iniquity,-
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "My breast will be straitened. And my speech may not go (smoothly): so send unto Aaron.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "And thou didst a deed of thine which (thou knowest) thou didst, and thou art an ungrateful (wretch)!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Pharaoh said: "And what is the 'Lord and Cherisher of the worlds'?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Moses) said: "Lord of the East and the West, and all between! if ye only had sense!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Pharaoh) said: "Show it then, if thou tellest the truth!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "His plan is to get you out of your land by his sorcery; then what is it ye counsel?"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "Yea, (and more),- for ye shall in that case be (raised to posts) nearest (to my person)."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Saying: "We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They said: "No matter! for us, we shall but return to our Lord!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Only, our desire is that our Lord will forgive us our faults, that we may become foremost among the believers!"
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: (Moses) said: "By no means! my Lord is with me! Soon will He guide me!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But We drowned the others.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Ye and your fathers before you?-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "For they are enemies to me; not so the Lord and Cherisher of the Worlds;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Who created me, and it is He Who guides me;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Who gives me food and drink,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Who will cause me to die, and then to life (again);
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "And who, I hope, will forgive me my faults on the day of Judgment.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: "Grant me honourable mention on the tongue of truth among the latest (generations);
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "Make me one of the inheritors of the Garden of Bliss;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Forgive my father, for that he is among those astray;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: "The Day whereon neither wealth nor sons will avail,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: "To the righteous, the Garden will be brought near,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: "'Besides Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?'
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Then they will be thrown headlong into the (Fire),- they and those straying in Evil,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "They will say there in their mutual bickerings:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "'When we held you as equals with the Lord of the Worlds;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "'Nor a single friend to feel (for us).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The people of Noah rejected the messengers.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold, their brother Noah said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: "Their account is only with my Lord, if ye could (but) understand.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Judge Thou, then, between me and them openly, and deliver me and those of the Believers who are with me."
Label: ['invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: So We delivered him and those with him, in the Ark filled (with all creatures).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Thereafter We drowned those who remained behind.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The 'Ad (people) rejected the messengers.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold, their brother Hud said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Now fear Allah, and obey me.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "Yea, fear Him Who has bestowed on you freely all that ye know.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Truly I fear for you the Penalty of a Great Day."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They said: "It is the same to us whether thou admonish us or be not among (our) admonishers!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So they rejected him, and We destroyed them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: The Thamud (people) rejected the messengers.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold, their brother Salih said to them: "Will you not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Gardens and Springs,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "And ye carve houses out of (rocky) mountains with great skill.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "And follow not the bidding of those who are extravagant,-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Thou art no more than a mortal like us: then bring us a Sign, if thou tellest the truth!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: But they ham-strung her: then did they become full of regrets.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The people of Lut rejected the messengers.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold, their brother Lut said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "Of all the creatures in the world, will ye approach males,
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: They said: "If thou desist not, O Lut! thou wilt assuredly be cast out!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "O my Lord! deliver me and my family from such things as they do!"
Label: ['invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: Except an old woman who lingered behind.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We rained down on them a shower (of brimstone): and evil was the shower on those who were admonished (but heeded not)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Companions of the Wood rejected the messengers.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold, Shu'aib said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: "So fear Allah and obey me.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Give just measure, and cause no loss (to others by fraud).
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And weigh with scales true and upright.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: "And withhold not things justly due to men, nor do evil in the land, working mischief.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And fear Him Who created you and (who created) the generations before (you)"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Now cause a piece of the sky to fall on us, if thou art truthful!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: He said: "My Lord knows best what ye do."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily in that is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily this is a Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: With it came down the spirit of Faith and Truth-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: In the perspicuous Arabic tongue.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Without doubt it is (announced) in the mystic Books of former peoples.
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: Is it not a Sign to them that the Learned of the Children of Israel knew it (as true)?
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Thus have We caused it to enter the hearts of the sinners.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Never did We destroy a population, but had its warners -
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: By way of reminder; and We never are unjust.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: It would neither suit them nor would they be able (to produce it).
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: So call not on any other god with Allah, or thou wilt be among those under the Penalty.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And lower thy wing to the Believers who follow thee.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Then if they disobey thee, say: "I am free (of responsibility) for what ye do!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And put thy trust on the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,-
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Who seeth thee standing forth (in prayer),
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Shall I inform you, (O people!), on whom it is that the evil ones descend?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They descend on every lying, wicked person,
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And that they say what they practise not?-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Except those who believe, work righteousness, engage much in the remembrance of Allah, and defend themselves only after they are unjustly attacked. And soon will the unjust assailants know what vicissitudes their affairs will take!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: These are verses of the Qur'an,-a book that makes (things) clear;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those who establish regular prayers and give in regular charity, and also have (full) assurance of the hereafter.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: As to those who believe not in the Hereafter, We have made their deeds pleasing in their eyes; and so they wander about in distraction.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: As to thee, the Qur'an is bestowed upon thee from the presence of one who is wise and all-knowing.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But when he came to the (fire), a voice was heard: "Blessed are those in the fire and those around: and glory to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Now do thou throw thy rod!" But when he saw it moving (of its own accord) as if it had been a snake, he turned back in retreat, and retraced not his steps: "O Moses!" (it was said), "Fear not: truly, in My presence, those called as messengers have no fear,-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "But if any have done wrong and have thereafter substituted good to take the place of evil, truly, I am Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: "Now put thy hand into thy bosom, and it will come forth white without stain (or harm): (these are) among the nine Signs (thou wilt take) to Pharaoh and his people: for they are a people rebellious in transgression."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But when Our Signs came to them, that should have opened their eyes, they said: "This is sorcery manifest!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We gave (in the past) knowledge to David and Solomon: And they both said: "Praise be to Allah, Who has favoured us above many of his servants who believe!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And before Solomon were marshalled his hosts,- of Jinns and men and birds, and they were all kept in order and ranks.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: At length, when they came to a (lowly) valley of ants, one of the ants said: "O ye ants, get into your habitations, lest Solomon and his hosts crush you (under foot) without knowing it."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So he smiled, amused at her speech; and he said: "O my Lord! so order me that I may be grateful for Thy favours, which thou hast bestowed on me and on my parents, and that I may work the righteousness that will please Thee: And admit me, by Thy Grace, to the ranks of Thy righteous Servants."
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: "I found her and her people worshipping the sun besides Allah: Satan has made their deeds seem pleasing in their eyes, and has kept them away from the Path,- so they receive no guidance,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "(Kept them away from the Path), that they should not worship Allah, Who brings to light what is hidden in the heavens and the earth, and knows what ye hide and what ye reveal.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Allah!- there is no god but He!- Lord of the Throne Supreme!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Solomon) said: "Soon shall we see whether thou hast told the truth or lied!
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: She said: "Kings, when they enter a country, despoil it, and make the noblest of its people its meanest thus do they behave.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: He said (to his own men): "Ye chiefs! which of you can bring me her throne before they come to me in submission?"
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Said one who had knowledge of the Book: "I will bring it to thee within the twinkling of an eye!" Then when (Solomon) saw it placed firmly before him, he said: "This is by the Grace of my Lord!- to test me whether I am grateful or ungrateful! and if any is grateful, truly his gratitude is (a gain) for his own soul; but if any is ungrateful, truly my Lord is Free of all Needs, Supreme in Honour!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: So when she arrived, she was asked, "Is this thy throne?" She said, "It was just like this; and knowledge was bestowed on us in advance of this, and we have submitted to Allah (in Islam)."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And he diverted her from the worship of others besides Allah: for she was (sprung) of a people that had no faith.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: She was asked to enter the lofty Palace: but when she saw it, she thought it was a lake of water, and she (tucked up her skirts), uncovering her legs. He said: "This is but a palace paved smooth with slabs of glass." She said: "O my Lord! I have indeed wronged my soul: I do (now) submit (in Islam), with Solomon, to the Lord of the Worlds."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "O my people! why ask ye to hasten on the evil in preference to the good? If only ye ask Allah for forgiveness, ye may hope to receive mercy.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: There were in the city nine men of a family, who made mischief in the land, and would not reform.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They said: "Swear a mutual oath by Allah that we shall make a secret night attack on him and his people, and that we shall then say to his heir (when he seeks vengeance): 'We were not present at the slaughter of his people, and we are positively telling the truth.'"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: They plotted and planned, but We too planned, even while they perceived it not.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Then see what was the end of their plot!- this, that We destroyed them and their people, all (of them).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Now such were their houses, - in utter ruin, - because they practised wrong-doing. Verily in this is a Sign for people of knowledge.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We saved those who believed and practised righteousness.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: (We also sent) Lut (as a messenger): behold, He said to his people, "Do ye do what is shameful though ye see (its iniquity)?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But his people gave no other answer but this: they said, "Drive out the followers of Lut from your city: these are indeed men who want to be clean and pure!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But We saved him and his family, except his wife; her We destined to be of those who lagged behind.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: Praise be to Allah, and Peace on his servants whom He has chosen (for his Message). (Who) is better?- Allah or the false gods they associate (with Him)?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Or, Who has created the heavens and the earth, and Who sends you down rain from the sky? Yea, with it We cause to grow well-planted orchards full of beauty of delight: it is not in your power to cause the growth of the trees in them. (Can there be another) god besides Allah? Nay, they are a people who swerve from justice.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Or, Who has made the earth firm to live in; made rivers in its midst; set thereon mountains immovable; and made a separating bar between the two bodies of flowing water? (can there be another) god besides Allah? Nay, most of them know not.
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Or, Who guides you through the depths of darkness on land and sea, and Who sends the winds as heralds of glad tidings, going before His Mercy? (Can there be another) god besides Allah?- High is Allah above what they associate with Him!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Or, Who originates creation, then repeats it, and who gives you sustenance from heaven and earth? (Can there be another) god besides Allah? Say, "Bring forth your argument, if ye are telling the truth!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Say: None in the heavens or on earth, except Allah, knows what is hidden: nor can they perceive when they shall be raised up (for Judgment).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Still less can their knowledge comprehend the Hereafter: Nay, they are in doubt and uncertainty thereanent; nay, they are blind thereunto!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "It is true we were promised this,- we and our fathers before (us): these are nothing but tales of the ancients."
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Say: "Go ye through the earth and see what has been the end of those guilty (of sin)."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They also say: "When will this promise (come to pass)? (Say) if ye are truthful."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But verily thy Lord is full of grace to mankind: Yet most of them are ungrateful.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And verily thy Lord knoweth all that their hearts do hide. As well as all that they reveal.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nor is there aught of the unseen, in heaven or earth, but is (recorded) in a clear record.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily this Qur'an doth explain to the Children of Israel most of the matters in which they disagree.
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: And it certainly is a Guide and a Mercy to those who believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So put thy trust in Allah: for thou art on (the path of) manifest Truth.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Truly thou canst not cause the dead to listen, nor canst thou cause the deaf to hear the call, (especially) when they turn back in retreat.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nor canst thou be a guide to the blind, (to prevent them) from straying: only those wilt thou get to listen who believe in Our Signs, and they will bow in Islam.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And when the Word is fulfilled against them (the unjust), we shall produce from the earth a beast to (face) them: He will speak to them, for that mankind did not believe with assurance in Our Signs.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Until, when they come (before the Judgment-seat), (Allah) will say: "Did ye reject My Signs, though ye comprehended them not in knowledge, or what was it ye did?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: See they not that We have made the Night for them to rest in and the Day to give them light? Verily in this are Signs for any people that believe!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And the Day that the Trumpet will be sounded - then will be smitten with terror those who are in the heavens, and those who are on earth, except such as Allah will please (to exempt): and all shall come to His (Presence) as beings conscious of their lowliness.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Thou seest the mountains and thinkest them firmly fixed: but they shall pass away as the clouds pass away: (such is) the artistry of Allah, who disposes of all things in perfect order: for he is well acquainted with all that ye do.
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: If any do good, good will (accrue) to them therefrom; and they will be secure from terror that Day.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And if any do evil, their faces will be thrown headlong into the Fire: "Do ye receive a reward other than that which ye have earned by your deeds?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: For me, I have been commanded to serve the Lord of this city, Him Who has sanctified it and to Whom (belong) all things: and I am commanded to be of those who bow in Islam to Allah's Will,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'makkah']

Text: And to rehearse the Qur'an: and if any accept guidance, they do it for the good of their own souls, and if any stray, say: "I am only a Warner".
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And say: "Praise be to Allah, Who will soon show you His Signs, so that ye shall know them"; and thy Lord is not unmindful of all that ye do.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: These are Verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Truly Pharaoh elated himself in the land and broke up its people into sections, depressing a small group among them: their sons he slew, but he kept alive their females: for he was indeed a maker of mischief.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And We wished to be Gracious to those who were being depressed in the land, to make them leaders (in Faith) and make them heirs,
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: The wife of Pharaoh said: "(Here is) joy of the eye, for me and for thee: slay him not. It may be that he will be use to us, or we may adopt him as a son." And they perceived not (what they were doing)!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When he reached full age, and was firmly established (in life), We bestowed on him wisdom and knowledge: for thus do We reward those who do good.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And he entered the city at a time when its people were not watching: and he found there two men fighting,- one of his own religion, and the other, of his foes. Now the man of his own religion appealed to him against his foe, and Moses struck him with his fist and made an end of him. He said: "This is a work of Evil (Satan): for he is an enemy that manifestly misleads!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: He prayed: "O my Lord! I have indeed wronged my soul! Do Thou then forgive me!" So (Allah) forgave him: for He is the Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: He said: "O my Lord! For that Thou hast bestowed Thy Grace on me, never shall I be a help to those who sin!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Then, when he decided to lay hold of the man who was an enemy to both of them, that man said: "O Moses! Is it thy intention to slay me as thou slewest a man yesterday? Thy intention is none other than to become a powerful violent man in the land, and not to be one who sets things right!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And there came a man, running, from the furthest end of the City. He said: "O Moses! the Chiefs are taking counsel together about thee, to slay thee: so get thee away, for I do give thee sincere advice."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Then, when he turned his face towards (the land of) Madyan, he said: "I do hope that my Lord will show me the smooth and straight Path."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Afterwards one of the (damsels) came (back) to him, walking bashfully. She said: "My father invites thee that he may reward thee for having watered (our flocks) for us." So when he came to him and narrated the story, he said: "Fear thou not: (well) hast thou escaped from unjust people."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Said one of the (damsels): "O my (dear) father! engage him on wages: truly the best of men for thee to employ is the (man) who is strong and trusty"....
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: He said: "I intend to wed one of these my daughters to thee, on condition that thou serve me for eight years; but if thou complete ten years, it will be (grace) from thee. But I intend not to place thee under a difficulty: thou wilt find me, indeed, if Allah wills, one of the righteous."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He said: "Be that (the agreement) between me and thee: whichever of the two terms I fulfil, let there be no ill-will to me. Be Allah a witness to what we say."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But when he came to the (fire), a voice was heard from the right bank of the valley, from a tree in hallowed ground: "O Moses! Verily I am Allah, the Lord of the Worlds....
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Now do thou throw thy rod!" but when he saw it moving (of its own accord) as if it had been a snake, he turned back in retreat, and retraced not his steps: O Moses!" (It was said), "Draw near, and fear not: for thou art of those who are secure.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Move thy hand into thy bosom, and it will come forth white without stain (or harm), and draw thy hand close to thy side (to guard) against fear. Those are the two credentials from thy Lord to Pharaoh and his Chiefs: for truly they are a people rebellious and wicked."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When Moses came to them with Our clear signs, they said: "This is nothing but sorcery faked up: never did we head the like among our fathers of old!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Moses said: "My Lord knows best who it is that comes with guidance from Him and whose end will be best in the Hereafter: certain it is that the wrong-doers will not prosper."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Pharaoh said: "O Chiefs! no god do I know for you but myself: therefore, O Haman! light me a (kiln to bake bricks) out of clay, and build me a lofty palace, that I may mount up to the god of Moses: but as far as I am concerned, I think (Moses) is a liar!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And he was arrogant and insolent in the land, beyond reason,- He and his hosts: they thought that they would not have to return to Us!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And we made them (but) leaders inviting to the Fire; and on the Day of Judgment no help shall they find.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: in this world We made a curse to follow them and on the Day of Judgment they will be among the loathed (and despised).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We did reveal to Moses the Book after We had destroyed the earlier generations, (to give) Insight to men, and guidance and Mercy, that they might receive admonition.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nor wast thou at the side of (the Mountain of) Tur when we called (to Moses). Yet (art thou sent) as Mercy from thy Lord, to give warning to a people to whom no warner had come before thee: in order that they may receive admonition.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But (now), when the Truth has come to them from Ourselves, they say, "Why are not (Signs) sent to him, like those which were sent to Moses?" Do they not then reject (the Signs) which were formerly sent to Moses? They say: "Two kinds of sorcery, each assisting the other!" And they say: "For us, we reject all (such things)!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Say: "Then bring ye a Book from Allah, which is a better guide than either of them, that I may follow it! (do), if ye are truthful!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But if they hearken not to thee, know that they only follow their own lusts: and who is more astray than one who follow his own lusts, devoid of guidance from Allah? for Allah guides not people given to wrong-doing.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Those to whom We sent the Book before this,- they do believe in this (revelation):
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe therein, for it is the Truth from our Lord: indeed we have been Muslims (bowing to Allah's Will) from before this.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Twice will they be given their reward, for that they have persevered, that they avert Evil with Good, and that they spend (in charity) out of what We have given them.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And when they hear vain talk, they turn away therefrom and say: "To us our deeds, and to you yours; peace be to you: we seek not the ignorant."
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: It is true thou wilt not be able to guide every one, whom thou lovest; but Allah guides those whom He will and He knows best those who receive guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They say: "If we were to follow the guidance with thee, we should be snatched away from our land." Have We not established for them a secure sanctuary, to which are brought as tribute fruits of all kinds,- a provision from Ourselves? but most of them understand not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And how many populations We destroyed, which exulted in their life (of ease and plenty)! now those habitations of theirs, after them, are deserted,- All but a (miserable) few! and We are their heirs!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nor was thy Lord the one to destroy a population until He had sent to its centre a messenger, rehearsing to them Our Signs; nor are We going to destroy a population except when its members practise iniquity.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: The (material) things which ye are given are but the conveniences of this life and the glitter thereof; but that which is with Allah is better and more enduring: will ye not then be wise?
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Are (these two) alike?- one to whom We have made a goodly promise, and who is going to reach its (fulfilment), and one to whom We have given the good things of this life, but who, on the Day of Judgment, is to be among those brought up (for punishment)?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It will be said (to them): "Call upon your 'partners' (for help)": they will call upon them, but they will not listen to them; and they will see the Penalty (before them); (how they will wish) 'if only they had been open to guidance!'
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That Day (Allah) will call to them, and say: "What was the answer ye gave to the messengers?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then the (whole) story that Day will seem obscure to them (like light to the blind) and they will not be able (even) to question each other.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But any that (in this life) had repented, believed, and worked righteousness, will have hopes to be among those who achieve salvation.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Thy Lord does create and choose as He pleases: no choice have they (in the matter): Glory to Allah! and far is He above the partners they ascribe (to Him)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And thy Lord knows all that their hearts conceal and all that they reveal.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And He is Allah: There is no god but He. To Him be praise, at the first and at the last: for Him is the Command, and to Him shall ye (all) be brought back.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Say: See ye? If Allah were to make the night perpetual over you to the Day of Judgment, what god is there other than Allah, who can give you enlightenment? Will ye not then hearken?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: See ye? If Allah were to make the day perpetual over you to the Day of Judgment, what god is there other than Allah, who can give you a night in which ye can rest? Will ye not then see?
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: It is out of His Mercy that He has made for you Night and Day,- that ye may rest therein, and that ye may seek of his Grace;- and in order that ye may be grateful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: The Day that He will call on them, He will say: "Where are my 'partners'? whom ye imagined (to be such)?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Qarun was doubtless, of the people of Moses; but he acted insolently towards them: such were the treasures We had bestowed on him that their very keys would have been a burden to a body of strong men, behold, his people said to him: "Exult not, for Allah loveth not those who exult (in riches).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "But seek, with the (wealth) which Allah has bestowed on thee, the Home of the Hereafter, nor forget thy portion in this world: but do thou good, as Allah has been good to thee, and seek not (occasions for) mischief in the land: for Allah loves not those who do mischief."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "This has been given to me because of a certain knowledge which I have." Did he not know that Allah had destroyed, before him, (whole) generations,- which were superior to him in strength and greater in the amount (of riches) they had collected? but the wicked are not called (immediately) to account for their sins.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: So he went forth among his people in the (pride of his wordly) glitter. Said those whose aim is the Life of this World: "Oh! that we had the like of what Qarun has got! for he is truly a lord of mighty good fortune!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But those who had been granted (true) knowledge said: "Alas for you! The reward of Allah (in the Hereafter) is best for those who believe and work righteousness: but this none shall attain, save those who steadfastly persevere (in good)."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Then We caused the earth to swallow up him and his house; and he had not (the least little) party to help him against Allah, nor could he defend himself.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That Home of the Hereafter We shall give to those who intend not high-handedness or mischief on earth: and the end is (best) for the righteous.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: If any does good, the reward to him is better than his deed; but if any does evil, the doers of evil are only punished (to the extent) of their deeds.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily He Who ordained the Qur'an for thee, will bring thee back to the Place of Return. Say: "My Lord knows best who it is that brings true guidance, and who is in manifest error."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'makkah']

Text: And thou hadst not expected that the Book would be sent to thee except as a Mercy from thy Lord: Therefore lend not thou support in any way to those who reject (Allah's Message).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And let nothing keep thee back from the Signs of Allah after they have been revealed to thee: and invite (men) to thy Lord, and be not of the company of those who join gods with Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And call not, besides Allah, on another god. There is no god but He. Everything (that exists) will perish except His own Face. To Him belongs the Command, and to Him will ye (all) be brought back.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Do men think that they will be left alone on saying, "We believe", and that they will not be tested?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: We did test those before them, and Allah will certainly know those who are true from those who are false.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Do those who practise evil think that they will get the better of Us? Evil is their judgment!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: For those whose hopes are in the meeting with Allah (in the Hereafter, let them strive); for the term (appointed) by Allah is surely coming and He hears and knows (all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And if any strive (with might and main), they do so for their own souls: for Allah is free of all needs from all creation.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Those who believe and work righteous deeds,- from them shall We blot out all evil (that may be) in them, and We shall reward them according to the best of their deeds.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: We have enjoined on man kindness to parents: but if they (either of them) strive (to force) thee to join with Me (in worship) anything of which thou hast no knowledge, obey them not. Ye have (all) to return to me, and I will tell you (the truth) of all that ye did.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And those who believe and work righteous deeds,- them shall We admit to the company of the Righteous.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Then there are among men such as say, "We believe in Allah"; but when they suffer affliction in (the cause of) Allah, they treat men's oppression as if it were the Wrath of Allah! And if help comes (to thee) from thy Lord, they are sure to say, "We have (always) been with you!" Does not Allah know best all that is in the hearts of all creation?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And the Unbelievers say to those who believe: "Follow our path, and we will bear (the consequences) of your faults." Never in the least will they bear their faults: in fact they are liars!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They will bear their own burdens, and (other) burdens along with their own, and on the Day of Judgments they will be called to account for their falsehoods.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: We (once) sent Noah to his people, and he tarried among them a thousand years less fifty: but the Deluge overwhelmed them while they (persisted in) sin.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And (We also saved) Abraham: behold, he said to his people, "Serve Allah and fear Him: that will be best for you- If ye understand!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "For ye do worship idols besides Allah, and ye invent falsehood. The things that ye worship besides Allah have no power to give you sustenance: then seek ye sustenance from Allah, serve Him, and be grateful to Him: to Him will be your return.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: See they not how Allah originates creation, then repeats it: truly that is easy for Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Say: "Travel through the earth and see how Allah did originate creation; so will Allah produce a later creation: for Allah has power over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "He punishes whom He pleases, and He grants Mercy to whom He pleases, and towards Him are ye turned.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those who reject the Signs of Allah and the Meeting with Him (in the Hereafter),- it is they who shall despair of My Mercy: it is they who will (suffer) a most grievous Penalty.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And he said: "For you, ye have taken (for worship) idols besides Allah, out of mutual love and regard between yourselves in this life; but on the Day of Judgment ye shall disown each other and curse each other: and your abode will be the Fire, and ye shall have none to help."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But Lut had faith in Him: He said: "I will leave home for the sake of my Lord: for He is Exalted in Might, and Wise."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: And We gave (Abraham) Isaac and Jacob, and ordained among his progeny Prophethood and Revelation, and We granted him his reward in this life; and he was in the Hereafter (of the company) of the Righteous.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And (remember) Lut: behold, he said to his people: "Ye do commit lewdness, such as no people in Creation (ever) committed before you.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Do ye indeed approach men, and cut off the highway?- and practise wickedness (even) in your councils?" But his people gave no answer but this: they said: "Bring us the Wrath of Allah if thou tellest the truth."
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "O my Lord! help Thou me against people who do mischief!"
Label: ['invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: When Our Messengers came to Abraham with the good news, they said: "We are indeed going to destroy the people of this township: for truly they are (addicted to) crime."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And when Our Messengers came to Lut, he was grieved on their account, and felt himself powerless (to protect) them: but they said: "Fear thou not, nor grieve: we are (here) to save thee and thy following, except thy wife: she is of those who lag behind.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "For we are going to bring down on the people of this township a Punishment from heaven, because they have been wickedly rebellious."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: To the Madyan (people) (We sent) their brother Shu'aib. Then he said: "O my people! serve Allah, and fear the Last Day: nor commit evil on the earth, with intent to do mischief."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (Remember also) the 'Ad and the Thamud (people): clearly will appear to you from (the traces) of their buildings (their fate): the Evil One made their deeds alluring to them, and kept them back from the Path, though they were gifted with intelligence and skill.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: (Remember also) Qarun, Pharaoh, and Haman: there came to them Moses with Clear Signs, but they behaved with insolence on the earth; yet they could not overreach (Us).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Each one of them We seized for his crime: of them, against some We sent a violent tornado (with showers of stones); some were caught by a (mighty) Blast; some We caused the earth to swallow up; and some We drowned (in the waters): It was not Allah Who injured (or oppressed) them:" They injured (and oppressed) their own souls.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The parable of those who take protectors other than Allah is that of the spider, who builds (to itself) a house; but truly the flimsiest of houses is the spider's house;- if they but knew.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Verily Allah doth know of (every thing) whatever that they call upon besides Him: and He is Exalted (in power), Wise.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And such are the Parables We set forth for mankind, but only those understand them who have knowledge.
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Allah created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): verily in that is a Sign for those who believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Recite what is sent of the Book by inspiration to thee, and establish regular Prayer: for Prayer restrains from shameful and unjust deeds; and remembrance of Allah is the greatest (thing in life) without doubt. And Allah knows the (deeds) that ye do.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And dispute ye not with the People of the Book, except with means better (than mere disputation), unless it be with those of them who inflict wrong (and injury): but say, "We believe in the revelation which has come down to us and in that which came down to you; Our Allah and your Allah is one; and it is to Him we bow (in Islam)."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: And thus (it is) that We have sent down the Book to thee. So the People of the Book believe therein, as also do some of these (pagan Arabs): and none but Unbelievers reject our signs.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And thou wast not (able) to recite a Book before this (Book came), nor art thou (able) to transcribe it with thy right hand: In that case, indeed, would the talkers of vanities have doubted.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nay, here are Signs self-evident in the hearts of those endowed with knowledge: and none but the unjust reject Our Signs.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Ye they say: "Why are not Signs sent down to him from his Lord?" Say: "The signs are indeed with Allah: and I am indeed a clear Warner."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And is it not enough for them that we have sent down to thee the Book which is rehearsed to them? Verily, in it is Mercy and a Reminder to those who believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Enough is Allah for a witness between me and you: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth. And it is those who believe in vanities and reject Allah, that will perish (in the end).
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: They ask thee to hasten on the Punishment (for them): had it not been for a term (of respite) appointed, the Punishment would certainly have come to them: and it will certainly reach them,- of a sudden, while they perceive not!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They ask thee to hasten on the Punishment: but, of a surety, Hell will encompass the Rejecters of Faith!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O My servants who believe! truly, spacious is My Earth: therefore serve ye Me - (and Me alone)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: Every soul shall have a taste of death in the end to Us shall ye be brought back.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But those who believe and work deeds of righteousness - to them shall We give a Home in Heaven,- lofty mansions beneath which flow rivers,- to dwell therein for aye;- an excellent reward for those who do (good)!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Those who persevere in patience, and put their trust, in their Lord and Cherisher.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: How many are the creatures that carry not their own sustenance? It is Allah who feeds (both) them and you: for He hears and knows (all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: If indeed thou ask them who has created the heavens and the earth and subjected the sun and the moon (to his Law), they will certainly reply, "Allah". How are they then deluded away (from the truth)?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Allah enlarges the sustenance (which He gives) to whichever of His servants He pleases; and He (similarly) grants by (strict) measure, (as He pleases): for Allah has full knowledge of all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And if indeed thou ask them who it is that sends down rain from the sky, and gives life therewith to the earth after its death, they will certainly reply, "Allah!" Say, "Praise be to Allah!" But most of them understand not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: What is the life of this world but amusement and play? but verily the Home in the Hereafter,- that is life indeed, if they but knew.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Disdaining ungratefully Our gifts, and giving themselves up to (worldly) enjoyment! But soon will they know.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Do they not then see that We have made a sanctuary secure, and that men are being snatched away from all around them? Then, do they believe in that which is vain, and reject the Grace of Allah?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'makkah']

Text: And who does more wrong than he who invents a lie against Allah or rejects the Truth when it reaches him? Is there not a home in Hell for those who reject Faith?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And those who strive in Our (cause),- We will certainly guide them to our Paths: For verily Allah is with those who do right.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: With the help of Allah. He helps whom He will, and He is exalted in might, most merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (It is) the promise of Allah. Never does Allah depart from His promise: but most men understand not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Do they not reflect in their own minds? Not but for just ends and for a term appointed, did Allah create the heavens and the earth, and all between them: yet are there truly many among men who deny the meeting with their Lord (at the Resurrection)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Do they not travel through the earth, and see what was the end of those before them? They were superior to them in strength: they tilled the soil and populated it in greater numbers than these have done: there came to them their messengers with Clear (Signs). (Which they rejected, to their own destruction): It was not Allah Who wronged them, but they wronged their own souls.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: In the long run evil in the extreme will be the End of those who do evil; for that they rejected the Signs of Allah, and held them up to ridicule.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: It is Allah Who begins (the process of) creation; then repeats it; then shall ye be brought back to Him.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: On the Day that the Hour will be established, the guilty will be struck dumb with despair.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: No intercessor will they have among their "Partners" and they will (themselves) reject their "Partners".
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then those who have believed and worked righteous deeds, shall be made happy in a Mead of Delight.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And those who have rejected Faith and falsely denied our Signs and the meeting of the Hereafter,- such shall be brought forth to Punishment.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: So (give) glory to Allah, when ye reach eventide and when ye rise in the morning;
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Yea, to Him be praise, in the heavens and on earth; and in the late afternoon and when the day begins to decline.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: It is He Who brings out the living from the dead, and brings out the dead from the living, and Who gives life to the earth after it is dead: and thus shall ye be brought out (from the dead).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And among His Signs is this, that He created for you mates from among yourselves, that ye may dwell in tranquillity with them, and He has put love and mercy between your (hearts): verily in that are Signs for those who reflect.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And among His Signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the variations in your languages and your colours: verily in that are Signs for those who know.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And among His Signs, He shows you the lightning, by way both of fear and of hope, and He sends down rain from the sky and with it gives life to the earth after it is dead: verily in that are Signs for those who are wise.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And among His Signs is this, that heaven and earth stand by His Command: then when He calls you, by a single call, from the earth, behold, ye (straightway) come forth.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: To Him belongs every being that is in the heavens and on earth: all are devoutly obedient to Him.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is He Who begins (the process of) creation; then repeats it; and for Him it is most easy. To Him belongs the loftiest similitude (we can think of) in the heavens and the earth: for He is Exalted in Might, full of wisdom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: He does propound to you a similitude from your own (experience): do ye have partners among those whom your right hands possess, to share as equals in the wealth We have bestowed on you? Do ye fear them as ye fear each other? Thus do we explain the Signs in detail to a people that understand.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Nay, the wrong-doers (merely) follow their own lusts, being devoid of knowledge. But who will guide those whom Allah leaves astray? To them there will be no helpers.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: So set thou thy face steadily and truly to the Faith: (establish) Allah's handiwork according to the pattern on which He has made mankind: no change (let there be) in the work (wrought) by Allah: that is the standard Religion: but most among mankind understand not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Turn ye back in repentance to Him, and fear Him: establish regular prayers, and be not ye among those who join gods with Allah,-
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Or have We sent down authority to them, which points out to them the things to which they pay part-worship?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When We give men a taste of Mercy, they exult thereat: and when some evil afflicts them because of what their (own) hands have sent forth, behold, they are in despair!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: See they not that Allah enlarges the provision and restricts it, to whomsoever He pleases? Verily in that are Signs for those who believe.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So give what is due to kindred, the needy, and the wayfarer. That is best for those who seek the Countenance, of Allah, and it is they who will prosper.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: That which ye lay out for increase through the property of (other) people, will have no increase with Allah: but that which ye lay out for charity, seeking the Countenance of Allah, (will increase): it is these who will get a recompense multiplied.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: It is Allah Who has created you: further, He has provided for your sustenance; then He will cause you to die; and again He will give you life. Are there any of your (false) "Partners" who can do any single one of these things? Glory to Him! and high is He above the partners they attribute (to him)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Mischief has appeared on land and sea because of (the meed) that the hands of men have earned, that (Allah) may give them a taste of some of their deeds: in order that they may turn back (from Evil).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "Travel through the earth and see what was the end of those before (you): Most of them worshipped others besides Allah."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But set thou thy face to the right Religion before there come from Allah the Day which there is no chance of averting: on that Day shall men be divided (in two).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those who reject Faith will suffer from that rejection: and those who work righteousness will spread their couch (of repose) for themselves (in heaven):
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: That He may reward those who believe and work righteous deeds, out of his Bounty. For He loves not those who reject Faith.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Among His Signs is this, that He sends the Winds, as heralds of Glad Tidings, giving you a taste of His (Grace and) Mercy,- that the ships may sail (majestically) by His Command and that ye may seek of His Bounty: in order that ye may be grateful.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: We did indeed send, before thee, messengers to their (respective) peoples, and they came to them with Clear Signs: then, to those who transgressed, We meted out Retribution: and it was due from Us to aid those who believed.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: It is Allah Who sends the Winds, and they raise the Clouds: then does He spread them in the sky as He wills, and break them into fragments, until thou seest rain-drops issue from the midst thereof: then when He has made them reach such of his servants as He wills behold, they do rejoice!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Then contemplate (O man!) the memorials of Allah's Mercy!- how He gives life to the earth after its death: verily the same will give life to the men who are dead: for He has power over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: So verily thou canst not make the dead to hear, nor canst thou make the deaf to hear the call, when they show their backs and turn away.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nor canst thou lead back the blind from their straying: only those wilt thou make to hear, who believe in Our signs and submit (their wills in Islam).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is Allah Who created you in a state of (helpless) weakness, then gave (you) strength after weakness, then, after strength, gave (you weakness and a hoary head: He creates as He wills, and it is He Who has all knowledge and power.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: On the Day that the Hour (of Reckoning) will be established, the transgressors will swear that they tarried not but an hour: thus were they used to being deluded!
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: But those endued with knowledge and faith will say: "Indeed ye did tarry, within Allah's Decree, to the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection: but ye - ye were not aware!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So on that Day no excuse of theirs will avail the transgressors, nor will they be invited (then) to seek grace (by repentance).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: verily We have propounded for men, in this Qur'an every kind of Parable: But if thou bring to them any Sign, the Unbelievers are sure to say, "Ye do nothing but talk vanities."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So patiently persevere: for verily the promise of Allah is true: nor let those shake thy firmness, who have (themselves) no certainty of faith.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: These are Verses of the Wise Book,-
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Those who establish regular Prayer, and give regular Charity, and have (in their hearts) the assurance of the Hereafter.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: But there are, among men, those who purchase idle tales, without knowledge (or meaning), to mislead (men) from the Path of Allah and throw ridicule (on the Path): for such there will be a Humiliating Penalty.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: When Our Signs are rehearsed to such a one, he turns away in arrogance, as if he heard them not, as if there were deafness in both his ears: announce to him a grievous Penalty.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: For those who believe and work righteous deeds, there will be Gardens of Bliss,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: He created the heavens without any pillars that ye can see; He set on the earth mountains standing firm, lest it should shake with you; and He scattered through it beasts of all kinds. We send down rain from the sky, and produce on the earth every kind of noble creature, in pairs.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Such is the Creation of Allah: now show Me what is there that others besides Him have created: nay, but the Transgressors are in manifest error.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: we bestowed (in the past) Wisdom on Luqman: "Show (thy) gratitude to Allah." Any who is (so) grateful does so to the profit of his own soul: but if any is ungrateful, verily Allah is free of all wants, Worthy of all praise.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Behold, Luqman said to his son by way of instruction: "O my son! join not in worship (others) with Allah: for false worship is indeed the highest wrong-doing."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And We have enjoined on man (to be good) to his parents: in travail upon travail did his mother bear him, and in years twain was his weaning: (hear the command), "Show gratitude to Me and to thy parents: to Me is (thy final) Goal.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "But if they strive to make thee join in worship with Me things of which thou hast no knowledge, obey them not; yet bear them company in this life with justice (and consideration), and follow the way of those who turn to me (in love): in the end the return of you all is to Me, and I will tell you the truth (and meaning) of all that ye did."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "O my son!" (said Luqman), "If there be (but) the weight of a mustard-seed and it were (hidden) in a rock, or (anywhere) in the heavens or on earth, Allah will bring it forth: for Allah understands the finest mysteries, (and) is well-acquainted (with them).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "O my son! establish regular prayer, enjoin what is just, and forbid what is wrong: and bear with patient constancy whatever betide thee; for this is firmness (of purpose) in (the conduct of) affairs.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And swell not thy cheek (for pride) at men, nor walk in insolence through the earth; for Allah loveth not any arrogant boaster.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And be moderate in thy pace, and lower thy voice; for the harshest of sounds without doubt is the braying of the ass."
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Do ye not see that Allah has subjected to your (use) all things in the heavens and on earth, and has made his bounties flow to you in exceeding measure, (both) seen and unseen? Yet there are among men those who dispute about Allah, without knowledge and without guidance, and without a Book to enlighten them!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: When they are told to follow the (Revelation) that Allah has sent down, they say: "Nay, we shall follow the ways that we found our fathers (following). "What! even if it is Satan beckoning them to the Penalty of the (Blazing) Fire?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Whoever submits his whole self to Allah, and is a doer of good, has grasped indeed the most trustworthy hand-hold: and with Allah rests the End and Decision of (all) affairs.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But if any reject Faith, let not his rejection grieve thee: to Us is their return, and We shall tell them the truth of their deeds: for Allah knows well all that is in (men's) hearts.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: If thou ask them, who it is that created the heavens and the earth. They will certainly say, "Allah". Say: "Praise be to Allah!" But most of them understand not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: To Allah belong all things in heaven and earth: verily Allah is He (that is) free of all wants, worthy of all praise.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And if all the trees on earth were pens and the ocean (were ink), with seven oceans behind it to add to its (supply), yet would not the words of Allah be exhausted (in the writing): for Allah is Exalted in Power, full of Wisdom.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And your creation or your resurrection is in no wise but as an individual soul: for Allah is He Who hears and sees (all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah merges Night into Day and he merges Day into Night; that He has subjected the sun, and the moon (to his Law), each running its course for a term appointed; and that Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: That is because Allah is the (only) Reality, and because whatever else they invoke besides Him is Falsehood; and because Allah,- He is the Most High, Most Great.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Seest thou not that the ships sail through the ocean by the Grace of Allah?- that He may show you of His Signs? Verily in this are Signs for all who constantly persevere and give thanks.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: When a wave covers them like the canopy (of clouds), they call to Allah, offering Him sincere devotion. But when He has delivered them safely to land, there are among them those that halt between (right and wrong). But none reject Our Signs except only a perfidious ungrateful (wretch)!
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: O mankind! do your duty to your Lord, and fear (the coming of) a Day when no father can avail aught for his son, nor a son avail aught for his father. Verily, the promise of Allah is true: let not then this present life deceive you, nor let the chief Deceiver deceive you about Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Verily the knowledge of the Hour is with Allah (alone). It is He Who sends down rain, and He Who knows what is in the wombs. Nor does any one know what it is that he will earn on the morrow: Nor does any one know in what land he is to die. Verily with Allah is full knowledge and He is acquainted (with all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: (This is) the Revelation of the Book in which there is no doubt,- from the Lord of the Worlds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Or do they say, "He has forged it"? Nay, it is the Truth from thy Lord, that thou mayest admonish a people to whom no warner has come before thee: in order that they may receive guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth, and all between them, in six Days, and is firmly established on the Throne (of Authority): ye have none, besides Him, to protect or intercede (for you): will ye not then receive admonition?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He rules (all) affairs from the heavens to the earth: in the end will (all affairs) go up to Him, on a Day, the space whereof will be (as) a thousand years of your reckoning.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Such is He, the Knower of all things, hidden and open, the Exalted (in power), the Merciful;-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: He Who has made everything which He has created most good: He began the creation of man with (nothing more than) clay,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But He fashioned him in due proportion, and breathed into him something of His spirit. And He gave you (the faculties of) hearing and sight and feeling (and understanding): little thanks do ye give!
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And they say: "What! when we lie, hidden and lost, in the earth, shall we indeed be in a Creation renewed? Nay, they deny the Meeting with their Lord.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "The Angel of Death, put in charge of you, will (duly) take your souls: then shall ye be brought back to your Lord."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If only thou couldst see when the guilty ones will bend low their heads before their Lord, (saying:) "Our Lord! We have seen and we have heard: Now then send us back (to the world): we will work righteousness: for we do indeed (now) believe."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: If We had so willed, We could certainly have brought every soul its true guidance: but the Word from Me will come true, "I will fill Hell with Jinns and men all together."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Taste ye then - for ye forgot the Meeting of this Day of yours, and We too will forget you - taste ye the Penalty of Eternity for your (evil) deeds!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']
