Text: Only those believe in Our Signs, who, when they are recited to them, fall down in prostration, and celebrate the praises of their Lord, nor are they (ever) puffed up with pride.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Their limbs do forsake their beds of sleep, the while they call on their Lord, in Fear and Hope: and they spend (in charity) out of the sustenance which We have bestowed on them.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Is then the man who believes no better than the man who is rebellious and wicked? Not equal are they.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: For those who believe and do righteous deeds are Gardens as hospitable homes, for their (good) deeds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: As to those who are rebellious and wicked, their abode will be the Fire: every time they wish to get away therefrom, they will be forced thereinto, and it will be said to them: "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire, the which ye were wont to reject as false."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And indeed We will make them taste of the Penalty of this (life) prior to the supreme Penalty, in order that they may (repent and) return.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And who does more wrong than one to whom are recited the Signs of his Lord, and who then turns away therefrom? Verily from those who transgress We shall exact (due) Retribution.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We did indeed aforetime give the Book to Moses: be not then in doubt of its reaching (thee): and We made it a guide to the Children of Israel.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And We appointed, from among them, leaders, giving guidance under Our command, so long as they persevered with patience and continued to have faith in Our Signs.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment, in the matters wherein they differ (among themselves)
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Does it not teach them a lesson, how many generations We destroyed before them, in whose dwellings they (now) go to and fro? Verily in that are Signs: Do they not then listen?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And do they not see that We do drive rain to parched soil (bare of herbage), and produce therewith crops, providing food for their cattle and themselves? Have they not the vision?
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: They say: "When will this decision be, if ye are telling the truth?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Say: "On the Day of Decision, no profit will it be to Unbelievers if they (then) believe! nor will they be granted a respite."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: O Prophet! Fear Allah, and hearken not to the Unbelievers and the Hypocrites: verily Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And put thy trust in Allah, and enough is Allah as a disposer of affairs.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Allah has not made for any man two hearts in his (one) body: nor has He made your wives whom ye divorce by Zihar your mothers: nor has He made your adopted sons your sons. Such is (only) your (manner of) speech by your mouths. But Allah tells (you) the Truth, and He shows the (right) Way.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Call them by (the names of) their fathers: that is juster in the sight of Allah. But if ye know not their father's (names, call them) your Brothers in faith, or your maulas. But there is no blame on you if ye make a mistake therein: (what counts is) the intention of your hearts: and Allah is Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: The Prophet is closer to the Believers than their own selves, and his wives are their mothers. Blood-relations among each other have closer personal ties, in the Decree of Allah. Than (the Brotherhood of) Believers and Muhajirs: nevertheless do ye what is just to your closest friends: such is the writing in the Decree (of Allah).
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And remember We took from the prophets their covenant: As (We did) from thee: from Noah, Abraham, Moses, and Jesus the son of Mary: We took from them a solemn covenant:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That (Allah) may question the (custodians) of Truth concerning the Truth they (were charged with): And He has prepared for the Unbelievers a grievous Penalty.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: O ye who believe! Remember the Grace of Allah, (bestowed) on you, when there came down on you hosts (to overwhelm you): But We sent against them a hurricane and forces that ye saw not: but Allah sees (clearly) all that ye do.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Behold! they came on you from above you and from below you, and behold, the eyes became dim and the hearts gaped up to the throats, and ye imagined various (vain) thoughts about Allah!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And behold! The Hypocrites and those in whose hearts is a disease (even) say: "Allah and His Messenger promised us nothing but delusion!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And if an entry had been effected to them from the sides of the (city), and they had been incited to sedition, they would certainly have brought it to pass, with none but a brief delay!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And yet they had already covenanted with Allah not to turn their backs, and a covenant with Allah must (surely) be answered for.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "Running away will not profit you if ye are running away from death or slaughter; and even if (ye do escape), no more than a brief (respite) will ye be allowed to enjoy!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "Who is it that can screen you from Allah if it be His wish to give you punishment or to give you Mercy?" Nor will they find for themselves, besides Allah, any protector or helper.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily Allah knows those among you who keep back (men) and those who say to their brethren, "Come along to us", but come not to the fight except for just a little while.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Covetous over you. Then when fear comes, thou wilt see them looking to thee, their eyes revolving, like (those of) one over whom hovers death: but when the fear is past, they will smite you with sharp tongues, covetous of goods. Such men have no faith, and so Allah has made their deeds of none effect: and that is easy for Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: When the Believers saw the Confederate forces, they said: "This is what Allah and his Messenger had promised us, and Allah and His Messenger told us what was true." And it only added to their faith and their zeal in obedience.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Among the Believers are men who have been true to their covenant with Allah: of them some have completed their vow (to the extreme), and some (still) wait: but they have never changed (their determination) in the least:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: That Allah may reward the men of Truth for their Truth, and punish the Hypocrites if that be His Will, or turn to them in Mercy: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And Allah turned back the Unbelievers for (all) their fury: no advantage did they gain; and enough is Allah for the believers in their fight. And Allah is full of Strength, able to enforce His Will.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And those of the People of the Book who aided them - Allah did take them down from their strongholds and cast terror into their hearts. (So that) some ye slew, and some ye made prisoners.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: And He made you heirs of their lands, their houses, and their goods, and of a land which ye had not frequented (before). And Allah has power over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O Prophet! Say to thy Consorts: "If it be that ye desire the life of this World, and its glitter,- then come! I will provide for your enjoyment and set you free in a handsome manner.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But if ye seek Allah and His Messenger, and the Home of the Hereafter, verily Allah has prepared for the well-doers amongst you a great reward.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: O Consorts of the Prophet! If any of you were guilty of evident unseemly conduct, the Punishment would be doubled to her, and that is easy for Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But any of you that is devout in the service of Allah and His Messenger, and works righteousness,- to her shall We grant her reward twice: and We have prepared for her a generous Sustenance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O Consorts of the Prophet! Ye are not like any of the (other) women: if ye do fear (Allah), be not too complacent of speech, lest one in whose heart is a disease should be moved with desire: but speak ye a speech (that is) just.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And stay quietly in your houses, and make not a dazzling display, like that of the former Times of Ignorance; and establish regular Prayer, and give regular Charity; and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah only wishes to remove all abomination from you, ye members of the Family, and to make you pure and spotless.
Label: ['makkah']

Text: For Muslim men and women,- for believing men and women, for devout men and women, for true men and women, for men and women who are patient and constant, for men and women who humble themselves, for men and women who give in Charity, for men and women who fast (and deny themselves), for men and women who guard their chastity, and for men and women who engage much in Allah's praise,- for them has Allah prepared forgiveness and great reward.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: It is not fitting for a Believer, man or woman, when a matter has been decided by Allah and His Messenger to have any option about their decision: if any one disobeys Allah and His Messenger, he is indeed on a clearly wrong Path.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Behold! Thou didst say to one who had received the grace of Allah and thy favour: "Retain thou (in wedlock) thy wife, and fear Allah." But thou didst hide in thy heart that which Allah was about to make manifest: thou didst fear the people, but it is more fitting that thou shouldst fear Allah. Then when Zaid had dissolved (his marriage) with her, with the necessary (formality), We joined her in marriage to thee: in order that (in future) there may be no difficulty to the Believers in (the matter of) marriage with the wives of their adopted sons, when the latter have dissolved with the necessary (formality) (their marriage) with them. And Allah's command must be fulfilled.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: There can be no difficulty to the Prophet in what Allah has indicated to him as a duty. It was the practice (approved) of Allah amongst those of old that have passed away. And the command of Allah is a decree determined.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (It is the practice of those) who preach the Messages of Allah, and fear Him, and fear none but Allah. And enough is Allah to call (men) to account.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Muhammad is not the father of any of your men, but (he is) the Messenger of Allah, and the Seal of the Prophets: and Allah has full knowledge of all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O ye who believe! Celebrate the praises of Allah, and do this often;
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Their salutation on the Day they meet Him will be "Peace!"; and He has prepared for them a generous Reward.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: O Prophet! Truly We have sent thee as a Witness, a Bearer of Glad Tidings, and Warner,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Then give the Glad Tidings to the Believers, that they shall have from Allah a very great Bounty.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And obey not (the behests) of the Unbelievers and the Hypocrites, and heed not their annoyances, but put thy Trust in Allah. For enough is Allah as a Disposer of affairs.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: O ye who believe! When ye marry believing women, and then divorce them before ye have touched them, no period of 'Iddat have ye to count in respect of them: so give them a present. And set them free in a handsome manner.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: O Prophet! We have made lawful to thee thy wives to whom thou hast paid their dowers; and those whom thy right hand possesses out of the prisoners of war whom Allah has assigned to thee; and daughters of thy paternal uncles and aunts, and daughters of thy maternal uncles and aunts, who migrated (from Makka) with thee; and any believing woman who dedicates her soul to the Prophet if the Prophet wishes to wed her;- this only for thee, and not for the Believers (at large); We know what We have appointed for them as to their wives and the captives whom their right hands possess;- in order that there should be no difficulty for thee. And Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Thou mayest defer (the turn of) any of them that thou pleasest, and thou mayest receive any thou pleasest: and there is no blame on thee if thou invite one whose (turn) thou hadst set aside. This were nigher to the cooling of their eyes, the prevention of their grief, and their satisfaction - that of all of them - with that which thou hast to give them: and Allah knows (all) that is in your hearts: and Allah is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is not lawful for thee (to marry more) women after this, nor to change them for (other) wives, even though their beauty attract thee, except any thy right hand should possess (as handmaidens): and Allah doth watch over all things.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: O ye who believe! Enter not the Prophet's houses,- until leave is given you,- for a meal, (and then) not (so early as) to wait for its preparation: but when ye are invited, enter; and when ye have taken your meal, disperse, without seeking familiar talk. Such (behaviour) annoys the Prophet: he is ashamed to dismiss you, but Allah is not ashamed (to tell you) the truth. And when ye ask (his ladies) for anything ye want, ask them from before a screen: that makes for greater purity for your hearts and for theirs. Nor is it right for you that ye should annoy Allah's Messenger, or that ye should marry his widows after him at any time. Truly such a thing is in Allah's sight an enormity.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: There is no blame (on these ladies if they appear) before their fathers or their sons, their brothers, or their brother's sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or the (slaves) whom their right hands possess. And, (ladies), fear Allah; for Allah is Witness to all things.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Allah and His angels send blessings on the Prophet: O ye that believe! Send ye blessings on him, and salute him with all respect.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Those who annoy Allah and His Messenger - Allah has cursed them in this World and in the Hereafter, and has prepared for them a humiliating Punishment.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And those who annoy believing men and women undeservedly, bear (on themselves) a calumny and a glaring sin.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: O Prophet! Tell thy wives and daughters, and the believing women, that they should cast their outer garments over their persons (when abroad): that is most convenient, that they should be known (as such) and not molested. And Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Truly, if the Hypocrites, and those in whose hearts is a disease, and those who stir up sedition in the City, desist not, We shall certainly stir thee up against them: Then will they not be able to stay in it as thy neighbours for any length of time:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They shall have a curse on them: whenever they are found, they shall be seized and slain (without mercy).
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: (Such was) the practice (approved) of Allah among those who lived aforetime: No change wilt thou find in the practice (approved) of Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Men ask thee concerning the Hour: Say, "The knowledge thereof is with Allah (alone)": and what will make thee understand?- perchance the Hour is nigh!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily Allah has cursed the Unbelievers and prepared for them a Blazing Fire,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: To dwell therein for ever: no protector will they find, nor helper.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And they would say: "Our Lord! We obeyed our chiefs and our great ones, and they misled us as to the (right) Path.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O ye who believe! Be ye not like those who vexed and insulted Moses, but Allah cleared him of the (calumnies) they had uttered: and he was honourable in Allah's sight.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: O ye who believe! Fear Allah, and (always) say a word directed to the Right:
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: That He may make your conduct whole and sound and forgive you your sins: He that obeys Allah and His Messenger, has already attained the highest achievement.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: We did indeed offer the Trust to the Heavens and the Earth and the Mountains; but they refused to undertake it, being afraid thereof: but man undertook it;- He was indeed unjust and foolish;-
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: (With the result) that Allah has to punish the Hypocrites, men and women, and the Unbelievers, men and women, and Allah turns in Mercy to the Believers, men and women: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Praise be to Allah, to Whom belong all things in the heavens and on earth: to Him be Praise in the Hereafter: and He is Full of Wisdom, acquainted with all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: He knows all that goes into the earth, and all that comes out thereof; all that comes down from the sky and all that ascends thereto and He is the Most Merciful, the Oft-Forgiving.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: The Unbelievers say, "Never to us will come the Hour": Say, "Nay! but most surely, by my Lord, it will come upon you;- by Him Who knows the unseen,- from Whom is not hidden the least little atom in the heavens or on earth: Nor is there anything less than that, or greater, but is in the Record Perspicuous:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: That He may reward those who believe and work deeds of righteousness: for such is Forgiveness and a Sustenance Most Generous."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But those who strive against Our Signs, to frustrate them,- for such will be a Penalty,- a Punishment most humiliating.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And those to whom knowledge has come see that the (Revelation) sent down to thee from thy Lord - that is the Truth, and that it guides to the Path of the Exalted (in might), Worthy of all praise.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: The Unbelievers say (in ridicule): "Shall we point out to you a man that will tell you, when ye are all scattered to pieces in disintegration, that ye shall (then be raised) in a New Creation?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Has he invented a falsehood against Allah, or has a spirit (seized) him?"- Nay, it is those who believe not in the Hereafter, that are in (real) Penalty, and in farthest error.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: See they not what is before them and behind them, of the sky and the earth? If We wished, We could cause the earth to swallow them up, or cause a piece of the sky to fall upon them. Verily in this is a Sign for every devotee that turns to Allah (in repentance).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We bestowed Grace aforetime on David from ourselves: "O ye Mountains! Sing ye back the Praises of Allah with him! and ye birds (also)! And We made the iron soft for him;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: (Commanding), "Make thou coast of mail, balancing well the rings of chain armour, and work ye righteousness; for be sure I see (clearly) all that ye do."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: They worked for him as he desired, (making) arches, images, basons as large as reservoirs, and (cooking) cauldrons fixed (in their places): "Work ye, sons of David, with thanks! but few of My servants are grateful!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Then, when We decreed (Solomon's) death, nothing showed them his death except a little worm of the earth, which kept (slowly) gnawing away at his staff: so when he fell down, the Jinns saw plainly that if they had known the unseen, they would not have tarried in the humiliating Penalty (of their Task).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: There was, for Saba, aforetime, a Sign in their home-land - two Gardens to the right and to the left. "Eat of the Sustenance (provided) by your Lord, and be grateful to Him: a territory fair and happy, and a Lord Oft-Forgiving!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But they turned away (from Allah), and We sent against them the Flood (released) from the dams, and We converted their two garden (rows) into "gardens" producing bitter fruit, and tamarisks, and some few (stunted) Lote-trees.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Between them and the Cities on which We had poured our blessings, We had placed Cities in prominent positions, and between them We had appointed stages of journey in due proportion: "Travel therein, secure, by night and by day."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But they said: "Our Lord! Place longer distances between our journey-stages": but they wronged themselves (therein). At length We made them as a tale (that is told), and We dispersed them all in scattered fragments. Verily in this are Signs for every (soul that is) patiently constant and grateful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And on them did Satan prove true his idea, and they followed him, all but a party that believed.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: But he had no authority over them,- except that We might test the man who believes in the Hereafter from him who is in doubt concerning it: and thy Lord doth watch over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Call upon other (gods) whom ye fancy, besides Allah: They have no power,- not the weight of an atom,- in the heavens or on earth: No (sort of) share have they therein, nor is any of them a helper to Allah.
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: "No intercession can avail in His Presence, except for those for whom He has granted permission. So far (is this the case) that, when terror is removed from their hearts (at the Day of Judgment, then) will they say, 'what is it that your Lord commanded?' they will say, 'That which is true and just; and He is the Most High Most Great'."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Who gives you sustenance, from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "It is Allah; and certain it is that either we or ye are on right guidance or in manifest error!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Ye shall not be questioned as to our sins, nor shall we be questioned as to what ye do."
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Say: "Our Lord will gather us together and will in the end decide the matter between us (and you) in truth and justice: and He is the one to decide, the One Who knows all."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "Show me those whom ye have joined with Him as partners: by no means (can ye). Nay, He is Allah, the Exalted in Power, the Wise."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We have not sent thee but as a universal (Messenger) to men, giving them glad tidings, and warning them (against sin), but most men understand not.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They say: "When will this promise (come to pass) if ye are telling the truth?"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Say: "The appointment to you is for a Day, which ye cannot put back for an hour nor put forward."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Unbelievers say: "We shall neither believe in this scripture nor in (any) that (came) before it." Couldst thou but see when the wrong-doers will be made to stand before their Lord, throwing back the word (of blame) on one another! Those who had been despised will say to the arrogant ones: "Had it not been for you, we should certainly have been believers!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: The arrogant ones will say to those who had been despised: "Was it we who kept you back from Guidance after it reached you? Nay, rather, it was ye who transgressed.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Those who had been despised will say to the arrogant ones: "Nay! it was a plot (of yours) by day and by night: Behold! Ye (constantly) ordered us to be ungrateful to Allah and to attribute equals to Him!" They will declare (their) repentance when they see the Penalty: We shall put yokes on the necks of the Unbelievers: It would only be a requital for their (ill) Deeds.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They said: "We have more in wealth and in sons, and we cannot be punished."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: It is not your wealth nor your sons, that will bring you nearer to Us in degree: but only those who believe and work righteousness - these are the ones for whom there is a multiplied Reward for their deeds, while secure they (reside) in the dwellings on high!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Those who strive against Our Signs, to frustrate them, will be given over into Punishment.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "Verily my Lord enlarges and restricts the Sustenance to such of his servants as He pleases: and nothing do ye spend in the least (in His cause) but He replaces it: for He is the Best of those who grant Sustenance.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: One Day He will gather them all together, and say to the angels, "Was it you that these men used to worship?"
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: They will say, "Glory to Thee! our (tie) is with Thee - as Protector - not with them. Nay, but they worshipped the Jinns: most of them believed in them."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: So on that Day no power shall they have over each other, for profit or harm: and We shall say to the wrong-doers, "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire,- the which ye were wont to deny!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them, they say, "This is only a man who wishes to hinder you from the (worship) which your fathers practised." And they say, "This is only a falsehood invented!" and the Unbelievers say of the Truth when it comes to them, "This is nothing but evident magic!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But We had not given them Books which they could study, nor sent messengers to them before thee as Warners.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "I do admonish you on one point: that ye do stand up before Allah,- (It may be) in pairs, or (it may be) singly,- and reflect (within yourselves): your Companion is not possessed: he is no less than a warner to you, in face of a terrible Penalty."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "No reward do I ask of you: it is (all) in your interest: my reward is only due from Allah: And He is witness to all things."
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Say: "If I am astray, I only stray to the loss of my own soul: but if I receive guidance, it is because of the inspiration of my Lord to me: it is He Who hears all things, and is (ever) near."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Seeing that they did reject Faith (entirely) before, and that they (continually) cast (slanders) on the unseen from a position far off?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Praise be to Allah, Who created (out of nothing) the heavens and the earth, Who made the angels, messengers with wings,- two, or three, or four (pairs): He adds to Creation as He pleases: for Allah has power over all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: What Allah out of his Mercy doth bestow on mankind there is none can withhold: what He doth withhold, there is none can grant, apart from Him: and He is the Exalted in Power, full of Wisdom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O men! Call to mind the grace of Allah unto you! is there a creator, other than Allah, to give you sustenance from heaven or earth? There is no god but He: how then are ye deluded away from the Truth?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And if they reject thee, so were messengers rejected before thee: to Allah back for decision all affairs.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O men! Certainly the promise of Allah is true. Let not then this present life deceive you, nor let the Chief Deceiver deceive you about Allah.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily Satan is an enemy to you: so treat him as an enemy. He only invites his adherents, that they may become Companions of the Blazing Fire.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: For those who reject Allah, is a terrible Penalty: but for those who believe and work righteous deeds, is Forgiveness, and a magnificent Reward.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Is he, then, to whom the evil of his conduct is made alluring, so that he looks upon it as good, (equal to one who is rightly guided)? For Allah leaves to stray whom He wills, and guides whom He wills. So let not thy soul go out in (vainly) sighing after them: for Allah knows well all that they do!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: It is Allah Who sends forth the Winds, so that they raise up the Clouds, and We drive them to a land that is dead, and revive the earth therewith after its death: even so (will be) the Resurrection!
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: If any do seek for glory and power,- to Allah belong all glory and power. To Him mount up (all) Words of Purity: It is He Who exalts each Deed of Righteousness. Those that lay Plots of Evil,- for them is a Penalty terrible; and the plotting of such will be void (of result).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And Allah did create you from dust; then from a sperm-drop; then He made you in pairs. And no female conceives, or lays down (her load), but with His knowledge. Nor is a man long-lived granted length of days, nor is a part cut off from his life, but is in a Decree (ordained). All this is easy to Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Nor are the two bodies of flowing water alike,- the one palatable, sweet, and pleasant to drink, and the other, salt and bitter. Yet from each (kind of water) do ye eat flesh fresh and tender, and ye extract ornaments to wear; and thou seest the ships therein that plough the waves, that ye may seek (thus) of the Bounty of Allah that ye may be grateful.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: He merges Night into Day, and he merges Day into Night, and he has subjected the sun and the moon (to his Law): each one runs its course for a term appointed. Such is Allah your Lord: to Him belongs all Dominion. And those whom ye invoke besides Him have not the least power.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: If ye invoke them, they will not listen to your call, and if they were to listen, they cannot answer your (prayer). On the Day of Judgment they will reject your "Partnership". and none, (O man!) can tell thee (the Truth) like the One Who is acquainted with all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O ye men! It is ye that have need of Allah: but Allah is the One Free of all wants, worthy of all praise.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: If He so pleased, He could blot you out and bring in a New Creation.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nor is that (at all) difficult for Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nor can a bearer of burdens bear another's burdens if one heavily laden should call another to (bear) his load. Not the least portion of it can be carried (by the other). Even though he be nearly related. Thou canst but admonish such as fear their Lord unseen and establish regular Prayer. And whoever purifies himself does so for the benefit of his own soul; and the destination (of all) is to Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: The blind and the seeing are not alike;
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Nor are alike those that are living and those that are dead. Allah can make any that He wills to hear; but thou canst not make those to hear who are (buried) in graves.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily We have sent thee in truth, as a bearer of glad tidings, and as a warner: and there never was a people, without a warner having lived among them (in the past).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And if they reject thee, so did their predecessors, to whom came their messengers with Clear Signs, Books of dark prophecies, and the Book of Enlightenment.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: In the end did I punish those who rejected Faith: and how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah sends down rain from the sky? With it We then bring out produce of various colours. And in the mountains are tracts white and red, of various shades of colour, and black intense in hue.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And so amongst men and crawling creatures and cattle, are they of various colours. Those truly fear Allah, among His Servants, who have knowledge: for Allah is Exalted in Might, Oft-Forgiving.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Those who rehearse the Book of Allah, establish regular Prayer, and spend (in Charity) out of what We have provided for them, secretly and openly, hope for a commerce that will never fail:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: For He will pay them their meed, nay, He will give them (even) more out of His Bounty: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Ready to appreciate (service).
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: That which We have revealed to thee of the Book is the Truth,- confirming what was (revealed) before it: for Allah is assuredly- with respect to His Servants - well acquainted and Fully Observant.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Then We have given the Book for inheritance to such of Our Servants as We have chosen: but there are among them some who wrong their own souls; some who follow a middle course; and some who are, by Allah's leave, foremost in good deeds; that is the highest Grace.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And they will say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has removed from us (all) sorrow: for our Lord is indeed Oft-Forgiving Ready to appreciate (service):
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: "Who has, out of His Bounty, settled us in a Home that will last: no toil nor sense of weariness shall touch us therein."
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: But those who reject (Allah) - for them will be the Fire of Hell: No term shall be determined for them, so they should die, nor shall its Penalty be lightened for them. Thus do We reward every ungrateful one!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Therein will they cry aloud (for assistance): "Our Lord! Bring us out: we shall work righteousness, not the (deeds) we used to do!" - "Did We not give you long enough life so that he that would should receive admonition? and (moreover) the warner came to you. So taste ye (the fruits of your deeds): for the wrong-doers there is no helper."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily Allah knows (all) the hidden things of the heavens and the earth: verily He has full knowledge of all that is in (men's) hearts.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He it is That has made you inheritors in the earth: if, then, any do reject (Allah), their rejection (works) against themselves: their rejection but adds to the odium for the Unbelievers in the sight of their Lord: their rejection but adds to (their own) undoing.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Say: "Have ye seen (these) 'Partners' of yours whom ye call upon besides Allah? Show Me what it is they have created in the (wide) earth. Or have they a share in the heavens? Or have We given them a Book from which they (can derive) clear (evidence)?- Nay, the wrong-doers promise each other nothing but delusions.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: It is Allah Who sustains the heavens and the earth, lest they cease (to function): and if they should fail, there is none - not one - can sustain them thereafter: Verily He is Most Forbearing, Oft-Forgiving.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: They swore their strongest oaths by Allah that if a warner came to them, they would follow his guidance better than any (other) of the Peoples: But when a warner came to them, it has only increased their flight (from righteousness),-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: On account of their arrogance in the land and their plotting of Evil, but the plotting of Evil will hem in only the authors thereof. Now are they but looking for the way the ancients were dealt with? But no change wilt thou find in Allah's way (of dealing): no turning off wilt thou find in Allah's way (of dealing).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Do they not travel through the earth, and see what was the End of those before them,- though they were superior to them in strength? Nor is Allah to be frustrated by anything whatever in the heavens or on earth: for He is All-Knowing. All-Powerful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: If Allah were to punish men according to what they deserve. He would not leave on the back of the (earth) a single living creature: but He gives them respite for a stated Term: when their Term expires, verily Allah has in His sight all His Servants.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: It is a Revelation sent down by (Him), the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: In order that thou mayest admonish a people, whose fathers had received no admonition, and who therefore remain heedless (of the Signs of Allah).
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Thou canst but admonish such a one as follows the Message and fears the (Lord) Most Gracious, unseen: give such a one, therefore, good tidings, of Forgiveness and a Reward most generous.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Verily We shall give life to the dead, and We record that which they send before and that which they leave behind, and of all things have We taken account in a clear Book (of evidence).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: When We (first) sent to them two messengers, they rejected them: But We strengthened them with a third: they said, "Truly, we have been sent on a mission to you."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: They said: "Your evil omens are with yourselves: (deem ye this an evil omen). If ye are admonished? Nay, but ye are a people transgressing all bounds!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Obey those who ask no reward of you (for themselves), and who have themselves received Guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "It would not be reasonable in me if I did not serve Him Who created me, and to Whom ye shall (all) be brought back.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Shall I take (other) gods besides Him? If (Allah) Most Gracious should intend some adversity for me, of no use whatever will be their intercession for me, nor can they deliver me.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: It was said: "Enter thou the Garden." He said: "Ah me! Would that my People knew (what I know)!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "For that my Lord has granted me Forgiveness and has enrolled me among those held in honour!"
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Ah! Alas for (My) Servants! There comes not a messenger to them but they mock him!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: See they not how many generations before them we destroyed? Not to them will they return:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: A Sign for them is the earth that is dead: We do give it life, and produce grain therefrom, of which ye do eat.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: That they may enjoy the fruits of this (artistry): It was not their hands that made this: will they not then give thanks?
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Glory to Allah, Who created in pairs all things that the earth produces, as well as their own (human) kind and (other) things of which they have no knowledge.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And a Sign for them is the Night: We withdraw therefrom the Day, and behold they are plunged in darkness;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And the Moon,- We have measured for her mansions (to traverse) till she returns like the old (and withered) lower part of a date-stalk.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: If it were Our Will, We could drown them: then would there be no helper (to hear their cry), nor could they be delivered,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: When they are told, "Fear ye that which is before you and that which will be after you, in order that ye may receive Mercy," (they turn back).
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And when they are told, "Spend ye of (the bounties) with which Allah has provided you," the Unbelievers say to those who believe: "Shall we then feed those whom, if Allah had so willed, He would have fed, (Himself)?- Ye are in nothing but manifest error."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: Further, they say, "When will this promise (come to pass), if what ye say is true?"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: It will be no more than a single Blast, when lo! they will all be brought up before Us!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Then, on that Day, not a soul will be wronged in the least, and ye shall but be repaid the meeds of your past Deeds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Every) fruit (enjoyment) will be there for them; they shall have whatever they call for;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Peace!" - a word (of salutation) from a Lord Most Merciful!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "And O ye in sin! Get ye apart this Day!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Did I not enjoin on you, O ye Children of Adam, that ye should not worship Satan; for that he was to you an enemy avowed?-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "But he did lead astray a great multitude of you. Did ye not, then, understand?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "This is the Hell of which ye were (repeatedly) warned!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Embrace ye the (fire) this Day, for that ye (persistently) rejected (Truth)."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That Day shall We set a seal on their mouths. But their hands will speak to us, and their feet bear witness, to all that they did.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: If it had been our Will, We could surely have blotted out their eyes; then should they have run about groping for the Path, but how could they have seen?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That it may give admonition to any (who are) alive, and that the charge may be proved against those who reject (Truth).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: See they not that it is We Who have created for them - among the things which Our hands have fashioned - cattle, which are under their dominion?-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And that We have subjected them to their (use)? of them some do carry them and some they eat:
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And they have (other) profits from them (besides), and they get (milk) to drink. Will they not then be grateful?
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Yet they take (for worship) gods other than Allah, (hoping) that they might be helped!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Doth not man see that it is We Who created him from sperm? yet behold! he (stands forth) as an open adversary!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And he makes comparisons for Us, and forgets his own (origin and) Creation: He says, "Who can give life to (dry) bones and decomposed ones (at that)?"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "The same Who produces for you fire out of the green tree, when behold! ye kindle therewith (your own fires)!
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: So glory to Him in Whose hands is the dominion of all things: and to Him will ye be all brought back.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And so are strong in repelling (evil),
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily, verily, your Allah is one!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Lord of the heavens and of the earth and all between them, and Lord of every point at the rising of the sun!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We have indeed decked the lower heaven with beauty (in) the stars,-
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Repulsed, for they are under a perpetual penalty,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Just ask their opinion: are they the more difficult to create, or the (other) beings We have created? Them have We created out of a sticky clay!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Truly dost thou marvel, while they ridicule,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And, when they see a Sign, turn it to mockery,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And say, "This is nothing but evident sorcery!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Then it will be a single (compelling) cry; and behold, they will begin to see!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They will say, "Ah! Woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Bring ye up", it shall be said, "The wrong-doers and their wives, and the things they worshipped-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "So now has been proved true, against us, the word of our Lord that we shall indeed (have to) taste (the punishment of our sins).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily that is how We shall deal with Sinners.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: For they, when they were told that there is no god except Allah, would puff themselves up with Pride,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Nay! he has come with the (very) Truth, and he confirms (the Message of) the messengers (before him).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But the sincere (and devoted) Servants of Allah,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "'When we die and become dust and bones, shall we indeed receive rewards and punishments?'"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He said: "By Allah! thou wast little short of bringing me to perdition!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Is it (the case) that we shall not die,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily this is the supreme achievement!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Is that the better entertainment or the Tree of Zaqqum?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: For it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hell-Fire:
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Truly they found their fathers on the wrong Path;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So they (too) were rushed down on their footsteps!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But We sent aforetime, among them, (messengers) to admonish them;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Thus indeed do we reward those who do right.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: For he was one of our believing Servants.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Behold! he said to his father and to his people, "What is that which ye worship?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Is it a falsehood- gods other than Allah- that ye desire?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: He said: "Worship ye that which ye have (yourselves) carved?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "But Allah has created you and your handwork!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: He said: "I will go to my Lord! He will surely guide me!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then, when (the son) reached (the age of) (serious) work with him, he said: "O my son! I see in vision that I offer thee in sacrifice: Now see what is thy view!" (The son) said: "O my father! Do as thou art commanded: thou will find me, if Allah so wills one practising Patience and Constancy!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "Thou hast already fulfilled the vision!" - thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "Peace and salutation to Abraham!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And We gave him the good news of Isaac - a prophet,- one of the Righteous.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: We blessed him and Isaac: but of their progeny are (some) that do right, and (some) that obviously do wrong, to their own souls.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And We guided them to the Straight Way.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "Will ye call upon Baal and forsake the Best of Creators,-
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Allah, your Lord and Cherisher and the Lord and Cherisher of your fathers of old?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But they rejected him, and they will certainly be called up (for punishment),-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Verily, ye pass by their (sites), by day-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But We cast him forth on the naked shore in a state of sickness,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And We caused to grow, over him, a spreading plant of the gourd kind.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And We sent him (on a mission) to a hundred thousand (men) or more.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Or that We created the angels female, and they are witnesses (thereto)?
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Is it not that they say, from their own invention,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Allah has begotten children"? but they are liars!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Did He (then) choose daughters rather than sons?
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Or have ye an authority manifest?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Then bring ye your Book (of authority) if ye be truthful!
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And they have invented a blood-relationship between Him and the Jinns: but the Jinns know (quite well) that they have indeed to appear (before his Judgment-Seat)!
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: "And we are verily ranged in ranks (for service);
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But (now that the Qur'an has come), they reject it: But soon will they know!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: So turn thou away from them for a little while,
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Glory to thy Lord, the Lord of Honour and Power! (He is free) from what they ascribe (to Him)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And Peace on the messengers!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And Praise to Allah, the Lord and Cherisher of the Worlds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But the Unbelievers (are steeped) in self-glory and Separatism.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: How many generations before them did We destroy? In the end they cried (for mercy)- when there was no longer time for being saved!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So they wonder that a Warner has come to them from among themselves! and the Unbelievers say, "This is a sorcerer telling lies!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "What! has the Message been sent to him - (Of all persons) among us?"... but they are in doubt concerning My (Own) Message! Nay, they have not yet tasted My Punishment!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Not one (of them) but rejected the messengers, but My punishment came justly and inevitably (on them).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: These (today) only wait for a single mighty Blast, which (when it comes) will brook no delay.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Have patience at what they say, and remember our servant David, the man of strength: for he ever turned (to Allah).
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: It was We that made the hills declare, in unison with him, Our Praises, at eventide and at break of day,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Has the Story of the Disputants reached thee? Behold, they climbed over the wall of the private chamber;
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: When they entered the presence of David, and he was terrified of them, they said: "Fear not: we are two disputants, one of whom has wronged the other: Decide now between us with truth, and treat us not with injustice, but guide us to the even Path..
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "This man is my brother: He has nine and ninety ewes, and I have (but) one: Yet he says, 'commit her to my care,' and is (moreover) harsh to me in speech."
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: (David) said: "He has undoubtedly wronged thee in demanding thy (single) ewe to be added to his (flock of) ewes: truly many are the partners (in business) who wrong each other: Not so do those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, and how few are they?"... and David gathered that We had tried him: he asked forgiveness of his Lord, fell down, bowing (in prostration), and turned (to Allah in repentance).
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: So We forgave him this (lapse): he enjoyed, indeed, a Near Approach to Us, and a beautiful place of (Final) Return.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: O David! We did indeed make thee a vicegerent on earth: so judge thou between men in truth (and justice): Nor follow thou the lusts (of thy heart), for they will mislead thee from the Path of Allah: for those who wander astray from the Path of Allah, is a Penalty Grievous, for that they forget the Day of Account.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Not without purpose did We create heaven and earth and all between! that were the thought of Unbelievers! but woe to the Unbelievers because of the Fire (of Hell)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Shall We treat those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, the same as those who do mischief on earth? Shall We treat those who guard against evil, the same as those who turn aside from the right?
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: To David We gave Solomon (for a son),- How excellent in Our service! Ever did he turn (to Us)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And he said, "Truly do I love the love of good, with a view to the glory of my Lord,"- until (the sun) was hidden in the veil (of night):
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: He said, "O my Lord! Forgive me, and grant me a kingdom which, (it may be), suits not another after me: for Thou art the Grantor of Bounties (without measure).
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: As also the evil ones, (including) every kind of builder and diver,-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: "Such are Our Bounties: whether thou bestow them (on others) or withhold them, no account will be asked."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Commemorate Our Servant Job. Behold he cried to his Lord: "The Evil One has afflicted me with distress and suffering!"
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And We gave him (back) his people, and doubled their number,- as a Grace from Ourselves, and a thing for commemoration, for all who have Understanding.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "And take in thy hand a little grass, and strike therewith: and break not (thy oath)." Truly We found him full of patience and constancy. How excellent in Our service! ever did he turn (to Us)!
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Verily We did choose them for a special (purpose)- proclaiming the Message of the Hereafter.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And commemorate Isma'il, Elisha, and Zul-Kifl: Each of them was of the Company of the Good.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: This is a Message (of admonition): and verily, for the righteous, is a beautiful Place of (Final) Return,-
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Such is the Promise made, to you for the Day of Account!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Yea, such! but - for the wrong-doers will be an evil place of (Final) Return!-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: (The followers shall cry to the misleaders:) "Nay, ye (too)! No welcome for you! It is ye who have brought this upon us! Now evil is (this) place to stay in!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Did we treat them (as such) in ridicule, or have (our) eyes failed to perceive them?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "Truly am I a Warner: no god is there but the one Allah, Supreme and Irresistible,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all between,- Exalted in Might, able to enforce His Will, forgiving again and again."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: Say: "That is a Message Supreme (above all),-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: 'Only this has been revealed to me: that I am to give warning plainly and publicly."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! What prevents thee from prostrating thyself to one whom I have created with my hands? Art thou haughty? Or art thou one of the high (and mighty) ones?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: (Iblis) said: "I am better than he: thou createdst me from fire, and him thou createdst from clay."
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: (Allah) said: "Respite then is granted thee-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Allah) said: "Then it is just and fitting- and I say what is just and fitting-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Verily it is We Who have revealed the Book to thee in Truth: so serve Allah, offering Him sincere devotion.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Is it not to Allah that sincere devotion is due? But those who take for protectors other than Allah (say): "We only serve them in order that they may bring us nearer to Allah." Truly Allah will judge between them in that wherein they differ. But Allah guides not such as are false and ungrateful.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Had Allah wished to take to Himself a son, He could have chosen whom He pleased out of those whom He doth create: but Glory be to Him! (He is above such things.) He is Allah, the One, the Irresistible.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): He makes the Night overlap the Day, and the Day overlap the Night: He has subjected the sun and the moon (to His law): Each one follows a course for a time appointed. Is not He the Exalted in Power - He Who forgives again and again?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: He created you (all) from a single person: then created, of like nature, his mate; and he sent down for you eight head of cattle in pairs: He makes you, in the wombs of your mothers, in stages, one after another, in three veils of darkness. such is Allah, your Lord and Cherisher: to Him belongs (all) dominion. There is no god but He: then how are ye turned away (from your true Centre)?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: If ye reject (Allah), Truly Allah hath no need of you; but He liketh not ingratitude from His servants: if ye are grateful, He is pleased with you. No bearer of burdens can bear the burden of another. In the end, to your Lord is your Return, when He will tell you the truth of all that ye did (in this life). for He knoweth well all that is in (men's) hearts.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: When some trouble toucheth man, he crieth unto his Lord, turning to Him in repentance: but when He bestoweth a favour upon him as from Himself, (man) doth forget what he cried and prayed for before, and he doth set up rivals unto Allah, thus misleading others from Allah's Path. Say, "Enjoy thy blasphemy for a little while: verily thou art (one) of the Companions of the Fire!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Is one who worships devoutly during the hour of the night prostrating himself or standing (in adoration), who takes heed of the Hereafter, and who places his hope in the Mercy of his Lord - (like one who does not)? Say: "Are those equal, those who know and those who do not know? It is those who are endued with understanding that receive admonition.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Say: "O ye my servants who believe! Fear your Lord, good is (the reward) for those who do good in this world. Spacious is Allah's earth! those who patiently persevere will truly receive a reward without measure!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Say: "Verily, I am commanded to serve Allah with sincere devotion;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "I would, if I disobeyed my Lord, indeed have fear of the Penalty of a Mighty Day."
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Serve ye what ye will besides him." Say: "Truly, those in loss are those who lose their own souls and their People on the Day of Judgment: Ah! that is indeed the (real and) evident Loss!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: They shall have Layers of Fire above them, and Layers (of Fire) below them: with this doth Allah warn off his servants: "O My Servants! then fear ye Me!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Those who listen to the Word, and follow the best (meaning) in it: those are the ones whom Allah has guided, and those are the ones endued with understanding.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Is, then, one against whom the decree of Punishment is justly due (equal to one who eschews Evil)? Wouldst thou, then, deliver one (who is) in the Fire?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But it is for those who fear their Lord. That lofty mansions, one above another, have been built: beneath them flow rivers (of delight): (such is) the Promise of Allah: never doth Allah fail in (His) promise.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Seest thou not that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and leads it through springs in the earth? Then He causes to grow, therewith, produce of various colours: then it withers; thou wilt see it grow yellow; then He makes it dry up and crumble away. Truly, in this, is a Message of remembrance to men of understanding.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: Allah has revealed (from time to time) the most beautiful Message in the form of a Book, consistent with itself, (yet) repeating (its teaching in various aspects): the skins of those who fear their Lord tremble thereat; then their skins and their hearts do soften to the celebration of Allah's praises. Such is the guidance of Allah: He guides therewith whom He pleases, but such as Allah leaves to stray, can have none to guide.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Is, then, one who has to fear the brunt of the Penalty on the Day of Judgment (and receive it) on his face, (like one guarded therefrom)? It will be said to the wrong-doers: "Taste ye (the fruits of) what ye earned!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Those before them (also) rejected (revelation), and so the Punishment came to them from directions they did not perceive.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (It is) a Qur'an in Arabic, without any crookedness (therein): in order that they may guard against Evil.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Allah puts forth a Parable a man belonging to many partners at variance with each other, and a man belonging entirely to one master: are those two equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah! but most of them have no knowledge.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Truly thou wilt die (one day), and truly they (too) will die (one day).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: In the end will ye (all), on the Day of Judgment, settle your disputes in the presence of your Lord.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Who, then, doth more wrong than one who utters a lie concerning Allah, and rejects the Truth when it comes to him; is there not in Hell an abode for blasphemers?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And he who brings the Truth and he who confirms (and supports) it - such are the men who do right.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: They shall have all that they wish for, in the presence of their Lord: such is the reward of those who do good:
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Is not Allah enough for his Servant? But they try to frighten thee with other (gods) besides Him! for such as Allah leaves to stray, there can be no guide.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: If indeed thou ask them who it is that created the heavens and the earth, they would be sure to say, "Allah". Say: "See ye then? the things that ye invoke besides Allah,- can they, if Allah wills some Penalty for me, remove His Penalty?- Or if He wills some Grace for me, can they keep back his Grace?" Say: "Sufficient is Allah for me! In Him trust those who put their trust."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Say: "O my People! Do whatever ye can: I will do (my part): but soon will ye know-
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Verily We have revealed the Book to thee in Truth, for (instructing) mankind. He, then, that receives guidance benefits his own soul: but he that strays injures his own soul. Nor art thou set over them to dispose of their affairs.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: It is Allah that takes the souls (of men) at death; and those that die not (He takes) during their sleep: those on whom He has passed the decree of death, He keeps back (from returning to life), but the rest He sends (to their bodies) for a term appointed verily in this are Signs for those who reflect.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "To Allah belongs exclusively (the right to grant) intercession: to Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: In the End, it is to Him that ye shall be brought back."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Say: "O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! Knower of all that is hidden and open! it is Thou that wilt judge between Thy Servants in those matters about which they have differed."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Even if the wrong-doers had all that there is on earth, and as much more, (in vain) would they offer it for ransom from the pain of the Penalty on the Day of Judgment: but something will confront them from Allah, which they could never have counted upon!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: For the evils of their Deeds will confront them, and they will be (completely) encircled by that which they used to mock at!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Now, when trouble touches man, he cries to Us: But when We bestow a favour upon him as from Ourselves, he says, "This has been given to me because of a certain knowledge (I have)!" Nay, but this is but a trial, but most of them understand not!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Thus did the (generations) before them say! But all that they did was of no profit to them.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nay, the evil results of their Deeds overtook them. And the wrong-doers of this (generation)- the evil results of their Deeds will soon overtake them (too), and they will never be able to frustrate (Our Plan)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Say: "O my Servants who have transgressed against their souls! Despair not of the Mercy of Allah: for Allah forgives all sins: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Lest the soul should (then) say: 'Ah! Woe is me!- In that I neglected (my duty) towards Allah, and was but among those who mocked!'-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: "Or (lest) it should say: 'If only Allah had guided me, I should certainly have been among the righteous!'-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "Or (lest) it should say when it (actually) sees the penalty: 'If only I had another chance, I should certainly be among those who do good!'
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "(The reply will be:) 'Nay, but there came to thee my Signs, and thou didst reject them: thou wast Haughty, and became one of those who reject faith!'"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: On the Day of Judgment wilt thou see those who told lies against Allah;- their faces will be turned black; Is there not in Hell an abode for the Haughty?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But Allah will deliver the righteous to their place of salvation: no evil shall touch them, nor shall they grieve.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the Guardian and Disposer of all affairs.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Say: "Is it some one other than Allah that ye order me to worship, O ye ignorant ones?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But it has already been revealed to thee,- as it was to those before thee,- "If thou wert to join (gods with Allah), truly fruitless will be thy work (in life), and thou wilt surely be in the ranks of those who lose (all spiritual good)".
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Nay, but worship Allah, and be of those who give thanks.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: No just estimate have they made of Allah, such as is due to Him: On the Day of Judgment the whole of the earth will be but His handful, and the heavens will be rolled up in His right hand: Glory to Him! High is He above the Partners they attribute to Him!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Trumpet will (just) be sounded, when all that are in the heavens and on earth will swoon, except such as it will please Allah (to exempt). Then will a second one be sounded, when, behold, they will be standing and looking on!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And the Earth will shine with the Glory of its Lord: the Record (of Deeds) will be placed (open); the prophets and the witnesses will be brought forward and a just decision pronounced between them; and they will not be wronged (in the least).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: The Unbelievers will be led to Hell in crowd: until, when they arrive, there, its gates will be opened. And its keepers will say, "Did not messengers come to you from among yourselves, rehearsing to you the Signs of your Lord, and warning you of the Meeting of This Day of yours?" The answer will be: "True: but the Decree of Punishment has been proved true against the Unbelievers!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (To them) will be said: "Enter ye the gates of Hell, to dwell therein: and evil is (this) Abode of the Arrogant!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And those who feared their Lord will be led to the Garden in crowds: until behold, they arrive there; its gates will be opened; and its keepers will say: "Peace be upon you! well have ye done! enter ye here, to dwell therein."
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: They will say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has truly fulfilled His Promise to us, and has given us (this) land in heritage: We can dwell in the Garden as we will: how excellent a reward for those who work (righteousness)!"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And thou wilt see the angels surrounding the Throne (Divine) on all sides, singing Glory and Praise to their Lord. The Decision between them (at Judgment) will be in (perfect) justice, and the cry (on all sides) will be, "Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Who forgiveth sin, accepteth repentance, is strict in punishment, and hath a long reach (in all things). there is no god but He: to Him is the final goal.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts']

Text: None can dispute about the Signs of Allah but the Unbelievers. Let not, then, their strutting about through the land deceive thee!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But (there were people) before them, who denied (the Signs),- the People of Noah, and the Confederates (of Evil) after them; and every People plotted against their prophet, to seize him, and disputed by means of vanities, therewith to condemn the Truth; but it was I that seized them! and how (terrible) was My Requital!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Thus was the Decree of thy Lord proved true against the Unbelievers; that truly they are Companions of the Fire!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Those who sustain the Throne (of Allah) and those around it Sing Glory and Praise to their Lord; believe in Him; and implore Forgiveness for those who believe: "Our Lord! Thy Reach is over all things, in Mercy and Knowledge. Forgive, then, those who turn in Repentance, and follow Thy Path; and preserve them from the Penalty of the Blazing Fire!
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: "And grant, our Lord! that they enter the Gardens of Eternity, which Thou hast promised to them, and to the righteous among their fathers, their wives, and their posterity! For Thou art (He), the Exalted in Might, Full of Wisdom.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'mandatory_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'invocations_in_the_quran']

Text: They will say: "Our Lord! twice hast Thou made us without life, and twice hast Thou given us Life! Now have we recognised our sins: Is there any way out (of this)?"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: He it is Who showeth you his Signs, and sendeth down sustenance for you from the sky: but only those receive admonition who turn (to Allah).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Raised high above ranks (or degrees), (He is) the Lord of the Throne (of Authority): by His Command doth He send the Spirit (of inspiration) to any of His servants he pleases, that it may warn (men) of the Day of Mutual Meeting,-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Day whereon they will (all) come forth: not a single thing concerning them is hidden from Allah. Whose will be the dominion that Day?" That of Allah, the One the Irresistible!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That Day will every soul be requited for what it earned; no injustice will there be that Day, for Allah is Swift in taking account.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Warn them of the Day that is (ever) drawing near, when the hearts will (come) right up to the throats to choke (them); No intimate friend nor intercessor will the wrong-doers have, who could be listened to.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (Allah) knows of (the tricks) that deceive with the eyes, and all that the hearts (of men) conceal.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And Allah will judge with (justice and) Truth: but those whom (men) invoke besides Him, will not (be in a position) to judge at all. Verily it is Allah (alone) Who hears and sees (all things).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Do they not travel through the earth and see what was the End of those before them? They were even superior to them in strength, and in the traces (they have left) in the land: but Allah did call them to account for their sins, and none had they to defend them against Allah.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: That was because there came to them their messengers with Clear (Signs), but they rejected them: So Allah called them to account: for He is Full of Strength, Strict in Punishment.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Of old We sent Moses, with Our Signs and an authority manifest,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Now, when he came to them in Truth, from Us, they said, "Slay the sons of those who believe with him, and keep alive their females," but the plots of Unbelievers (end) in nothing but errors (and delusions)!...
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Moses said: "I have indeed called upon my Lord and your Lord (for protection) from every arrogant one who believes not in the Day of Account!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: A believer, a man from among the people of Pharaoh, who had concealed his faith, said: "Will ye slay a man because he says, 'My Lord is Allah'?- when he has indeed come to you with Clear (Signs) from your Lord? and if he be a liar, on him is (the sin of) his lie: but, if he is telling the Truth, then will fall on you something of the (calamity) of which he warns you: Truly Allah guides not one who transgresses and lies!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Then said the man who believed: "O my people! Truly I do fear for you something like the Day (of disaster) of the Confederates (in sin)!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Something like the fate of the People of Noah, the 'Ad, and the Thamud, and those who came after them: but Allah never wishes injustice to his Servants.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And O my people! I fear for you a Day when there will be Mutual calling (and wailing),-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "A Day when ye shall turn your backs and flee: No defender shall ye have from Allah: Any whom Allah leaves to stray, there is none to guide...
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']
