Text: For what Day are these (portents) deferred?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: For the Day of Sorting out.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Did We not destroy the men of old (for their evil)?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: So shall We make later (generations) follow them.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: For We do determine (according to need); for We are the best to determine (things).
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Have We not made the earth (as a place) to draw together.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The living and the dead,
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: "Indeed it throws about sparks (huge) as Forts,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: As to the Righteous, they shall be amidst (cool) shades and springs (of water).
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: "Eat ye and drink ye to your heart's content: for that ye worked (Righteousness).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Thus do We certainly reward the Doers of Good.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Have We not made the earth as a wide expanse,
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: And (have We not) created you in pairs,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And made the night as a covering,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And (have We not) built over you the seven firmaments,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And do We not send down from the clouds water in abundance,
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: That We may produce therewith corn and vegetables,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And the heavens shall be opened as if there were doors,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: For that they used not to fear any account (for their deeds),
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And all things have We preserved on record.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily for the Righteous there will be a fulfilment of (the heart's) desires;
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And a cup full (to the brim).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: No vanity shall they hear therein, nor Untruth:-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: (From) the Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all between, (Allah) Most Gracious: None shall have power to argue with Him.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand forth in ranks, none shall speak except any who is permitted by (Allah) Most Gracious, and He will say what is right.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily, We have warned you of a Penalty near, the Day when man will see (the deeds) which his hands have sent forth, and the Unbeliever will say, "Woe unto me! Would that I were (metre) dust!"
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: By the (angels) who tear out (the souls of the wicked) with violence;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then press forward as in a race,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: They say (now): "What! shall we indeed be returned to (our) former state?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But verily, it will be but a single (Compelling) Cry,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: "And say to him, 'Wouldst thou that thou shouldst be purified (from sin)?-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "'And that I guide thee to thy Lord, so thou shouldst fear Him?'"
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Saying, "I am your Lord, Most High".
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But Allah did punish him, (and made an) example of him, - in the Hereafter, as in this life.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Verily in this is an instructive warning for whosoever feareth (Allah).
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Its night doth He endow with darkness, and its splendour doth He bring out (with light).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And the earth, moreover, hath He extended (to a wide expanse);
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And the mountains hath He firmly fixed;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And had preferred the life of this world,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And for such as had entertained the fear of standing before their Lord's (tribunal) and had restrained (their) soul from lower desires,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Thou art but a Warner for such as fear it.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: To him dost thou attend;
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But as to him who came to thee striving earnestly,
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And with fear (in his heart),
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: By no means (should it be so)! For it is indeed a Message of instruction:
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: (Written) by the hands of scribes-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Woe to man! What hath made him reject Allah;
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Then doth He make His path smooth for him;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then He causeth him to die, and putteth him in his grave;
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And enclosed Gardens, dense with lofty trees,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And fruits and fodder,-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: And from his mother and his father,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Blackness will cover them:
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: When the wild beasts are herded together (in the human habitations);
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: When the female (infant), buried alive, is questioned -
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And when the Garden is brought near;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And the Night as it dissipates;
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Endued with Power, with rank before the Lord of the Throne,
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Nor is it the word of an evil spirit accursed.
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: (With profit) to whoever among you wills to go straight:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But ye shall not will except as Allah wills,- the Cherisher of the Worlds.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And when the Graves are turned upside down;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Him Who created thee. Fashioned thee in due proportion, and gave thee a just bias;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Kind and honourable,- Writing down (your deeds):
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: And the Wicked - they will be in the Fire,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: On a Mighty Day,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: A Day when (all) mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nay! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Those that deny the Day of Judgment.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Further, they will enter the Fire of Hell.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: With it will be (given) a mixture of Tasnim:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And when they returned to their own people, they would return jesting;
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: On Thrones (of Dignity) they will command (a sight) (of all things).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And casts forth what is within it and becomes (clean) empty,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: O thou man! Verily thou art ever toiling on towards thy Lord- painfully toiling,- but thou shalt meet Him.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And the Moon in her fullness:
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: But Allah has full knowledge of what they secrete (in their breasts)
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Except to those who believe and work righteous deeds: For them is a Reward that will never fail.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: By the sky, (displaying) the Zodiacal Signs;
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: By the promised Day (of Judgment);
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Him to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth! And Allah is Witness to all things.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Those who persecute (or draw into temptation) the Believers, men and women, and do not turn in repentance, will have the Penalty of Hell: They will have the Penalty of the Burning Fire.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: For those who believe and do righteous deeds, will be Gardens; beneath which rivers flow: That is the great Salvation, (the fulfilment of all desires),
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: It is He Who creates from the very beginning, and He can restore (life).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: And He is the Oft-Forgiving, Full of Loving-Kindness,
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: And yet the Unbelievers (persist) in rejecting (the Truth)!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And what will explain to thee what the Night-Visitant is?-
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: There is no soul but has a protector over it.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He is created from a drop emitted-
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: The Day that (all) things secret will be tested,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: By the Firmament which returns (in its round),
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Behold this is the Word that distinguishes (Good from Evil):
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Therefore grant a delay to the Unbelievers: Give respite to them gently (for awhile).
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Glorify the name of thy Guardian-Lord Most High,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Who hath ordained laws. And granted guidance;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And Who bringeth out the (green and luscious) pasture,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Except as Allah wills: For He knoweth what is manifest and what is hidden.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The admonition will be received by those who fear (Allah):
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Who will enter the Great Fire,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: In which they will then neither die nor live.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: But those will prosper who purify themselves,
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Nay (behold), ye prefer the life of this world;
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Has the story reached thee of the overwhelming (Event)?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: In a Garden on high,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And cushions set in rows,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Do they not look at the Camels, how they are made?-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And at the Earth, how it is spread out?
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: Therefore do thou give admonition, for thou art one to admonish.
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: But if any turn away and reject Allah,-
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And by the Night when it passeth away;-
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the 'Ad (people),-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Of the (city of) Iram, with lofty pillars,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And with the Thamud (people), who cut out (huge) rocks in the valley?-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And heaped therein mischief (on mischief).
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Therefore did thy Lord pour on them a scourge of diverse chastisements:
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Nay, nay! but ye honour not the orphans!
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Nor do ye encourage one another to feed the poor!-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Nay! When the earth is pounded to powder,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And thy Lord cometh, and His angels, rank upon rank,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: For, that Day, His Chastisement will be such as none (else) can inflict,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: "Enter thou, then, among My devotees!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: I do call to witness this City;-
Label: ['makkah']

Text: Verily We have created man into toil and struggle.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: And a tongue, and a pair of lips?-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And shown him the two highways?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And what will explain to thee the path that is steep?-
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Then will he be of those who believe, and enjoin patience, (constancy, and self-restraint), and enjoin deeds of kindness and compassion.
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: But those who reject Our Signs, they are the (unhappy) Companions of the Left Hand.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: By the Firmament and its (wonderful) structure;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: By the Soul, and the proportion and order given to it;
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And its enlightenment as to its wrong and its right;-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: But the Messenger of Allah said to them: "It is a She-camel of Allah! And (bar her not from) having her drink!"
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then they rejected him (as a false prophet), and they hamstrung her. So their Lord, on account of their crime, obliterated their traces and made them equal (in destruction, high and low)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: By the Night as it conceals (the light);
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: By (the mystery of) the creation of male and female;-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And (in all sincerity) testifies to the best,-
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And gives the lie to the best,-
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily We take upon Ourselves to guide,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And verily unto Us (belong) the End and the Beginning.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Therefore do I warn you of a Fire blazing fiercely;
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: None shall reach it but those most unfortunate ones
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: But those most devoted to Allah shall be removed far from it,-
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: By the Glorious Morning Light,
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: And He found thee wandering, and He gave thee guidance.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Therefore, treat not the orphan with harshness,
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Nor repulse the petitioner (unheard);
Label: ['muslim_ethic', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: But the bounty of the Lord - rehearse and proclaim!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: So, verily, with every difficulty, there is relief:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Therefore, when thou art free (from thine immediate task), still labour hard,
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: By the Fig and the Olive,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: And this City of security,-
Label: ['makkah']

Text: We have indeed created man in the best of moulds,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Except such as believe and do righteous deeds: For they shall have a reward unfailing.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Then what can, after this, contradict thee, as to the judgment (to come)?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Proclaim! (or read!) in the name of thy Lord and Cherisher, Who created-
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Created man, out of a (mere) clot of congealed blood:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He Who taught (the use of) the pen,-
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: In that he looketh upon himself as self-sufficient.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Seest thou one who forbids-
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Seest thou if he is on (the road of) Guidance?-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Seest thou if he denies (Truth) and turns away?
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Knoweth he not that Allah doth see?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: We will call on the angels of punishment (to deal with him)!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Nay, heed him not: But bow down in adoration, and bring thyself the closer (to Allah)!
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Therein come down the angels and the Spirit by Allah's permission, on every errand:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: And they have been commanded no more than this: To worship Allah, offering Him sincere devotion, being true (in faith); to establish regular prayer; and to practise regular charity; and that is the Religion Right and Straight.
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts', 'people_of_the_book']

Text: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, will be in Hell-Fire, to dwell therein (for aye). They are the worst of creatures.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Those who have faith and do righteous deeds,- they are the best of creatures.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: Their reward is with Allah: Gardens of Eternity, beneath which rivers flow; they will dwell therein for ever; Allah well pleased with them, and they with Him: all this for such as fear their Lord and Cherisher.
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: On that Day will she declare her tidings:
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Then shall anyone who has done an atom's weight of good, see it!
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: And anyone who has done an atom's weight of evil, shall see it.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And raise the dust in clouds the while,
Label: ['creation_and_creatures']

Text: Truly man is, to his Lord, ungrateful;
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And to that (fact) he bears witness (by his deeds);
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: And that which is (locked up) in (human) breasts is made manifest-
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (It is) a Day whereon men will be like moths scattered about,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: The mutual rivalry for piling up (the good things of this world) diverts you (from the more serious things),
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Again, ye shall see it with certainty of sight!
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Verily Man is in loss,
Label: ['muslim_ethic']

Text: Woe to every (kind of) scandal-monger and-backbiter,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: It shall be made into a vault over them,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the Companions of the Elephant?
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: Striking them with stones of baked clay.
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'creation_and_creatures']

Text: Let them adore the Lord of this House,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith', 'makkah']

Text: Seest thou one who denies the Judgment (to come)?
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Then such is the (man) who repulses the orphan (with harshness),
Label: ['foundations_of_the_laws']

Text: Who are neglectful of their prayers,
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: Those who (want but) to be seen (of men),
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'forbiden_acts']

Text: Therefore to thy Lord turn in Prayer and Sacrifice.
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Nor will ye worship that which I worship.
Label: ['forbiden_acts']

Text: And thou dost see the people enter Allah's Religion in crowds,
Label: ['mandatory_acts']

Text: Celebrate the praises of thy Lord, and pray for His Forgiveness: For He is Oft-Returning (in Grace and Mercy).
Label: ['mandatory_acts', 'muslim_ethic']

Text: No profit to him from all his wealth, and all his gains!
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: He begetteth not, nor is He begotten;
Label: ['people_of_the_book']

Text: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the Dawn
Label: ['science_in_the_quran']

Text: From the mischief of created things;
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: From the mischief of those who practise secret arts;
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'science_in_the_quran']

Text: The King (or Ruler) of Mankind,
Label: ['pillars_of_faith']

Text: (The same) who whispers into the hearts of Mankind,-
Label: ['forbiden_acts', 'creation_and_creatures', 'science_in_the_quran']
